Title: Incamake yâ€™urugendo rwa Nishimwe Naomie mu irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda rwamuhesheje kwambara ikamba
Body:
Nishimwe Naomie yambitswe ikamba rya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda 2020 nyuma yâ€™urugendo rukomeye yagiye anahuriramo nâ€™ibizazane ariko byose akabirenga kugeza yegukanye ikamba.
Nishimwe Naomie yambitswe ikamba rya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda 2020 nyuma yâ€™urugendo rukomeye yagiye anahuriramo nâ€™ibizazane ariko byose akabirenga kugeza yegukanye ikamba.
Uyu mukobwa mu kiganiro yahaye abanyamakuru nyuma yo gutorwa, yavuze ko hari igihe cyageze agacika intege ku buryo yumvaga nâ€™irushanwa nyirizina yaryihorera akivanamo.
Nishimwe Naomie wambitswe ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020 yaryinjiyemo yiyamamarije mu mujyi wa Kigali.
Akimara gutsindira guhagararira Umujyi wa Kigali, yahise atangira kwibasirwa ku mbuga nkoranyambaga ashinjwa kuba akorana bya hafi na MTN Rwanda bityo hakaba hari abagaragazaga impungenge zâ€™uko iyi sosiyete yeteye inkunga Miss Rwanda 2020 yazagira uruhare mu itsinda rye.
Ari abategura iri rushanwa cyangwa ubuyobozi bwa Miss Rwanda bose bavuze ko uyu mukobwa kwinjira mu irushanwa nta tegeko yishe ndetse arimo mu buryo bwubahirije amategeko.
Bose bahumurije abakurikirana iri rushanwa bababwira ko kuba uyu mukobwa hari uburyo yakoranye na MTN Rwanda ntacyo byamwongereraho.
Nyuma yo guhagararira Umujyi wa Kigali, Nishimwe Naomie mu ijonjora ryâ€™ibanze yaserukanye umushinga wo kurwanya indwara yâ€™agahinda gakabije (Depression).
Uyu mushinga waherekeje Nishimwe Naomie kugeza umuhesheje ikamba rya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda wâ€™umwaka wa 2020 yambitswe mu birori byabaye mu ijoro ryo kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 22 Gashyantare 2020.
Usibye ikamba rya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda Nishimwe Naomie yegukanye ikamba ryâ€™umukobwa uberwa nâ€™amafoto wahembwe na Bella Flowers yamugeneye 1 200 000frw.
Nishimwe Naomie yayoboye abandi bakobwa mu majwi kuva mu ijonjora ryâ€™ibanze kugeza ku munsi wa nyuma wâ€™irushanwa yarushaga abandi bakobwa amajwi yaba kuri Internet no mu buryo bwa SMS.
Ikamba rya Miss Rwanda Nishimwe Naomie yegukanye ryamuhesheje kwegukana ibihembo binyuranye. Nka Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda 2020 yagenewe imodoka nshya yo mu bwoko bwa Suzuki Swift 2019 yatanzwe na Suzuki binyuze muri Rwanda Motor ifite agaciro ka miliyoni 18 zâ€™amafaranga yâ€™u Rwanda.
Yemerewe kandi umushahara wâ€™ibihumbi 800 Frw ku kwezi mu gihe cyâ€™umwaka, aya akazatangwa na Africa Improved Foods.
Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda yemerewe kwivuza ku buntu ku ivuriro ryitwa Ubuzima Polyclinique no gusohokera muri Camellia agafata icyo ashaka mu gihe kingana nâ€™umwaka azamarana ikamba.
Yemerewe itike yâ€™indege izamujyana i Dubai nâ€™ibindi byose bijyanye nâ€™urugendo azakora mu rwego rwâ€™ikiruhuko, iyi ikazatangwa na kompanyi yitwa Multi Design Group.
Keza Salon yemeyeko izamukorera ibijyanye nâ€™imisatsi ndetse no kwita ku bwiza bwe mu gihe cyâ€™umwaka wose.
Yemerewe gucapirwa inyandiko zose ku buntu ku bintu byose azaba ashaka muri Smart Design, mu gihe True Connect yo yamwemereye internet yâ€™umwaka ku buntu.
Mu gihe agiye mu birori, uyu mukobwa azajya yambikwa na Ian Boutique ku buntu ahabwe nâ€™imyenda ya Siporo yâ€™ubuntu muri Magasin Sport Class.
Umukobwa wegukanye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda buri mwaka ahita anatsindira itike yo guhagararira igihugu muri Miss World.
Ishimwe Naomie wegukanye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020 ni umwana wâ€™imyaka 21 upima metero 1.70 akaba yari yambaye nimero 31 mu irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020.

Title: Nishimwe Naomie yegukanye ikamba rya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda 2020 (Amafoto na Video)
Body:
Ikamba rya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda 2020 ryambitswe Nishimwe Naomie winjiye mu irushanwa ahagarariye Umujyi wa Kigali, Igisonga cya Kabiri cyabaye Umutesi Denise [No43] naho Igisonga cya mbere ni Umwiza Phionah [No47].
Ikamba rya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda 2020 ryambitswe Nishimwe Naomie winjiye mu irushanwa ahagarariye Umujyi wa Kigali, Igisonga cya Kabiri cyabaye Umutesi Denise [No43] naho Igisonga cya mbere ni Umwiza Phionah [No47].
Nishimwe Naomie yegukanye ikamba rya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda wâ€™umwaka wa 2020, asimbura Nimwiza Meghan wari ufite iriheruka yambitswe muri Gashyantare 2019.
Uyu mukobwa wâ€™imyaka 20 yatowe mu birori byabereye mu Intare Conference Arena i Rusororo ku mugoroba wo ku wa 22 ushyira mu rukerera rwo ku wa 23 Gashyantare 2020. Nishimwe yabaye Nyampinga wa munani utowe mu mateka yâ€™u Rwanda.
Urugendo rwo guhitamo Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda rwari rumaze iminsi 64 kuva ku ijonjora ryâ€™ibanze ryabereye mu Karere ka Rubavu ku wa 21 Ukuboza 2019.
Nishimwe yagizwe Nyampinga hagendewe ku kimero nâ€™ubwiza, kugira ubumenyi kurusha abandi ndetse nâ€™umuco nkâ€™imwe mu nkingi zâ€™ubuzima bwâ€™igihugu.
Uyu mukobwa yahiriwe cyane kuko yanagizwe Nyampinga uberwa nâ€™amafoto (Miss Photogenic).
Abakobwa 20 [baje kuvamo umwe] bâ€™ikimero bageze mu cyiciro cya nyuma cyâ€™irushanwa batoranyijwe muri 54 batsinze amajonjora yabereye mu ntara zose zâ€™igihugu aho abagera kuri 400 bari biyandikishije.
Mu byashingiweho batoranya Nyampinga harebwe uburanga (amanota 30%), ubuhanga mu kuvuga (amanota 40%) nâ€™uko umukobwa yiyerekanye (amanota 30%) byose bikagira igiteranyo cyâ€™amanota ijana.

21:35: Mutegwantebe Chanice [No27] yavuze ko umugore yahawe agaciro abasha kwitinyuka ndetse anagira uruhare mu iterambere binyuze mu guhanganira imyanya ku isoko ryâ€™umurimo.
21:34: Musana Teta Hense [No26] yanyuze imbere yâ€™Akanama Nkemurampaka.
21:28: Mukangwije Rosine [No21] yabajijwe ku kijyanye nâ€™ikurwaho rya Visa ku baturage bo mu miryango ya Commonwealth na Francophonie.
Mukangwije yavuze ko bizongera abakerarugendo, bikazamura amadevize igihugu cyinjiza.
21:23: Marebe Benitha [No18] yasobanuye ko gahunda yo kumenyekanisha u Rwanda ya Visit Rwanda yazamuye ubukungu bwâ€™igihugu.
Yasabye Abanyarwanda gushyigikira iyo gahunda mu gukomeza kubaka igihugu nâ€™umurage wacyo.
21:21:Kirezi Rutaremara Brune [No17]. Yabajijwe impanuro bahawe nâ€™Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri yâ€™Ububanyi nâ€™Amahanga, Amb. Nduhungirehe Olivier, nâ€™icyo ayo masomo yabamariye.
Kirezi yavuze ko amasomo bahawe afasha umukobwa kurushaho gusobanukirwa igihugu no kumenya indangagaciro zikwiye kumuranga nkâ€™uzahagararira u Rwanda mu mahanga.
21:18: Kamikazi Rurangirwa Nadege [No15] yageze imbere yâ€™Akanama Nkemurampaka. Yavuze ko Nyampinga afata nkâ€™icyitegererezo ari Miss Mutesi Jolly watangije ibiganiro bihuza urubyiruko ndetse akaba ashyira imbaraga mu kubaka ubushobozi bwâ€™igitsinagore.
21:15: Irasubiza Alliance [No 11]. Yavuze ko impamvu Afurika idatera imbere ari ukubera imiyoborere mibi kuko umugabane ufite imitungo kamere ihagije yafasha umugabane kwiteza imbere.
21:11: Ingabire Rehema [No10] yabajijwe icyo azi ku barinzi bâ€™igihango. Yavuze ko ari ibikorwa byâ€™indashyikirwa biteza imbere ibijyanye nâ€™ubumwe nâ€™ubwiyunge.
21:07: Ingabire Gaudence [No8] yabajijwe ibyiciro byâ€™Intwari no kubitandukanya. Yavuze ko ubutwari bugaragaza umuntu witanga kandi uharanira kugera ku byiza abikoreye abandi. Yasobanuye ko hari ibyiciro bitatu byâ€™intwari birimo Imena, Ingenzi nâ€™Imanzi.
21:02: Ingabire Diane [No7] yavuze ko mu guhangana nâ€™abatera abangavu inda zitateganyijwe yasaba ko hakazwa ibihano ku basambanya abangavu.
20:59: Akaliza Hope [No 1] ni we mukobwa wa mbere wagize imbere yâ€™Akanama Nkemurampaka. Buri wese ari gutombora ikibazo mu biri mu gakangara. Nyuma yo gusuhuza abakagize yabajijwe uko abona izamuka ryâ€™ubukungu bwâ€™u Rwanda.
Ubukungu bwâ€™u Rwanda burazamuka bitewe no kuba igihugu gitekanye bigatuma abashoramari bashora imari mu gihugu.
Â 	Impinduka mu bagize Akanama Nkemurampaka
Mu bagize Akanama Nkemurampaka bazengurutse intara zose hamwe na Miss Rwanda 2020, Miss Mutesi Jolly ni we wenyine wagaragaye mu kanama nkemurampaka hose.
Usibye Jolly Mutesi ariko kandi Evelyne Umurerwa na we wagaragaye mu kanama nkemurampaka mu majonjora yabaye muri buri ntara yongeye kwinjiramo ku munsi wo gutanga ikamba.
Umunyamakuru ubifitemo uburambe Munyaneza James akaba akorera The New Times wari wagiriwe icyizere muri Pre-Selection yongeye kugarukamo.
Hinjiyemo kandi amaraso mashya nka Ntarindwa DiogÃ¨ne umunyarwenya wamenyekanye cyane nka Atome mu Rwanda.
Umubyinnyi mpuzamahanga wâ€™Umunyarwandakazi Sherrie Silver kuri iyi nshuro yinjiye mu kanama nkemurampaka.
Aba ni bo bagomba gutanga amanota aza gutanga Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda. Kugira ngo umukobwa yegukane ikamba haragenderwa ku bintu bitatu aribyo; Uburanga, Ubwenge nâ€™Umuco.
Ntalindwa DiogÃ¨ne wavuze mu izina ryâ€™abagize akanama nkemurampaka ka Miss Rwanda 2020 yavuze ko ubwiza butanga amanota 30, umushinga wâ€™umukobwa ugatanga amanota 40 nâ€™umuco ukabarirwa ku manota 30.
20:47: Abakobwa bahamagawe ku rubyiniro imbere yâ€™Akanama Nkemurampaka. Aba bakobwa bambaye amapantalo yâ€™umukara nâ€™imipira yâ€™umukara ya Miss Rwanda. Hari guseruka babiri babiri, abafana bari kubakiriza amashyi yâ€™urufaya nâ€™induru nyinshi ku buryo byagorana kumenya ushyigikiwe cyane.
Mu byo bari kugaragaza harimo ibyo batojwe mu gihe cyâ€™umwiherero bamazemo ibyumweru bibiri.
Video: Uko abakobwa baserutse muri Miss Rwanda 2020
20:33: Abashyushyarugamba bâ€™ibi birori bageze ku rubyiniro
Abanyamakuru Nzeyimana Luckman na Martina Shami Abera bakora kuri KC2, Ishami rya kabiri rya Televiziyo yâ€™u Rwanda batanze ikaze ku bitabiriye ibirori bya Miss Rwanda.
Batangiye bavuga uko urugendo rwo guhitamo abakobwa rwatangiye kugeza uyu munsi wanone, hasigayemo 19 bahataniye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020.
Â 	Ba Nyampinga bafite amakamba yâ€™umwaka ushize biteguye kutayanga
Abakobwa begukanye amakamba mu mwaka ushize biteguye kuyashyikiriza bagenzi babo bari buseruke neza.
Uhereye ibumoso hari Mwiseneza Josiane wabaye Miss Popularity 2019, Kabahenda Ricca Michaella wabaye Nyampinga wâ€™Umuco 2019, Muyango Claudine wahawe ikamba rya Nyampinga uberwa nâ€™amafoto 2019, Uwase Sangwa Odille wabaye Igisonga cya Kabiri 2019 na Uwihirwe Yasipi Casimir wabaye Igisonga cya Mbere 2019.
Â 	 Video: Uko byari byifashe mbere yo gutangira ibirori byo gutanga ikamba rya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda 2020
Â 	Ibyamamare byitabiriye Miss Rwanda ku bwinshi
Ibyamamare mu ngeri zitandukanye byatangiye kugera mu cyumba kigiye kuberamo irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020.
Ijisho ryâ€™umufotozi wa IGIHE ryabonye bamwe barimo Umunyarwandakazi Sherrie Silver umaze kubaka izina mu mbyino ku Isi yose.
Â 	Nishimwe Naomie yasoje amatora ari ku isonga
Mu matora yaba ayo kuri nternet no kuri SMS yarangiye saa moya zâ€™umugoroba kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 22 Gashyantare 2020. Yarangiye Nishimwe Naomie ariwe uyoboye abandi mu majwi.
Kuri internet Nishimwe Naomie yabaye uwa mbere nâ€™amajwi 92 756 naho kuri SMS ayoboye abandi nâ€™amajwi 79 756.
Â 	Umuteguro ni wose, umuziki ukomeje kubyinwa
19:53: Abafana benshi bamaze kwinjira mu Intare Conference Arena. Umuriri uri hejuru cyane, amajwi yâ€™abafana ari kumvikana baririmba amazina yâ€™abakobwa bari inyuma.
Urubyiniro abakobwa bahagararaho basobanura imishinga yabo rwateguwe, rwarimbishijwe nâ€™indabo nziza ziri mu mabara atandukanye.
Muri aka kanya ibirori ntibiratangira, Iradukunda Grace Divine [Dj Ira] ni we uri gususurutsa abaje kureba Miss Rwanda 2020 mu miziki itandukanye irimo iyâ€™Abanyarwanda nâ€™iyo muri Amerika.
Â 	Imodoka ihabwa Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda yagejejwe mu Intare Arena
Imodoka ihabwa Miss Rwanda 2020 yagejejwe mu Intare Arena, mbere yuko ibirori bitangira imodoka yo mu bwoko bwa Suzuki Swift ihembwa Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda 2020 yamaze kwinjizwa ahari kubera ibi birori itwikiriwe.
Iyi modoka ifite agaciro ka miliyoni 18 zâ€™amafaranga yâ€™u Rwanda yatanzwe nâ€™Uruganda rwa Africa Improved Foods ari nayo izahemba Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda 800 000 Frw buri kwezi mu gihe cyâ€™umwaka azamarana ikamba.
Â 	Intare Arena niyo Nimwiza Meghan yambikiwemo ikamba amaranye umwaka
Inyubako ya Intare Arena niyo yakiriye ibirori byatangiwemo ikamba rya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda wa 2019, ryegukanywe na Nimwiza Meghan ku mugoroba wo ku wa 26 Mutarama 2019.
Â 	Rwarutabura wa Rayon Sports ashyigikiye Umutesi Denise
Ngenzahimana Bosco [Rwarutabura]umenyerewe nkâ€™umufana ukomeye wa Rayon Sports ari mu bashyigikiye Umutesi Denise [No43].
Rwarutabura witabiriye Miss Rwanda avuye kwa muganga nyuma yo gukubitwa agakomeretswa ku mugoroba wo ku wa 21 Gashyantare 2020, yabwiye IGIHE ko yemeye kuza gushyigikira mushiki wâ€™inshuti yâ€™umuryango we.
18:30: Abantu batangiye kwinjira mu Intare Conference Arena ahagiye kubera irushanwa rya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda. Hari gucurangwa indirimbo zitandukanye ari nako abafana benshi bazibyina bagaragaza akanyamuneza.
Â 	Ababyeyi, inshuti nâ€™abavandimwe bâ€™abakobwa bahatana babubekereye
Imihanda myinshi iri kwerekeza i Rusororo ku Intare Arena ahatangarizwa Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda 2020.
Abitabiriye ibi birori bashyiriweho imodoka zibakura kuri Stade Amahoro i Remera zibageza i Rusororo.
Mu masaha ya saa Kumi nâ€™imwe, abantu benshi bageze aho irushanwa ribera, baserutse bafite ibyapa biriho amazina yâ€™abakobwa bashyigikiye bifuza ko aribo bakwambikwa ikamba.
Urebye ku maso yabo bifitiye icyizere, bambariye gushyigikira abakobwa babo no kuza kubabona bashinjagirana isheja bambikwa ikamba.
Usibye ibyapa, bambaye imipira iriho amazina nâ€™amafoto yâ€™abo bashyigikiye. Bicaye ahantu hamwe ku buryo umuriri wabo ushobora gusakara ukagera kuri benshi mu bateraniye mu Intare Arena.
Irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020 ryatangiriye mu Karere ka Rubavu ku wa 21 Ukuboza 2019, ahatoranyirijwe abakobwa batandatu bemerewe guhagararira Intara yâ€™Uburengerazuba; ku wa 28 Ukuboza 2019 mu Karere ka Musanze hatoranyijwe abakobwa batandatu bahagarariye Amajyaruguru.
Umwaka wa 2020 watangiye irushanwa rikomereza mu Karere ka Huye aho ku wa 4 Mutarama havuye abakobwa barindwi bahagarariye Amajyepfo. Ijonjora ryâ€™ibanze mu ntara ryasorejwe mu Karere ka Kayonza, ahavuye abakobwa 15 bahagarariye Uburasirazuba mu gihe ku wa 18 Mutarama 2020, abakobwa 20 batoranyirijwe guhagararira Umujyi wa Kigali.
Mu bakobwa 400 bose bageze ahabereye ijonjora ryâ€™ibanze, 54 gusa ni bo bemeje abagize akanama nkemurampaka bemererwa gukomeza mu cyiciro cya nyuma cyasize havuyemo 20 bagiye mu mwiherero wâ€™ibyumweru bibiri wabereye muri La Palisse Hotel i Nyamata.
Abakobwa 20 batangiye umwiherero ku wa 9 Gashyantare 2020, ariko Ingabire Jolie Ange ntiyagize amahirwe yo gukomeza kuko yasezeye mu irushanwa kubera uburwayi.
Irushanwa ryâ€™ubwiza mu Rwanda ryatangiye mu 1993 icyo gihe Nyampinga yabaye Miss Uwera Dalila, ryambitswe Bahati Grace mu 2009, mu 2012 rihabwa Kayibanda Mutesi Aurore, mu 2014 ryambikwa Akiwacu Colombe, Kundwa Doriane arihabwa mu 2015, Mutesi Jolly atorwa mu 2016, Iradukunda Elsa afata irya 2017, irya 2018 ryahawe Iradukunda Liliane mu gihe iriheruka mu 2019 ryatwawe na Nimwiza Meghan.

Title: Alpha Blondy yasezeranye imbere yâ€™Imana nâ€™umunyamakuru ukora kuri radiyo ye
Body:
Seydou KonÃ© waryubatse nka Alpha Blondy mu muziki wa CÃ´te dâ€™Ivoire yasezeranye mu rusengero nâ€™umunya-Tuniziya Aelysa Darragi usanzwe ari umunyamakuru kuri radiyo ye â€˜Bl Alpha Blondy FMâ€™.
Seydou KonÃ© waryubatse nka Alpha Blondy mu muziki wa CÃ´te dâ€™Ivoire yasezeranye mu rusengero nâ€™umunya-Tuniziya Aelysa Darragi usanzwe ari umunyamakuru kuri radiyo ye â€˜Bl Alpha Blondy FMâ€™.
Muri Mata 2019 nibwo urukundo rwa Alpha Blondy na Aelysa Darragi rwashinze imizi ubwo bakoraga ubukwe bwa mbere gakondo. Muri Nyakanga 2019 aba babyaranye umwana wâ€™umuhungu.
Ku wa Kane tariki 20 Gashyantare 2020 bakaba barasezeranye imbere yâ€™Imana mu musigiti wa Riviera Golf.
Alpha Blondy yari asanzwe afite umuryango ndetse ibinyamakuru byâ€™iwabo bihamya ko afite abana 11 harimo babiri bakorana mu buzima bwa buri munsi na batatu bihebeye umuziki nka we.
Alpha Blondy yabonye izuba ku wa 01 Mutarama 1953, avukira i Dombokro. Ni umuhanzi wiyeguriye injyana ya Reggae wâ€™umuririmbyi nâ€™umwanditsi wâ€™indirimbo, yubatse izina mu gihe amaze mu muziki.
Indirimbo ze yazubakiye kuri Politiki nâ€™ubuzima busanzwe, aziririmba mu ndimi zitandukanye zirimo; Dioula, Igifaransa nâ€™Icyongereza rimwe na rimwe akanakoresha Icyarabu.
Alpha Brondy yakunzwe mu ndirimbo zitandukanye nka "Guerre Civile", "Jerusalemâ€, â€œBrigadier Sabariâ€, "Journalistes en danger" nâ€™izindi. Mu bihe bitandukanye yagiye agera mu Rwanda mu bitaramo nâ€™ibirori yabaga yatumiwemo nka Kigali Up Music Festival nâ€™ibindi.
Amaze gushyira hanze album nka: Jah Glory! (1982), Cocody Rock!!! (1984), Apartheid Is Nazism (1985), JÃ©rusalem (1986), Revolution (1987), The Prophets (1989), S.O.S Guerre Tribale (1991) nâ€™izindi.

Title: Babou agiye gusubukura ibyâ€™umuziki nyuma yo kurangiza amashuri yisumbuye (Video)
Body:
Shema Arnaud benshi bamenye nka Babou nyuma yâ€™uko arangije amasomo mu mashuri yisumbuye yahishuye ko agiye gusubukura ibyâ€™umuziki cyane ko yari yabaye abihagaritse kubera kwiga.
Shema Arnaud benshi bamenye nka Babou nyuma yâ€™uko arangije amasomo mu mashuri yisumbuye yahishuye ko agiye gusubukura ibyâ€™umuziki cyane ko yari yabaye abihagaritse kubera kwiga.
Mu myaka yatambutse abagiye bakurikiranira hafi ibya muzika bamenye uwari umwana witwa Babou wamenyekanye cyane mu njyana ya Hip Hop.
Mu 2017 uyu musore yaje kuburirwa irengero mu muziki we gusa we ahamya ko byatewe nâ€™uko yari ahugiye mu masomo.
Uyu musore warangije amasomo ye mu mwaka wa 2019 muri St Andre i Nyamirambo, aho yize imibare, ubugenge nâ€™ubumenyi bwâ€™Isi, akaba umwe mu bategereje amanota yavuye mu kizamini cya Leta yakoze.
Babou yatangiye umuziki afite imyaka umunani urukundo rwawo arukomoye kuri nyirarume Jerome Peterson wabarizwaga muri TFP Crew yari igizwe nâ€™abahanzi batandukanye.
Avuga uko yinjiye mu muziki yagize atiâ€ Nigeze kujya mu gitaramo cyarimo marume, ndeba uburyo baririmbye abantu bakishima dutashye mubwira ko mbishaka ansaba ko ngomba gutsinda neza mu mashuri abanza kugira ngo anyemerere kubijyamo. Mbaye uwa mbere icyo gihe nibwo yanyandikiye indirimbo aranayinkoreshereza.â€
Babou avuga ko icyo gihe yafashijwe cyane na nyirarume ndetse nâ€™itsinda ryâ€™abo bakoranaga muri TFP.
Uyu musore yavuze ko ubwo yari agiye mu mwaka wa kane wâ€™amashuri yisumbuye aribwo yahisemo kuba aretse ibyâ€™umuziki kugira ngo ahe umwanya amasomo ye.
Nyuma yo gusoza ibyo kwiga amashuri yisumbuye, Babou yabwiye IGIHE ko agiye gusubukura ibyâ€™umuziki ndetse mu gihe cya vuba azashyira hanze indirimbo ye nshya.
Kugeza ubu uyu musore aracyakorana bya hafi na nyirarume Peterson nâ€™ubundi wamwinjije mu muziki.
Babou avuga ko umuziki wâ€™u Rwanda kugeza ubu uhagaze neza, wateye imbere ndetse harimo amahirwe menshi yaba mu buryo abahanzi binjiza amafaranga ndetse nâ€™ibikorwa remezo bituma abahanzi bakora neza mu buryo bworoshye.
Uyu muraperi wamenyekanye akiri umwana yashimiye buri wese wamubaye hafi akinjira mu muziki yaba abahanzi, abanyamakuru ndetse nâ€™abakunzi bâ€™umuziki bamuhaye icyizere cyabo, anabasaba kuzongera kumwakirana yombi mu gihe azaba agarutse.
Babou yamenyekanye cyane mu bwana bwe aho yafatwaga nkâ€™umuraperi ukiri muto, aha akaba yari afite indirimbo zinyuranye zirimo iyitwa; Rimwe kabiri, Do it, Njye na Muzika yakoranye na Tuff Gang nâ€™izindi nyinshi yaririmbye zirimo Arambona agaseka yaririmbye.
Babou yavuze ko agiye gusubukura umuziki
Njye na muzika Babou yakoranye na Tuff Gangs

Title: Nyampinga wa Botswana, Sudani yâ€™Epfo na Ghana bitabiriye ibirori bya Miss Rwanda 2020
Body:
Oweditse Phirinyane wo muri Botswana, Rebecca Nana Adwoa Kwabi wo muri Ghana uyu wazanye nâ€™igisonga cye cya kabiri Princess Owusua Gyamfi na Mariah Nyayeina wo muri Sudan yâ€™Amajyepfo baraye i Kigali bitabiriye irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020.
Oweditse Phirinyane wo muri Botswana, Rebecca Nana Adwoa Kwabi wo muri Ghana uyu wazanye nâ€™igisonga cye cya kabiri Princess Owusua Gyamfi na Mariah Nyayeina wo muri Sudan yâ€™Amajyepfo baraye i Kigali bitabiriye irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020.
Usibye Oweditse Phirinyane Nyampinga wa Botswana yageze i Kigali ku mugoroba wo ku wa Kane tariki 20 Gashyantare 2020, aba bakobwa bandi bageze i Kigali mu bihe bitandukanye byo kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 21 Gashyantare 2020 aho bitabiriye umuhango wo gutanga ikamba muri Miss Rwanda 2020.
Ku mugoroba wâ€™uyu munsi nibwo Mariah Nyayeina, Nyampinga wa Sudani yâ€™Epfo na we yageze mu Rwanda.
Uwanyuma wageze mu Rwanda ni Nyampinga wa Ghana, Rebecca Nana Adwoa Kwabi wabaye uwa gatanu witabiriye Miss Rwanda 2020.
Aba bose bahasanze Oliver Nakakande wo muri Uganda ndetse na Sylivia Sebastian wo muri Tanzania bahageze mbere yâ€™abandi.
Miss Rwanda 2020 niyo ya mbere yitabiriwe nâ€™abakobwa bo mu bindi bihugu.
Irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020 riri kugana ku musozo, abakobwa bahatanira ikamba bari mu mwiherero mbere yâ€™iminsi mike ngo hamenyekane uzegukana ikamba. Ubu basigaye ari 19, nyuma yâ€™uko Ingabire Jolie Ange yasezeye mu irushanwa kubera uburwayi.
Amatike yo kwinjira mu birori bizatangarizwamo Miss Rwanda 2020 yamaze gushyirwa ku isoko, abayashaka bashobora kuyagura bifashishije Mobile Money (*182*8*1*333111#), Ecobank cyangwa bakayasanga kuri Camellia muri KBC, Keza Saloon no kuri Smart Design.

Title: Abakobwa bari muri Miss Rwanda bahishuye agahinda batewe na Ingabire wavuyemo kubera uburwayi
Body:
Hagati mu mwiherero wa Miss Rwanda 2020 nibwo umwe mu bakobwa bahataniraga ikamba Ingabire Ange Jolie yasabye ubuyobozi ko yasezera mu irushanwa kuko yari yahuye nâ€™uburwayi bwamusabaga kuba kwa muganga akitabwaho ari mu bitaro.
Hagati mu mwiherero wa Miss Rwanda 2020 nibwo umwe mu bakobwa bahataniraga ikamba Ingabire Ange Jolie yasabye ubuyobozi ko yasezera mu irushanwa kuko yari yahuye nâ€™uburwayi bwamusabaga kuba kwa muganga akitabwaho ari mu bitaro.
Tariki 17 Gashyantare 2020 nibwo ubuyobozi bwa Miss Rwanda bwatangaje ko Ingabire yavuye mu irushanwa kubera uburwayi.
Nyuma yâ€™iminsi avuye mu irushanwa abakobwa bahataniraga ikamba rya Miss Rwanda babwiye IGIHE ko bababajwe nâ€™uyu mugenzi wabo utarabashije gukomeza guhatana kubera impamvu zâ€™uburwayi.
Benshi muri aba bakobwa bahishuye ko ryari ijoro ribi cyane igihe basezeraga kuri Ingabire. Bahamya ko bababajwe nuko ibyamubayeho ari impamvu zatunguranye kandi nta yandi mahitamo bari bafite.
Ikindi aba bakobwa uko ari 19 bahurizaho ni uburyo Ingabire yababaniye neza mu mwiherero ku buryo kuvamo kwe byabaye agahinda gakomeye.
Kirezi Rutaremara Brune umwe mu bahatanira ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020 yagize ati â€Jolie Ange sinzi uko namuvuga; aritonda, mu bantu nabonaga bashoboraga gutwara nâ€™ikamba na we yari arimo. Kumva ko avuye mu irushanwa atari iyindi mpamvu ari uburwayi, njye ku giti cyanjye byarambabaje.â€
Uyu mukobwa avuga ko bose byabababaje cyane ku buryo iyo baganira muri rusange basanga iyaba hari ikindi cyashobokaga bari kugikora ariko byarenze ubushobozi bwabo.
Teta Ndenga Nicole wiganye na Ingabire mu mashuri yisumbuye we yavuze ko yababajwe bikomeye nuko uyu mukobwa wâ€™inshuti ye yavuye mu irushanwa.
Akaliza Hope yavuze ko Ingabire ari umukobwa wakundaga kubatera imbaraga kenshi kabone nâ€™iyo babaga bari gukora ibintu bigoye akababwira ko we yumva ntacyo bimutwaye.
Aba bakobwa bose bababajwe no kuva mu irushanwa kwa mugenzi wabo bamusabira gukira akamera neza ariko kandi akanihanganira ibyabaye bamwibutsa ko atari ryo herezo ryâ€™ubuzima.
Ingabire Jolie Ange yasezeye mu irushanwa nyuma yuko yari yaryinjiyemo atsindiye guhagararira Intara yâ€™Amajyepfo.
Itike yakuye mu Ntara yâ€™Amajyepfo niyo yamwinjije muri Pre-Selection, aha naho yahanyuranye umucyo bituma yinjira muri 20 berekeje mu mwiherero.
Uyu mukobwa yasezeye muri Miss Rwanda nyuma yâ€™icyumweru yari amaze mu mwiherero uri kubera La Palisse Hotel i Nyamata. Kuri ubu abakobwa basigaye bahatanira ikamba bakaba ari 19.
Umukobwa uzambikwa ikamba rya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda 2020 uzasimbura Nimwiza Meghan ufite irya 2019, azamenyekana mu birori biteganyijwe kubera muri Intare Conference Arena i Rusororo mu ijoro ryo ku wa 22 Gashyantare 2020.

Title: The Ben yasinye amasezerano yâ€™imikoranire na Onomo Hotel yiyemeje kumushyigikira mu muziki we
Body:
Mugisha Benjamin wamamaye mu muziki nka The Ben yasinye amasezerano yâ€™imikoranire na Onomo Hotel yiyemeje kumushyigikira mu muziki we.
Mugisha Benjamin wamamaye mu muziki nka The Ben yasinye amasezerano yâ€™imikoranire na Onomo Hotel yiyemeje kumushyigikira mu muziki we.
Aya masezerano yasinyiwe kuri Onomo Hotel iherereye mu Mujyi wa Kigali, ku gicamunsi cyo kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 21 Gashyantare 2020.
Umuyobozi wa Onomo Hotel i Kigali, Emile Nizey, yabwiye itangazamakuru ko bishimiye guha ikaze The Ben mu mikoranire bagiye kugirana.
Yavuze ko amasezerano bagiranye ashingiye mu gushyigikira uyu muhanzi mu bikorwa bye bya muzika yaba mu Rwanda no ku rwego mpuzamahanga cyane cyane mu bihugu 18 iyi hoteli ifitemo amashami.
Yavuze ko bazashyigikira bishoboka umuziki wa The Ben mu rwego rwo guteza imbere uyu musore nkâ€™umuhanzi wâ€™Umunyarwanda bifuza gushyiramo imbaraga kugira ngo arusheho gutera imbere.
Ku ruhande rwa The Ben we avuga ko azaba yamamaza anamenyekanisha ibikorwa bya Onomo Hotel.
The Ben yavuze ko yanyuzwe nâ€™imikoranire yemeranyijeho na Onomo Hotel ndetse anayishimira gahunda nziza bafitanye.
Amasezerano ahuriweho nâ€™impande zombi nta gihe cyashyizweho agomba kurangiriraho, ahubwo naba atagitanga inyungu zihuriweho azashyirwaho iherezo.
The Ben abajijwe niba hari amafaranga yahawe nâ€™umubare wayo, yagize ati â€Amafaranga nibyo arahari ariko twahisemo kuyagira ibanga.â€
Ku kijyanye no gukorana na hoteli iri mu Rwanda nyamara ubusanzwe yibera muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, The Ben yavuze ko ntaho bizahurira kuko uburyo azakorana nayo ari ibintu ashobora gukorera ahantu hose azaba ari.
Nizey yifashishije urugero mu gushimangira iyo mikorere yavuze ko â€ Wenda hari igihe yajya muri Tanzania, Afurika yâ€™Epfo nâ€™ahandi dufite amashami. Iki gihe aba yizeye ko nta kibazo agira cyâ€™aho kuba nâ€™uburyo bwo kubaho kimwe nâ€™ikipe ye. Tuzamufasha muri buri kimwe dushoboye.â€
Mbere yo gusinyana amasezerano na Onomo Hotel, The Ben yijeje abanyamakuru ko abona ubu bufatanye buzamufasha mu iterambere rya muzika ye cyane ko bizanamufasha ku rwego mpuzamahanga bikagabanya ingorane yahuraga nazo.
The Ben yavukiye i Kampala muri Uganda ku wa 9 Mutarama 1988. Ni mwene Jean Mbonimpa na Esther Mbabazi. Ni uwa kabiri mu muryango wâ€™abana batandatu barimo nka Danny Scott (na we wabaye umuhanzi, ananyura mu itsinda rya B Gun), Green P (umuraperi wamamariye muri Tuff Gangz) nâ€™abandi.
Uyu muhanzi Nyarwanda uririmba injyana ya RnB/Pop. Yatangiye impano yâ€™ubuhanzi abihereye mu muryango aho yakuze akundishwa nâ€™ababyeyi be gusenga cyane.
Byatumye ajya muri korali aho yari ari kumwe nâ€™abandi bahanzi bamenyekanye nka Meddy, Lick Lick na Nicolas.
Indirimbo yazamuye izina rye ni â€˜â€˜Amaso ku Masoâ€™â€™ yasohoye mu 2008. Izindi ndirimbo zizwi ni â€˜â€˜Si bezaâ€™â€™ na â€˜â€˜Mbwiraâ€™â€™ yahuriyemo na Tom Close; â€˜â€˜Uzaba Uzaâ€™â€™ yaririmbanye na Roger, â€˜â€˜Wiriraâ€™â€™, â€˜â€˜Imfubyiâ€™â€™ yahuriyemo na Bull Dogg, â€˜â€˜Wigendaâ€™â€™, â€˜â€˜Uri heâ€™â€™, â€˜â€˜Sinzibagirwaâ€™â€™, â€˜â€˜Amahirwe ya nyumaâ€™â€™ na â€˜â€˜Zubedaâ€™â€™.
Nyuma yaho yaje no gusohora indirimbo nka â€˜â€˜Ese nibyoâ€™â€™ mbere yo kwerekeza muri Amerika aho yakomereje ubuhanzi bwe.
Ubu akunzwe mu ndirimbo zâ€™urukundo zirimo nka â€˜â€˜Ko Nahindutseâ€™â€™, â€˜â€˜Urabarutaâ€™â€™, "Ndajeâ€™â€™, â€˜â€˜Habibiâ€™â€™, â€˜â€˜Ntacyadutanyaâ€™â€™, â€˜â€˜Only Youâ€™â€™, â€˜â€˜Iâ€™m In Loveâ€™â€™, â€˜â€˜Canâ€™t get enoughâ€™â€™ yakoranye na Otile Brown wo muri Kenya nâ€™izindi.
Ni umwe mu bahanzi bake bâ€™Abanyarwanda babashije kwagura umuziki wabo ukamenyekana no mu bindi bihugu.

Title: Miss Rwanda 2020: Ibyo abakobwa bazakumbura mu mwiherero nâ€™umushinga wa buri wese (Video)
Body:
Abakobwa 19 bari kurangiza umwiherero wa Miss Rwanda 2020 mu gihe bitegura umunsi wa nyuma wâ€™irushanwa uzatanga Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda wa 2020.
Abakobwa 19 bari kurangiza umwiherero wa Miss Rwanda 2020 mu gihe bitegura umunsi wa nyuma wâ€™irushanwa uzatanga Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda wa 2020.
Aba bakobwa babaye 19 nyuma yâ€™uko mugenzi wabo Ingabire Jolie Ange atabashije gukomeza cyane ko yasezeye kubera uburwayi bwamutunguye bugatuma atabasha gukomeza irushanwa.
Aba bakobwa uko ari 19 bose twabasuye mu mwiherero tuganira ku bintu binyuranye birimo uko bari babayeho mu mwiherero, ibyo bazawukumburamo nâ€™incamake ku mishinga yabo.
Mu biganiro nâ€™aba bakobwa bose bahuriza ku kuba bazakumbura umwiherero wa Miss Rwanda kuko bari babanye neza, babayeho nkâ€™umuryango.
Akaliza Hope yagize ati â€œNzakumbura abakobwa tubana muri rusange, uko twasangiraga, uko twagendanaga mbega ni byinshi.â€
Musana Teta Hense nawe uri mu bahatana muri Miss Rwanda 2020 yavuze ko azakumbura bagenzi be, ibiganiro bahabwaga nâ€™ibindi.
Ati â€œNzakumbura aba bakobwa twabanye, buri wese afite umwihariko we. Nzakumbura ibiganiro byari byiza. Kubona amahirwe yo kubona abayobozi batuganiriza nzabikumbura.â€
Nishimwe Naomie na we yagize ati â€œIkintu nzakumbura ni ugusangira nijoro nâ€™abandi bakobwa ubundi tukaza kumva gahunda zâ€™undi munsi turi kuririmba nzabikumbura cyane.â€
Imishinga yabo
Ikirezi Rutaremara Brune yavuze ko afite umushinga wo gufasha abanyarwanda bafite ubumuga bwo mu mutwe. Ingabire Rehma we afite umushinga wo guteza imbere imibereho ya mwarimu.
Teta Ndenga Nicole yavuze ko afite umushinga wo gukangurira abanyarwanda nâ€™urubyiruko guhinga ibiti byâ€™imbuto. Akaliza Hope we yavuze ko umushinga we ushingiye ku gukangurira abana bâ€™abakobwa kwitabira kwiga ubukerarugendo.
Mutesi Denise afite umushinga wo kugabanya umubare wâ€™abantu badafite akazi mu gihugu cyâ€™u Rwanda. Umutesi Denise umushinga we ni uguteza imbere uburenganzira bwâ€™abaguzi.
Mutegwantebe Chanice afite umushinga wo guhuriza hamwe abantu batishoboye basabiriza ku mihanda mu rwego rwo kubafasha kwiteza imbere.
Nishimwe Naomie afite umushinga wo kurwanya ubwigunge mu rubyiruko. Musana Teta Hense we umushinga we ni ukurwanya kanseri mu Rwanda.
Umuratwa Anitha umushinga we ni ugufasha abana kubyaza impano zabo umusaruro cyane cyane siporo. Marebe Benitha umushinga afite umushinga wo kubaka ubushobozi bwâ€™urubyiruko rufite ubumuga.
Irasubiza Alliance umushinga we ni ukurwanya inda zâ€™imburagihe mu bana bakiri bato bari munsi yâ€™imyaka 18.
Ingabire Diane afite umushinga wo kurwanya ibiyobyabwenge cyane cyane mu rubyiruko. Uwase Aisha we afite umushinga wo gukangurira abahuye nâ€™ihohoterwa kutariceceka.
Mukangwije Rosine afite umushinga wo gushishikariza urubyiruko kwiteza imbere binyuze mu kwikorera.
Nyinawumuntu Delice we afite umushinga wo gushishikariza abana bâ€™abakobwa kwiga siyansi nâ€™ikoranabuhanga. Ingabire Gaudance afite umushinga wo gushishikariza urubyiriko kwitabira ubukerarugendo bwâ€™imbere mu gihugu mu gihe Umwiza Phionah afite umusinga wo kurwanya ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina rikorerwa abana bari munsi yâ€™imyaka 18.
Kamikazi Rurangirwa Nadege we afite umushinga wo kwita kubana bafite indwara izwi nka â€œDown Syndromeâ€ no guhugura imiryango yabo uburyo babitaho. Ni indwara ifata umwana ukiri mu nda ya nyina. Ishobora gutuma umwana avuka hari uduce twâ€™umubiri tumwe na tumwe abuze cyangwa se mu mutwe he hadakora nkâ€™ibisanzwe.
Kugeza ubu irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020 riri kugana ku musozo abakobwa bahatanira ikamba bari mu mwiherero mbere yâ€™amasaha make ngo hamenyekane uzegukana ikamba.
Aba bakobwa bari mu mwiherero bamaze kuvamo umwe cyane ko ubu basigaye ari 19 nyuma yâ€™uko Ingabire Jolie Ange asezeye mu irushanwa kubera uburwayi.
Umukobwa uzambikwa ikamba rya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda 2020 uzasimbura Nimwiza Meghan ufite irya 2019, azamenyekana mu birori biteganyijwe kubera muri Intare Conference Arena i Rusororo mu ijoro ryo ku wa 22 Gashyantare 2020.
Kugeza ubu amatike yo kwinjira mu irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020 yashyizwe ku isoko; abayashaka bashobora kuyagura bifashishije Mobile Money (*182*8*1*333111#), Ecobank cyangwa bakayasanga kuri Camellia KBC, Keza Saloon no kuri Smart Design.

Title: Abakobwa batabashije gukomeza muri Miss Rwanda 2020 bakomereje ibikorwa byâ€™urukundo mu Karere ka Gisagara
Body:
Nyuma yo kwiyemeza kwihuriza hamwe bagakora ibikorwa byâ€™urukundo, abakobwa 34 batabashije kurenga ijonjora rya nyuma (Pre-Selection) ryâ€™irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020 bakomeje gushyira mu bikorwa imishinga bari barateguye.
Nyuma yo kwiyemeza kwihuriza hamwe bagakora ibikorwa byâ€™urukundo, abakobwa 34 batabashije kurenga ijonjora rya nyuma (Pre-Selection) ryâ€™irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020 bakomeje gushyira mu bikorwa imishinga bari barateguye.
Abo bakobwa bibumbiye mu itsinda â€œWe for the Nationâ€ kuri uyu wa Kane tariki ya 20 Gashyantare 2020 bakomereje ibyo bikorwa mu Karere ka Gisagara aho baganirije urubyiruko rwâ€™abanyeshuri ku gukumira gusambanya abana ndetse no kurwanya inda zâ€™imburagihe ziterwa abangavu.
Ni nyuma yâ€™uko ku wa 13 Gashyantare 2020 basuye ikigo kirererwamo abana bafite ubumuga cya HVP Gatagara i Gikondo ho mu mujyi wa Kigali; aho baganiriye nâ€™ubuyobozi bwabasobanuriye ibikorwa bihakorerwa buri munsi ndetse banagira umwanya wo kwifatanya nâ€™abana baharererwa yaba mu gusangira ndetse no kwidagadurana.
Gaju Evelyne uhagarariye iryo tsinda yavuze ko bahisemo kuganiriza urubyiruko ku ngingo yo gusambanya abana no gukumira inda ziterwa abangavu kuko ari ikibazo gihangayikishije muri iki gihe.
Ati â€œBuri mukobwa muri twe yari afite umushinga we; uyu wo gukumira inda zitateganyijwe ni imwe muri iyo mishinga. Gusa ikibazo cyâ€™abana basabanywa ndetse nâ€™icyâ€™abangavu baterwa inda kirahangayikishije ni yo mpamvu twiyemeje gutanga umusanzu mu kuzikumira tuganiriza urubyiruko.â€
Kuri ubu itsinda â€œWe for the Nationâ€ rigizwe nâ€™abakobwa 34 ariko abaje kuganiriza urubyiruko mu Karere ka Gisagara ni 10 kuko bagenzi babo bari mu bindi bikorwa birimo kwiga nâ€™ibindi.
Mu Karere ka Gisagara baganirije urubyiruko rwâ€™abanyeshuri biga kuri GS Saint Philippe Neri hamwe nâ€™abiga kuri Saint Eugenie Smet aho bari bahuriye ku kibuga cyâ€™umupira wâ€™amaguru kuko ayo mashuri yombi yari yakinnye.
Igihozo Dianne watanze ikiganiro yagarutse ku ngaruka zo gusambanya abana no gutwara inda imburagihe, asaba urubyiruko kwirinda ibishuko bishobora kubashora mu busambanyi.
Yagize ati â€œCyane cyane nkamwe bâ€™abanyeshuri na twe twese akenshi hari igihe badushukishaga amandazi, bombo, amafaranga nâ€™ibindi. Icya mbere ni uko abana bâ€™abakobwa tugomba kumenya ko dufite agaciro tukirinda abadushuka.â€
Yabibukije ko umukobwa usambanyijwe agaterwa inda bimugiraho ingaruka mbi zitandukanye bikamwicira ejo hazaza.
Ati â€œMuri mwe harimo abazaba Abadepite; Abaminisitiri cyangwa mukazayobora mu bundi buryo. Mureke twirinde ibishuko bitwicira ejo hazaza.â€
Nyuma yâ€™ibiganiro byatanzwe urubyiruko rwahawe umwanya wo kubaza ibibazo bitandukanye byibanze ku buzima bwâ€™imyororokere.
Umukozi ushinzwe uburinganire nâ€™iterambere ryâ€™umuryango mu Karere ka Gisagara, Sewabo Vincent, ni we wabakiriye ashima ibikorwa byabo abizeza ubufatanye.
Ati â€œNi byiza kuko biraza gutuma hari icyo twunguka mu kugabanya imibare yâ€™abana bakomeje gusabanywa mu karere.â€
Sewabo yavuze ko mu mezi 11 ashize mu Karere ka Gisagara hagaragaye abangavu bagera kuri 214 bari munsi yâ€™imyaka 17 batewe inda imburagihe.
Urubyiruko rwagiriwe inama yo kudahishira abasore nâ€™abagabo basambanya abangavu kuko babicira ubuzima bityo bakwiye guhanwa byâ€™intangarugero kugira ngo abandi babonereho hatazagira utekereza kongera guhirahira asambanya umwangavu.
Gaju Evelyne uhagarariye â€œWe for the Nationâ€ yavuze ko bishimiye uko igikorwa bateguye mu Karere ka Gisagara cyagenze bityo byabongereye imbaraga zo gukomeza ibyo biyemeje.
Yavuze ko bashinze uwo muryango bagamije gukora ibikorwa byâ€™urukundo nkâ€™uko bari babyiyemeje ubwo bitabiraga irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020 bityo biteguye no kwakira umufatanyabikorwa wese waza kubashyigikira.

Title: Niyo Bosco yasohoye indirimbo nshya yise â€œIbangaâ€
Body:
Niyo Bosco umaze kubaka izina mu mitima ya benshi mu bakunzi bâ€™umuziki wâ€™u Rwanda kuri ubu yasohoye indirimbo ye nshya yise â€œIbangaâ€ ikurikira â€œUbigenza ute?â€ uyu musore yaherukaga gushyira hanze.
Niyo Bosco umaze kubaka izina mu mitima ya benshi mu bakunzi bâ€™umuziki wâ€™u Rwanda kuri ubu yasohoye indirimbo ye nshya yise â€œIbangaâ€ ikurikira â€œUbigenza ute?â€ uyu musore yaherukaga gushyira hanze.
Indirimbo â€œIbangaâ€ ya Niyo Bosco ikubiyemo ubutumwa bukangurira abantu kugira ibanga, agaragazamo ingaruka zikunze kuba ku bantu batarigira.
Mu nyikirizo yâ€™iyi ndirimbo uyu muhanzi agira ati â€Ibanga ni igihamya cyemeza ko uri umwizerwa, kugira ibanga nibyo bishimangira ubupfura bwawe. Uko waba uri kose utagira ibanga amagambo uvugwa niyo menshi kurusha ayo avuga! Jya uvuga uziga [â€¦].â€
Uyu muhanzi yakanguriye abantu kuvuga baziga, bakavuga ibyo babajijwe cyane ko nâ€™umunyarwanda yaciye umugani ko akarimi kabi gasemera agasaya.
Niyokwizerwa Bosco wamenyekanye nka Niyo Bosco ni umusore wâ€™imyaka 20 yâ€™amavuko ukora umuziki ariko afite ubumuga bwo kutabona.
Mu kiganiro aherutse kugirana na IGIHE, Niyo Bosco yasabye abantu kutumva ko yaba akunzwe kubera impuhwe agirirwa ku bwâ€™ikibazo afite ahubwo bakita ku mpano ye mu muziki.
Uyu wahereye cyera aririmba ariko atarabona ubushobozi, yaje kurabukwa nâ€™umunyamakuru Irene Mulindahabi wamufashije kumenyekanisha impano ye mu 2019.
Nyuma yuko Isi yose ibonye impano iri muri uyu musore, abantu banyuranye biyemeje kumufasha, kuri ubu Niyo Bosco afite ikipe imufasha mu bijyanye na muzika ndetse no mu buzima bwa buri munsi.
Iyi ndirimbo ye nshya mu buryo wâ€™amajwi yakorewe muri Uno Record ikorwa na Producer witwa Santana mu gihe amashusho yayo yafashwe akanatunganywa na Bagenzi Bernard uri mu bagezweho muri iyi minsi.

Title: Gisubizo Ministries na Gentil Misigaro bahuriye mu ndirimbo ihumuriza abihebye
Body:
Umuramyi wâ€™Umunyarwanda ukomeye cyane ukorera muzika muri Canada, Gentil Misigaro yahuriye na Gisubizo Ministries mu ndirimbo nshya itanga ihumure ku bantu muri ibi bihe Isi itorohewe nâ€™icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Umuramyi wâ€™Umunyarwanda ukomeye cyane ukorera muzika muri Canada, Gentil Misigaro yahuriye na Gisubizo Ministries mu ndirimbo nshya itanga ihumure ku bantu muri ibi bihe Isi itorohewe nâ€™icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Iyi ndirimbo nshya yiswe "Ntidufite Gutinya" ni iyâ€™ ihumure ku bahuye nâ€™ingaruka za Coronavirus nâ€™abandi bose bari mu bibazo bitandukanye.
Hari nkaho ivuga ngo "Ntidufite gutinya habe na gato kuko ubuzima bwacu buri muri we, haba mu byago no mu makuba aturindisha imbabazi agira, kuba turiho ni ubuntu bwayo, kuba turiho ni imbabazi zayo."
Umuyobozi Mukuru wungirije wa Gisubizo Ministries, Runyambo Eddy, yabwiye IGIHE ko bari barifuje guha abantu ihumure no kubabwira ko nta handi barikura uretse ku Mwami Yesu.
 Yagize ati â€œMuri iyi minsi abantu bari mu rugo mu ngamba zafashwe mu kwirinda ikwirakwiza rya Covid-19 abantu benshi bafite ubwoba, hari abandi banduye baribaza uko bizagenda, ihumure nta handi riva ni ku Mana yonyine yaremye ijuru nâ€™Isi. Niyo yonyine yavuze ngo yemwe abarushye nâ€™abaremerewe nimuze munsange ndabaruhura."
Abajijwe impamvu bahisemo gukorana na Gentil Misigaro avuga ari ibintu bari barifuje kuva kera.
Ati â€œNi umuramyi ukomeye kandi twifuje kenshi gukorana na we indirimbo, twatangiye kubitegura kuva batangiye gutegura igitaramo bari bafite mu Rwanda mu ntangiriro zâ€™uku kwezi, igitaramo kimaze gusubikwa kubera COVID-19 twihutishije uyu mushinga cyane ko indirimbo yari ijyanye nâ€™ibi bihe Isi iri kunyuramo byo kurwanya Coronavirus.â€
Mu kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus yugarije Isi, Leta yâ€™u Rwanda yashyizeho ingamba zitandukanye zirimo gusaba abantu kuguma mu ngo zabo, kwirinda guhura nâ€™abantu benshi cyangwa kwegerana nabo nkâ€™ibisanzwe, gukaraba ibiganza nâ€™amazi meza nâ€™isabune inshuro nyinshi nâ€™ibindi.
Ntidufite gutinya ni indirimbo igizwe nâ€™iminota ine nâ€™amasegonda 13, amajwi yayo yatunganyijwe na Producer Boris na Bruce mu gihe amashusho yayobowe na Fleury Legend.
Itsinda rya Gisubizo Ministries ryamamaye mu ndirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana mu Rwanda no mu Karere ka Afurika yâ€™Uburasirazuba. Ryamenyekanye cyane mu ndirimbo zirimo â€œAmfitiye byinshiâ€, â€œMana urihoâ€, â€œNdaguhetse ku Mugongoâ€, â€œNarababariweâ€, â€˜â€˜Halleluyaâ€™â€™ nâ€™izindi.
Gisubizo Ministries imaze guhabwa ibihembo byinshi mu muziki birimo ibya Groove Awards Rwanda aho mu 2016, ryegukanye bitatu birimo icya Korali yâ€™Umwaka, Indirimbo nziza yâ€™Umwaka nâ€™iyo Kuramya yâ€™Umwaka ndetse mu Karere ryatwaye Groove Awards Kenya 2017 ryegukanye mu ruhando rwâ€™andi makorali yo muri Afurika yo hagati nâ€™iyâ€™Uburasirazuba.
Izina rya Gentil Misigaro ryakunzwe binyuze mu ndirimbo zirimo â€˜Biratunganaâ€™, â€™Hano ku Isiâ€™, â€™Hari imbaragaâ€™, â€˜Yesu ndiye Derevaâ€™, â€˜Hano ku Isiâ€™, â€˜Buri munsiâ€™, â€™Iyo mbimenyaâ€™ nâ€™izindi nyinshi zamaze kwinjira mu buzima bwa buri munsi bwâ€™abemera Yesu nkâ€™Umwami nâ€™Umukiza wabo.
Â 	Reba hano indirimbo ya Gisubizo Ministries na Gentil Misigaro

Title: Ninah Musinga yiyongereye ku banyempano bakorera umuziki uhimbaza Imana hanze yâ€™u Rwanda
Body:
Umuhanzikazi Ninah Musinga yinjiranye imbaraga mu muziki wo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana ashyira hanze indirimbo ye ya mbere yise â€˜Ni igiheâ€™ yanditse iturutse ku iyerekwa yagize.
Umuhanzikazi Ninah Musinga yinjiranye imbaraga mu muziki wo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana ashyira hanze indirimbo ye ya mbere yise â€˜Ni igiheâ€™ yanditse iturutse ku iyerekwa yagize.
Musinga ubusanzwe arubatse, ibikorwa bye bya muzika yabitangiriye aho abarizwa muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Gusa yemeza ko kuri we nâ€™ubwo yatinze kubikora ku mugaragaro ngo abwirize Isi ubutumwa bwiza, iki â€˜cyari cyo gihe cyâ€™Imanaâ€™.
Ninah Musinga ku ikubitiro yashyize hanze indirimbo ye ya mbere yise â€˜Ni igiheâ€™ avuga ko kuyandika bitavuye kuri we ahubwo ari ihishurirwa yagize riturutse mu ijuru.
Ati â€œNjya kuyandika, ntibyavuye kuri njye nari ndyamye gato, mvuye mu ishuri nduhutseho ngo nsubire gusoma, ngira inzozi zidasanzwe nanjye zanteye ubwoba. Nibonye ndi ahantu ndimo kumesa ndi kumwe nâ€™abandi twabanaga, mbasigaho ngiye kwanika imyenda ngera ahantu hari imigozi itatu ikoze mu nsinga imanitseho ingofero eshatu zera cyane sindabona ikintu cyera nkazo, zarushaga urubura kwera zari ingofero zâ€™uruziga zari zitangaje cyane.â€
Ngo yakomeje kuzibazaho ako kanya yumva ijwi rivugira inyuma yâ€™uruzitiro rwari rukikije iyo migozi rimuhamagara rimubaza niba yitegereje uko izo ngofero zera.
Ati â€œRyarabimbwiye rirakomeza riti urabona hari ikizinga wazibonaho? Narikanze nshaka kureba uvuze ibyo ariko sinamubona ndasubiza nti â€˜nabibonyeâ€™, arambwira ati â€˜genda ubwire abantu ko ari igihe cyo kwezwa no gutunganywa kuko nkâ€™uko wabonye ziriya ngofero zera nta kizinga niko nifuzako bamera kuko benshi bibwira ko bejejwe nyamara buzuyeho ibizingaâ€™.â€
Ngo iryo jwi ryâ€™uko azabwira abantu ubutumwa ryari rimaze kumuha mu kumusubiza rimubwira ko agomba guhimba indirimbo.
 Ati â€œNarabajije nti ubu se nzababwira gute aransubiza ngo genda ukore indirimbo uzayumva wese nzamugirira neza kandi uzabwire abantu ibyo wabonye ndetse ambwira amazina yâ€™abantu bamwe nzi arambwira ngo abe aribo ba mbere nzayiha hanyuma nyigeze no ku bandi bose nzabasha kugeraho.â€
Avuga ko ariyo mpamvu yâ€™iyi ndirimbo ndetse akavuga ko ashima Imana ko iki aricyo gihe ishaka abantu ko bumva ubu butumwa bwiza kandi bukiza.
Ninah Musinga yatangiye kuririmba akiri muto kuko yakuriye mu muryango wa gikirisitu. Yabyirutse akunda amasomo cyane ari nako abikomatanya no gukorera Imana mu buryo bwo kuyiramya no kuyihimbaza.
Â 	Umva indirimbo ya mbere ya Ninah Musinga yise â€˜Ni igiheâ€™

Title: Barumviye baratabarwa! Icyo Bibiliya ivuga ku bakijijwe ibyorezo no kuguma mu rugo (Video)
Body:
Abemera Bibiliya bahamanya nâ€™umutima wabo ko ijambo ryâ€™Imana ari ukuri kuzuye. Niyo ivuga bikaba, yategeka bigakomera; ifite imbaraga ziri hejuru ya byose. Bemera ko mu bihe bikomeye ijambo ryayo ryitabazwa, iyo abahanga bâ€™Isi batsinzwe rikifashishwa ndetse abemeramana ntibashidikanya ko rirema ikintu rikagikomeza.
Abemera Bibiliya bahamanya nâ€™umutima wabo ko ijambo ryâ€™Imana ari ukuri kuzuye. Niyo ivuga bikaba, yategeka bigakomera; ifite imbaraga ziri hejuru ya byose. Bemera ko mu bihe bikomeye ijambo ryayo ryitabazwa, iyo abahanga bâ€™Isi batsinzwe rikifashishwa ndetse abemeramana ntibashidikanya ko rirema ikintu rikagikomeza.
Kuri ubu Isi ihangayikishijwe nâ€™icyorezo cya COVID-19, cyatumye ibihugu bikaza ingamba zica intege ikwirakwira ryacyo. Iki cyorezo cyagaragaye mu Bushinwa mu Ukuboza 2019, umurwayi wacyo wa mbere mu Rwanda yahabonetse ku wa 14 Werurwe 2020.
Kuva icyo gihe Leta yakajije ingamba zo guhangana nacyo zirimo guhagarika ibikorwa bihuza imbaga nkâ€™ibitaramo, guhagarika ingendo zâ€™indege zitwara abagenzi no gusaba abaturage kuguma mu ngo zabo no kwirinda ingendo zitari ngombwa.
Ku bemera Bibiliya, indwara zâ€™ibyorezo si nshya mu matwi yabo, hari izo babwirijwe, izo basomye ariko bamwe ni ubwa mbere babonesheje amaso yabo, ubuhanuzi bubasohoreraho.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, Umuvugabutumwa muri ADEPR, Dusengimana ThÃ©ophile, yavuze ko ibihe bibi bidakwiye gutera ubwoba uwatewe yiteguye.
Yagize ati â€œKuva kera Abayisiraheli bahuraga nâ€™ibyago, indwara zikaze nka mugiga, kagungu ni icyorezo, inzige, guhagurukirwa nâ€™amahanga nâ€™intambara za hato na hato byose byabaga ari ibyorezo.â€™â€™
Mu bihe byâ€™amage, Abayisiraheli bahabwaga umuburo, rimwe na rimwe bagasabwa kuguma mu ngo kugira ngo bicishe bugufi, bitekerezeho, basenge batabarwe.
Yifashishije Igitabo cya Yesaya 26.20 havuga ko â€˜Wa bwoko bwanjye we, ngwino winjire mu nzu yawe wikingirane, ube wihishe akanya gato kugeza aho uburakari buzashiriraâ€™, yavuze ko â€œIcyâ€™agaciro kwari ukwita ku ngamba zagenwe.â€™â€™
Ubu u Rwanda ruhanganye na Coronavirus ndetse kuyihashya bisaba abarutuye kubahiriza inama zitangwa nâ€™inzego zâ€™ubuzima.
Dusengimana ukorera ivugabutumwa muri Paruwasi ya Kacyiru muri ADEPR, yashimye ingamba za Leta zo guhangana na Coronavirus.
Ati â€œAbaturage mbere yo kuba aba Leta, ni abâ€™Imana. Leta nayo yashyizweho nâ€™Imana. Ibyemezo bifatwa ni Imana iba yabifatiye muri Leta. Buri muntu akwiye kumenya uruhare rwe muri iki gikorwa.â€™â€™
Â 	Nowa nâ€™umuryango we 
Bibiliya igaragaza ko abantu bo ku bwa Nowa bakoze ibyangwa nâ€™Imana ibarimbuza umwuzure kuko binangiye bakanga kumvira.
Dusengimana ati â€œNowa yabaje inkuge avuga ibigiye kuzaba, abatarabyumvise bagereranywa nâ€™abatumva umuburo wa leta uyu munsi. Abantu bo kwa Nowa, ntibumvaga ibyo avuga kuko hari haciye imyaka 40 imvura itagwa [bumvaga ari igisubizo kuri bo], yari atuye ku gasozi ndetse ubwato yategetswe kubaza bwari bunini cyane babona bigoye kubuterura.â€™â€™
Igihe cyarageze imvura iragwa Nowa nâ€™umuryango we binjira mu nkuge [igereranywa nâ€™inzu], urugi rurakingwa, abinangiye bararimbuka.
Â 	Abayisiraheli bavuye mu buretwa mu Misiri 
Abayisiraheli bari bamaze imyaka 430 mu buretwa mu Misiri, babuvuyemo nyuma yo kumvira itegeko ryo gusiga amaraso ku nkomanyizo zâ€™umuryango [bakaguma mu nzu] kugira ngo Malayika natambuka urwo rugo rube rufite uburinzi.
Umwami Farawo yemeye kurekura Abayiisiraheli nyuma yâ€™uko Malayika yishe abana bose bâ€™imfura mu Misiri.
Ati â€œNi urugero rugaragaza kumvira kwâ€™Abayisiraheli. Na Coronavirus buri wese iramureba, niyo mpamvu agomba gushyira mu bikorwa imyanzuro ya Leta. Abayisiraheli barinzwe nâ€™amaraso, uyu munsi turasabwa kuguma mu rugo.â€™â€™
Â 	Moridekayi yatabariwe mu rugo
Bibiliya ivuga ku nkuru yâ€™Umuyuda Moridekayi wari wamanikiwe igiti cyo kubambwaho ariko akaza gutabarwa biturutse ku Mwamikazi Esiteri watakambiye Umwami ari mu rugo, akamubwira akaga ubwoko bwe bufite.
Itegeko ryâ€™Umwami ryaje kwanzura ko Hamani ari we umanikwa ku giti cyari cyateguwe; hanyuma Moridekayi atambagizwa umujyi wose ku ifarasi.
Â 	 Umunyegiputakazi Hagari yaratabawe!
Hagari wari umuja yasenzwe na Aburahamu, ageze mu nzira yiyambaza Imana, nayo yumva gutaka kwe.
Aburahamu na Hagari babyaranye Ishimayeli, ariko uyu mugore yirukanwa kubera gusuzugura nyirabuja.
Dusengimana avuga ko â€œImana yumvise kurira kwe, niko kumubwira ngo subira mu rugo, arongera asubira kwa Aburahamu na Sara. Hanze Imana yabonaga ko azahapfira.â€™â€™
Â 	Rahabu yatabariwe i Yeriko
Imana igabiza Abayisiraheli Kanani, hari indaya yahakiriye kuko yagumye mu rugo. Ubwo abagabo 12 boherezwaga gutata Kanani [igihugu cyâ€™isezerano] hari indaya yitwaga Rahabu basezeranyije ubutabazi .
I Yeriko hari amoko arindwi yagombaga kurimburwa, kandi Imana yari yabibwiye Yosuwa. Rahabu wacumbikiye abatasi, yasabwe kuzashyira agatambaro ku idirishya ku buryo nibahagera bakakabona bizaba ikimenyetso ko ari muri urwo rugo.
Mu bandi Bibiliya igaragaza ko bakijijwe no kuguma mu rugo harimo Eliya wahagaritse imvura agahungira ku mupfakazi akanatungwa nâ€™ibyo kurya bike yari asigaranye ndetse na Aburahamu, inshuti yâ€™Imana yaburiwe guhunga umujinya wâ€™Imana binyuze mu kuguma mu rugo.
Bibiliya yerekana ko iyo Abayisiraheli bahuraga nâ€™ibyago, buri wese kuva ku Muhanuzi wabazaga Imana icyateye icyo kintu nâ€™icyakorwa ngo kiveho, Umutambyi warebereraga idini nâ€™Umwami [Igihugu] watangaga amabwiriza, bafatanyaga kubirwanya.
Iyo usomye mu 2 Ibyo Ku Ngoma 7:13-14 havuga ko â€œNindamuka nkinze ijuru imvura ntigwe, cyangwa nintegeka inzige ngo zone igihugu, cyangwa ninohereza mugiga mu bantu banjye, maze abantu banjye bitiriwe izina ryanjye nibicisha bugufi bagasenga, bagashaka mu maso hanjye bagahindukira bakareka ingeso zabo mbi, nanjye nzumva ndi mu ijuru mbababarire igicumuro cyabo, mbakirize igihugu.â€™â€™
Dusengimana avuga ko â€œCoronavirus ishobora kuba ingamba za Satani ariko hamwe nâ€™ingamba zo kuguma mu rugo, tukabibyaza umusaruro wo gusengera umuryango, itorero nâ€™igihugu Imana ishobora kuyirukana inyuze mu bashakashatsi bagashaka imiti, mu gusenga cyangwa igakoresha uko abantu birinze.â€™â€™
Yasabye abantu kudahagarika imitima ahubwo bakizera Imana no kubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda COVID-19.
Ati â€œAbanyarwanda bahumure, icyo Leta ibahatira si leta gusa kuko nâ€™Imana irabibahamagarira. Nibamenye impamvu zo kuba mu rugo kugira ngo birinde, barinde nâ€™ababo. Iyo ushyize mu bikorwa, amabwiriza ya Leta nâ€™ayâ€™Imana, yishakira igitambo.â€™â€™
Kuguma mu rugo harimo inyungu nyinshi cyane ko bibungabunga ubuzima bwa buri wese nâ€™igihugu cyose kigakurwaho umutwaro wo kwita ku barwayi.
Abakirisitu bakwiye kuba icyitegererezo mu kubahiriza ingamba zo â€˜Kuguma mu rugoâ€™ cyane ko hari uburinzi budashidikanywaho nâ€™umwanya wo kwibutsa Imana imirimo bakoze.

Title: Ntiduheranwe nâ€™igicucu cyâ€™urupfu kuko Imana ntijya ikererwa!
Body:
Muri iki gihe cyo guhangana nâ€™icyorezo gikomeye cya Coronavirus, ahantu benshi ubuzima busa nkâ€™ubwahagaze. Mu mibereho isanzwe ya buri muntu hari ibyapfuye, ndetse na we ubwe hari aho yapfuye. Abantu bikingiranye mu nzu, biragoye kumva ijwi ryâ€™umuturanyi, abantu baracecetse bameze nkâ€™abapfuye.
Muri iki gihe cyo guhangana nâ€™icyorezo gikomeye cya Coronavirus, ahantu benshi ubuzima busa nkâ€™ubwahagaze. Mu mibereho isanzwe ya buri muntu hari ibyapfuye, ndetse na we ubwe hari aho yapfuye. Abantu bikingiranye mu nzu, biragoye kumva ijwi ryâ€™umuturanyi, abantu baracecetse bameze nkâ€™abapfuye.
Twiheranwa nâ€™igicucu cyâ€™urupfu. Iri jambo Nyagasani yaduteguriye ridukore ku mutima. Aragira ati â€œNgiye gukingura imva zanyu mbavanemo mwebwe muryango wanjye, maze nzabagarure ku butaka bwanyuâ€ (Reba Ezk 37, 12-14).
Nyagasani araduhumuriza, ngo agiye kuza adutabare maze atugarure mu byacu twavanywemo nâ€™iki cyorezo kimeze nkâ€™icyadutwaye bunyago.
Muri uko gutegereza ubutabazi bwâ€™Imana, hari icyo dusabwa nkâ€™uko tugiye kubizirikana twifashishije ivanjili ya Yezu azura Mucuti we Lazaro (Yh 11, 1 -45).
Imana ntijya ikererwa: Mu gihe Lazaro yapfaga, Yezu ntiyari ahari, baramushatse baramubura. Aho abonekeye abavandimwe bâ€™uwapfuye (Marita na Mariya) baramubwira bati â€œWatinze, iyo uba hano Musaza wacu ntaba yarapfuyeâ€.(Yh 11, 21.32). Nyamara nyuma yaje kumuzura, arongera abaho kuko Imana itajya ikererwa!
Nitugira ukwemera, tuzabona ikuzo ryâ€™Imana: Marita abwira Yezu ati â€œNubwo yapfuye bwose ariko nâ€™ubu ngubu nzi ko icyo wasaba Imana cyose yakiguha. Ninjye zuka nâ€™ubugingo; unyemera nâ€™aho yaba yarapfuye azabahoâ€ (Reba Yh 11, 22-25).
Ahandi Yezu aramubwira ati â€œ ariko sinakubwiye ko niwemera urabona ikuzo ryâ€™Imanaâ€. Aho Kugira ngo twicare dutegereje ibitangaza gusa, duce bugufi, maze nkâ€™intumwa za Yezu tumusabe tugira tuti â€œNyagasani, twongerere Ukwemeraâ€ (Reba Lk 17, 5-6).
Twibuke gukura mu nzira ibyatuma Nyagasani atatutugeraho ngo adutabare: Igihe Yezu ageze mu rugo, yabasabye kumwereka aho bamushyize no gukuraho ibuye (Yh 11, 33-39). Natwe Nyagasani aradusaba gukuraho ibidukingiriza kumubona: Icyaha, ubwoba, gushidikanya, agahinda, umutima utabona abakene nâ€™ibindi.
Tumenye ko ibidashobokera abana bâ€™abantu imbere yâ€™Imana bishoboka: Igihe Yezu abasabye gukuraho ibuye ripfutse imva yâ€™uwapfuye, Marita yaragize ati â€œntibishoboka ndetse ubu aranuka kuko uyu munsi ari uwa kaneâ€ (Reba Yh 11, 39). Bavandimwe, natwe dushobora kugira duti â€œNtacyo wakora Nyagasani, kuko byararangiye dore hashize amezi atatu bamwe, abandi ibyumweru bibiri ntawe ugera hanzeâ€. Twongere twibuke ko Imana itabara nkâ€™abantu, iyo isaha yo gutabarwa igeze Imana iratabara kuko ntijya ikererwa.
Twibuke gushimira Imana mu bihe byose: Bamaze gukuraho ibuye, Yezu ntiyahise yihutira gukora igitangaza cyo kuzura Lazoro ahubwo yarabanje azamura amaboko ashimira se uri mu Ijuru agira ati â€œNdagushimira Dawe kuko wanyumvise kandi nsanzwe nzi ko unyumvaâ€. (Reba Yh 11, 41-42). Natwe dushyire amizero yacu yose mu Mana.
Twiringire Imana kandi dufite icyizere gikomeye cyo gutabarwa ariko muri uko gutegereza, duhinduke tureke kugengwa nâ€™umubiri ahubwo tugengwe na Roho wâ€™Imana nkâ€™uko Pawulo abitwibutsa (Rom 8, 8-9). Nkâ€™uko Zaburi ya 130 ibidufashamo duce bugufi dusabe Imana imbabazi tugira tuti â€œNyagasani tubabarire kuko uramutse witaye ku byaha byacu ntawarokoka, ariko rero tuzi ko usanganywe imbabazi kugira ngo tuguhoranire icyubahiro.â€
Mana nziza, ngwino udukure mu mva zacu twikingiranyemo: imva zâ€™urwango, imva zâ€™ubugome, imva zâ€™ishyari no kwikuza, imva zâ€™icyaha nâ€™ibyago, imva zâ€™agahinda nâ€™ishavu, imva zâ€™ubwigunge nâ€™ubwoba maze nkâ€™uko wabirahiriye kuva kera utugarure ku butaka bwacu. Ku bwa Yezu Kristu Umwami wacu. Amen
Padiri Victor Amerika

Title: Kiliziya Gatolika yatangaje uburyo Pasika ya 2020 izizihizwa, kubatiza bikurwaho
Body:
Kiliziya Gatolika mu Rwanda, yatangaje ko kubera ibihe igihugu kirimo byo kwirinda Coronavirus, Pasika yâ€™uyu mwaka wa 2020, izihizwa mu buryo butandukanye nâ€™ubusanzwe, harimo ko ibikorwa bimwe na bimwe abakristu bazabikurikira ku maradiyo na televiziyo bari mu ngo zabo, imitambagiro, koza ibirenge, batisimu nâ€™indi mihango ntibeho.
Kiliziya Gatolika mu Rwanda, yatangaje ko kubera ibihe igihugu kirimo byo kwirinda Coronavirus, Pasika yâ€™uyu mwaka wa 2020, izihizwa mu buryo butandukanye nâ€™ubusanzwe, harimo ko ibikorwa bimwe na bimwe abakristu bazabikurikira ku maradiyo na televiziyo bari mu ngo zabo, imitambagiro, koza ibirenge, batisimu nâ€™indi mihango ntibeho.
Kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 24 Werurwe 2020, Inama yâ€™Abepisikopi mu Rwanda yasohoye itangazo rihumuriza abakristu muri ibi bihe bya Coronavirus, ndetse inabatangariza imirongo migari yâ€™uburyo Pasika yo kuwa 12 Mata 2020, izizihizwa.
Itangazo ryashyizweho umukono nâ€™Umushumba wa Diyosezi ya Butare akaba na Perezida wâ€™Inama yâ€™Abepisikopi mu Rwanda, Musenyeri Philippe Rukamba, rigaragaza umurongo ibiro bya Papa byahaye Abepiskopi bazagenderaho mu bihe bya Pasika.
Ubusanzwe Pasika ni umunsi mukuru, abakristu Gatolika bafata nkâ€™umutima wâ€™umwaka bagenderaho bita â€œUmwaka wa Liturujiyaâ€ ndetse ukaba ufatwa nkâ€™umunsi udasanzwe mu minsi mikuru bizihiza dore ko wizihizwa iminsi itatu.
Ibanzirizwa nâ€™igisibo kimara iminsi 40 igasozwa nâ€™umunsi mukuru wa Pentekosti. Iryo tangazo rivuga ko iyo minsi itatu yizihizwamo izagumaho kuko ari izingiro ryâ€™ukwemera kwa Kiliziya Gatolika ariko ikizihizwa bijyanye nâ€™ingamba zashyizweho zo kwirinda coronavirus.
Mu kwizihiza iyo minsi habaho â€˜misa yâ€™amavuta matagatifuâ€™. Ku bijyanye no kwizihiza iyo misa, itangazo rigira riti â€œHitawe uko mu gihugu bimeze, Umwepisikopi azashyira iyo misa ku wundi munsi. Byaba byiza bibaye nko mu ntangiriro za Nyakanga Mbere yuko dutangira iminsi yâ€™itangwa ryâ€™ubupadiri.â€
Ku byerekeye iminsi nyabutatu, rivuga ko kubera ubuyobozi bwa leta nâ€™ubwa Kiliziya babujije amahuriro, iyo misa izizihirizwa muri Kiliziya za Katedarali nâ€™iza Paruwasi nta bakristu bahari.
Rigira riti â€œMbere na mbere turabamenyesha ko muri Kiliziya Katedarali no muri za Paruwasi, Musenyeri nâ€™abapadiri bakuru bazizihiza iyi minsi yâ€™inyabutatu ya Pasika. Icyo gihe nta Bakristu bazaba bari mu Kiliziya.â€
Abasaseridoti bazamenyesha abakristu isaha bizaberaho kugira ngo bifatanye nabo mu isengesho aho bari mu ngo zabo. Kiliziya itangaza ko Ikoranabuhanga ririmo Televiziyo yâ€™u Rwanda na Radiyo Mariya nâ€™izindi Radiyo na Televiziyo bizaba bitangaza icyo gikorwa bigafasha abakristu kwifatanya.
Ku wa Kane Mutagatifu, muri Kiliziya Katederali no muri kiliziya ya Paruwasi, abapadiri babishoboye bazizihiriza hamwe misa yâ€™isangira rya Nyagasani nta Bakristu. Kiliziya ikavuga ko umuhango wo koza ibirenge utazakorwa kandi nyuma yâ€™isangira nta mutambagiro uhari, isakaramentu rikazaguma muri Taberenakuro.
Ku wa Gatanu Mutagatifu, muri Kilizaya Katederali no muri za paruwasi, umwepisikopi cyangwa Padiri mukuru bazizihiza ububabare bwa Nyagasani na none nta bakristu bari muri Kiliziya. Mu isengesho rusange umwepisikopi akazasabira abarwayi, abitabye Imana ndetse nâ€™abari mu gihirahiro.
Iryo tangazo rivuga ko Igitambo cya misa nâ€™umunsi mukuru wa Pasika bizizihirizwa gusa muri Kiliziya za Katedarali no mu za paruwasi. Ku bijyanye no kwizihiza igitaramo ntibazacana umuriro mu ntangiro yacyo. Hazacanwa itara rya Pasika gusa nta mutambagiro uzaba, hakurikirero indirimbo yâ€™igisingizo cya Pasika habone gusomwa ijambo ryâ€™Imana.
Kuri Pasika ubusanzwe hamenyewere batisimu [umubatizo] ntabwo uwo muhango uzaba, itangazo rikavuga ko hazabaho gusubiramo amasezerano ya Batisimu gusa.
Itangazo riteganya ko ibyo bikorwa abakristu batazagiramo uruhare mu Kiliziya, birimo imitambagiro nâ€™iminsi nyabutatu ya Pasika, umwepisikopi ashobora guhitamo ko bijya mu yindi minsi â€˜nko mu matariki ya 14 na 15 Nzeri 2020â€™.

Title: ADEPR yanenzwe kunyunyuza imitsi yâ€™abakirisitu bayo
Body:
Abantu batandukanye bakomeje kunenga Itorero rya ADEPR, ryasohoye itangazo ryereka abakirisitu baryo uburyo bakoresha mu gutanga amaturo muri iki gihe amateraniro yahagaritswe kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus, aho bavuga ko ari ugusonga abantu mu gihe cyâ€™amage.
Abantu batandukanye bakomeje kunenga Itorero rya ADEPR, ryasohoye itangazo ryereka abakirisitu baryo uburyo bakoresha mu gutanga amaturo muri iki gihe amateraniro yahagaritswe kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus, aho bavuga ko ari ugusonga abantu mu gihe cyâ€™amage.
Itangazo ryo ku wa 20 Werurwe 2020, ryashyizweho umukono nâ€™Umuvugizi wa ADEPR, Rev Karuranga Ephrem, rigira riti â€œNejejwe no kubandikira iyi baruwa ngira ngo mbagezeho uburyo bwo kwakira amaturo muri ibi bihe bidasanzwe Isi yose muri rusange nâ€™u Rwanda byâ€™umwihariko duhanganye nâ€™icyorezo cya Coronavirus.â€
Rev Karuranga avuga ko â€˜zimwe mu ngamba Leta yâ€™u Rwanda yafashe mu rwego rwo kurinda ubuzima bwâ€™Abanyarwanda harimo no guhagarika amateraniro yâ€™abantu benshi, bityo mu rwego rwo korohereza abakirisitu gushyigikira umurimo wâ€™Imana, mbandikiye iyi baruwa mbagezaho uburyo butatu bwatoranyijwe bwakwifashishwaâ€™.
Ubwo buryo burimo gukoresha uburyo bwâ€™umudiyakoni [agasanduku kâ€™amaturo kaba mu rusengero. Gukoresha uburyo bwa konti yo muri Banki ya Paruwasi igahabwa abakiristu no gukoresha uburyo bwa Mobile Money na Airtel Money, itorero ryâ€™akarere rigakoresha nimero rizahabwa nâ€™ibiro bikuru, izo nimero zikamenyeshwa abakirisitu.
Ni icyemezo cyanenzwe nâ€™abantu batandukanye aho Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri yâ€™Urubyiruko nâ€™Umuco, Bamporiki Edouard, akaba nâ€™Umuyoboke wa ADEPR, yavuze ko muri ibi bihe iri torero ritari rikwiye kwaka amaturo ahubwo ryagombaga gufata ku yo abakirisitu batuye rigafasha abakene baryo.
Bamporiki yanditse kuri Twitter ati â€œMushumba wacu wa ADEPR, muri iyi minsi idasanzwe twari dukwiye gutekereza uko abashumba batunga intama, kurusha ko intama zatunga abashumba, kuko nizo zifite intege nkeya. Mubyiteho aho mubona bishoboka, mufashe abakene bo mu itorero ryacu. Tumaze imyaka dutura mukore mu kigega.â€
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri yâ€™Ububanyi nâ€™Amahanga ushinzwe Umuryango wa Afurika yâ€™Iburasirazuba, Amb. Nduhungirehe Olivier, yanenze amadini nâ€™amatorero ashaka kungukira muri ibi bihe bya Coronavirus.
Ati â€œMuri iyi minsi twugarijwe nâ€™icyorezo cya Coronavirus, ntabwo amadini nâ€™amatorero yari akwiriye gushaka kubyungukiramo, asaba abayoboke bayo amaturo cyangwa icya cumi. Ahubwo ayo madini yari akwiriye gushaka uburyo yafasha abayoboke bayo batakibona ikibatunga kubera COVID-19.â€
Uwitwa Ndayishimye Jean Claude yunzemo ati â€œNi byo rwose Hon. Aya madini rwose akwiye kwiha akabanga. Bajyaga bavuga ko ari ubucuruzi (business) abantu bakabikerensa none birigaragaje. Nta tandukaniro nâ€™abacuruzi bazamura ibiciro bitwaje ibi bihe turimo.â€

Mubyiteho aho mubona bishoboka, mufashe abakene bo mu itorero ryacu. Tumaze imyaka dutura mukore mukigega. pic.twitter.com/PYcE9IFOqX
