Title: Mwumvire Leta kuko iri gukorana nâ€™Imana- Impanuro za ApÃ´tre Gitwaza ku guhangana na Coronavirus
Body:
Umushumba wâ€™Itorero Zion Temple Celebration Center, ApÃ´tre Dr. Paul Muhirwa Gitwaza, yavuze ko icyorezo cya Coronavirus giteye inkeke bityo amatorero yose agomba gufata ingamba zo guhangana nacyo ndetse abayoboke bayo bagakurikiza ingamba zafashwe nâ€™igihugu.
Umushumba wâ€™Itorero Zion Temple Celebration Center, ApÃ´tre Dr. Paul Muhirwa Gitwaza, yavuze ko icyorezo cya Coronavirus giteye inkeke bityo amatorero yose agomba gufata ingamba zo guhangana nacyo ndetse abayoboke bayo bagakurikiza ingamba zafashwe nâ€™igihugu.
Ni ubutumwa yatanze ku mugoroba wo ku wa 14 Werurwe 2020, abunyujije mu kiganiro Isaha yâ€™Agaciro kinyura kuri Radio na Televiziyo Authentic.
Mu butumwa yise â€œNi gute itorero ryiteguye guhangana na Coronavirus (COVID-19)? busa nâ€™ubwo yageneye amatorero ya Zion, ApÃ´tre Gitwaza yasabye abanyamatorero gukurikiza amabwiriza atangwa na leta mu rwego rwâ€™ubuzima bwâ€™igihugu.
Yagize ati â€œMinisiteri yâ€™Ubuzima ibyo irimo ivuga muri ibi bihe turasaba ngo abakirisitu mubitege amatwi. Mutega amatwi ibyo leta irimo ivuga abantu bagomba gukurikiza muri ibi bihe amatorero aho muri mweseâ€¦â€™â€™
"Mukurikire mwumve nibababwira ngo mukore gutya mukurikize ibyo kuko barakurikira buri mwanya ibirimo biba kandi na bo ni ababyeyi bafite impuhwe.â€
ApÃ´tre Gitwaza wasaga nâ€™ubwira abayoboke bâ€™itorero ayoboye yavuze ko aho ari hose atagomba gusobanya na leta mu guhashya COVID-19.
Yagize ati â€œOya uyu mwanya mwumvire leta kuko irimo irakorana nâ€™Imana ku kibazo cya Coronavirus, mukurikire amabwiriza atangwa nâ€™igihugu. Nibababwira ngo ntimuterane mubyumve, nibababwira ngo muterane ariko mukoreshe aya masuku mubikore, nibababwira ngo amashuri abana banyu ntimuboherezeyo mubikore. Icyo bababwira muri ibi bihe ndasaba ngo mubyumve kandi mubikurikize kuko bayobowe nâ€™umwuka wera muri iki gihe tutarabona umuti urambye ujyanye nâ€™iki kiza.â€
Â 	Gufatanya Kwizera no kwirinda
ApÃ´tre Gitwaza yavuze ko bimaze kugaragara henshi aho abanyamadini basobanya na leta mu ngamba ziba zafashwe mu kwirinda ibibazo bitandukanye ahanini bakavuga ko babiyobowemo nâ€™Imana.
Mu murenge wa Rusasa ho mu karere ka Gakenke higeze kumvikana abaturage badashobora kujya kwa muganga kubera imyemerere yabo bashingiraho bavuga ko Imana ariyo izabakiza kuko nta kiyinanira.
Ku baba bafite imitekerereze nkâ€™iyi Gitwaza yavuze ko abantu bagomba gukaza cyane gusenga ariko bikajyana no kwirinda no kumvira leta.
Yagize ati â€œNdabizi ko abarokore dukunda kwizera kandi kwizera koko kurakora. Dushobora kwizera tugasengera abarwayi bagakira ariko kandi si ko twese dufite uko kwizera hari ababikora bigana abandi hari nâ€™abavuga ngo kanaka yabasengeye, hari nâ€™abakirisitu bashaka ko abapasiteri babashyira ibiganza ku mutwe, ati â€˜Pasiteri umwana wanjye yarwaye, ntamujyane kwa muganga akamujyana kwa pasiteri ngo munshyirirero ikiganzaâ€™. Ndabibasaba bakirisitu tugerageze gukoresha kwizera kwacu ariko tuguhuze no kwirinda, ntufate gusa kwizera kudafite ibikorwa.â€
Â 	Kwirinda, ubwenge buva ku Mana
Gitwaza avuga ko kwirinda ari imbuto yâ€™umwuka wera ndetse bikaba nâ€™ubwenge buva ku Mana.
Muri ubu butumwa yageneye abayoboke bâ€™itorero rye, yagize ati â€œRero ndabasaba ngo ntimupfe kugerageza abashumba banyu, namwe bashumba ku bwâ€™urukundo rwâ€™intama ntugende ngo uyifate uyihobere uyikorakoreho nâ€™amaboko nurangiza ukore no ku bandi bantu, oya. Ndabasaba ngo muri ibi bihe dufatanye kwizera no kwirinda.â€™â€™
Â 	Yesu ukiza indwara?
Gitwaza yasabye abayoboke ba Zion Temple ko kutitotombera Imana bayigerageza kuri Coronavirus.
Ati â€œNdabizi hari uwavuga ati â€˜ese none ibyo muvuga ngo Yesu arashoboye, Yesu arakiza ni ibiki? Kuki utubwira ibyo?â€™ Ntabwo Yesu yavuze ngo mureke kwirinda igihe cyose, yaravuze ngo dore mbohereje mu masega ariko mugire ubwenge, dore mbohereje ahantu hagoye mugire ubwenge mwirinde, ntabwo yababwiye ngo mugendane kwizera gusa, yaravuze ngo nimwirinde mugire ubwenge. Iki ni igihe cyo kugira ubwenge, iki ni igihe kidasanzwe. Rero ndabasaba bakozi bâ€™Imana, bakirisitu kwizera kwanyu muguhuze no kwirinda.â€™â€™
Ikindi ApÃ´tre Gitwaza avuga ko muri ibi bihe atari igihe cyo gutererana abarwayi ngo abakristu babavuge nabi bavuga ko ari ibihano byâ€™Imana. Yabakanguriye gufasha umuntu wese warwara cyane cyane gufasha umuryango we mu bihe bikomeye arimo.
Ati â€œKibe igihe cyo kwerekana urukundo nkâ€™abakristu, igihe cyo gufasha.â€ Avuga ko nubwo bitemewe kwegera umurwayi wa Corona ariko abantu bagomba kuba hafi yâ€™umuryango we bakamenya niba afite uko yivuza, icyo barya mu rugo nâ€™ubundi bufasha.
Ikindi uyu muvugabutumwa avuga ko ibi ari ibihe byo kuba umuyoboro wâ€™ihumure aho yakanguriye abayoboke bâ€™itorero rye guhumuriza abafite ubwoba bose. Kandi ko bakwiye gushaka ijwi ryâ€™Imana bakamenyya icyo Imana ivuga muri ibi bihe.
Uyu mugabura wâ€™ijambo ryâ€™Imana yakomeje avuga ko ibi ari ibihe byo guhamya imbaraga za Yesu nâ€™urukundo rwâ€™Imana.
Ati â€œMuri ibi bihe mubwire abantu ko Yesu yatsinze indwara, nimwerekane imbaraga za Yesu hejuru yâ€™urupfu, imbaraga zâ€™umuzuko nâ€™urukundo Imana ikunda abantu. Mubwire abantu ko Yesu yaje muri iyi Si kuko Imana yakunze abantu.â€™â€™
Â 	Igihe cyo kwirinda ibihuha
Mu butumwa burebure Gitwaza yavuze ko abantu bagomba kwirinda ibihuha bitangazwa nâ€™abantu batizewe ahubwo bagakurikira amakuru atangwa nâ€™ibitangazamakuru byemewe.
Ati â€œMureke kwirirwa mukwirakwiza ibihuha mwakuye kuri Youtube, Facebook no kuri internet. Ibintu bari kuvuga hari ibirimo amakuru menshi yâ€™ibihuha, hari abarimo babeshya, benshi nimugende mukurikize ibiriho bivugwa ku miyoboro yizewe nâ€™igihugu, amaradio yâ€™igihugu, televiziyo yâ€™igihugu nâ€™ibindi bitangazamakuru byemewe ariko ntupfe gutoragura akantu kuri internet ngo nawe ugakubite ku rubuga. Ibihuha bizana ubwoba, ubwoba bugateza umutekano mukeâ€¦â€
Coronavirus yagaragaye bwa mbere mu Ntara ya Wuhan mu Bushinwa mu Ukuboza 2019, ariko igenda isakara ku Isi yose. Umurwayi wayo wa mbere yagaragaye mu Rwanda ku wa 13 Werurwe 2020, itahuwe ku Muhinde ukorera rimwe mu mashami yâ€™Umuryango wâ€™Abibumbye.
Ishami ryâ€™Umuryango wâ€™Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima, OMS, ryemeje ko Coronavirus ari icyorezo cyugarije Isi cyane ko imibare igaragaza ko abasaga 156,948 bamaze kucyandura, muri bo 5,839 cyarabahitanye mu gihe 75,939 babashije kuyikira.

Title: Ubugenzuzi bwagaragaje gusesagura, kunyereza no gucunga nabi umutungo muri ADEPR
Body:
Ubugenzuzi ku mikoreshereze yâ€™umutungo ku cyicaro cyâ€™itorero ADEPR, bugaragaza ko hagati ya tariki 1 Mutarama kugeza tariki 30 Nzeri 2019, habayeho gutanga amasoko binyuranyije nâ€™amategeko, umutungo wâ€™itorero ucunzwe nabi, gusesagura umutungo nâ€™ibindi.
Ubugenzuzi ku mikoreshereze yâ€™umutungo ku cyicaro cyâ€™itorero ADEPR, bugaragaza ko hagati ya tariki 1 Mutarama kugeza tariki 30 Nzeri 2019, habayeho gutanga amasoko binyuranyije nâ€™amategeko, umutungo wâ€™itorero ucunzwe nabi, gusesagura umutungo nâ€™ibindi.
Iri genzura ryitaye ku bikorwa byo ku cyicaro gikuru cya ADEPR ndetse no mu isomero ryayo. Ryitaye kureba niba ibikoresho biramba bibyazwa umusaruro uko bikwiye cyangwa niba bifatwa neza, kureba niba ibikorwa byatwaye amafaranga yaratanzwe mu buryo bwemewe nâ€™ibindi.
Iri genzura ryakozwe nâ€™abagenzuzi bâ€™umutungo bâ€™imbere muri ADEPR, ari bo Matabaro Evariste, Mukumburwa Joyeuse na Mukamurenzi Angelique.
Bimwe mu byagaragaye mu igenzura ni ibibazo nâ€™amayobera ku cyuma gisya amabuye akavamo umucanga kiri mu Karere ka Bugesera (Crusher), aho cyari kimaze amezi 11 gikora ariko nta faranga na rimwe ryinjira mu isanduku yâ€™itorero kandi cyaragombaga kwishyurwa miliyoni 9 Frw buri kwezi.
Muri iyi nyandiko yâ€™ubugenzuzi IGIHE ifitiye kopi, abagenzuzi bavuga ko â€˜bageze aho iki cyuma gikorera ntibahasange ugikoresha ndetse yari yabujije nâ€™abakozi be kugira icyo bavuga yikanga ko hari amakuru baha abagenzuziâ€™.
Bati â€œIbyo twari twaganiriye na bo ndetse nâ€™ibyo twabonye kuri chantier biduhamiriza ko kuvuga ko crusher [icyuma gisya amabuye] itigeze ikora ari ibinyoma byambaye ubusaâ€.
Abagenzuzi bavuga ko mu mezi 11 nta musaruro iki cyuma cyatanze muri ADEPR kuko byavugwaga ko kidakora nyamara ariko bagikoraho barababwiye ko hari amasaha gikora ku munsi.
Bati â€œIkimenyetso simusiga kigaragaza ko crusher ikora ni ikirundo cyâ€™umucanga ukomoka ku mabuye yasewe cyakuzura nkâ€™amakamyo abiri. Twabwiwe ko chemise ya moteur yamenetse mu Ukwakira 2019, bikaba bitumvikana uko yamenetse kandi crusher idakoraâ€.
Muri iyi raporo yâ€™agateganyo abagenzuzi bagaragaza amafaranga miliyoni 80 Frw, yaguze ikibanza cyanditse kuri Mukamuganga Judith kiri haruguru ya Dove Hotel, bakavuga ko â€˜ni menshi cyane ugereranyije nâ€™uko ibibanza nkâ€™icyo bigurwaâ€™.
Bakomeza bavuga ko ikindi giteye impungenge ari uko uhagarariye icungamutungo ugomba gusinya impapuro zose zemeza ko amafaranga akwiriye gusohoka yanze kubisinya nkâ€™uwabigenzuye ko bikwiye.
Bati â€œKugura ikibanza ku gaciro gahanitse cyane kuko ibibanza ku Gisozi bigurishwa hagati ya miliyoni 20 Frw na 30 Frw.â€
Ubugenzuzi bugaragaza ko abayobozi ba ADEPR bafite abarinzi bishyurwa nâ€™itorero kandi batabagenewe nâ€™amategeko yaryo, ibi bigafatwa nko gusesagura umutungo.
Abagenzuzi bati â€œKurihira abayobozi abo kubararira (abacunga umutekano bane ba EASCO), bakishyurwa binyuze muri EASCO ariko icyemezo kibibemerera ntacyometse aho bishyuriye...hakwiye kugaragazwa inyandiko isinye ibahesha izo avantage zo kurarirwaâ€.
Ubugenzuzi bugaragaza kandi abayobozi bahabwa amafaranga yo mu butumwa ariko ntihagaragare inyandiko yâ€™ubutumwa [ordre de mission], na raporo yâ€™ubwo butumwa, ibi bituma bifatwa nko gusesagura umutungo no kuwunyereza.
Kuri iyi ngingo hari urugero rwa 2 237 000 Frw yahawe Rev. Ntaganda Jean Paul yo kujya mu rugendo rwâ€™iminsi icyenda muri Uganda ariko nta nyandiko yâ€™ubutumwa ihari igaragaza ko uru rugendo rwakozwe nta na raporo yâ€™urugendo ihari.
Hari kandi 185 000 Frw yahawe Karangwa John adafite inyandiko yâ€™ubutumwa yatangiweho, ibi bigatuma abagenzuzi bavuga ko ashobora kuba atarakoze icyo yasabiwe kubera ko nta kigaragaza ko cyakozwe kandi cyagombye kuba gihari.
Ku micungire mibi yâ€™umutungo, hari imodoka zaheze mu gishanga ubu zikaba ziri hanze aho basenye i Gikondo.
Abakoze ubugenzuzi barirukanywe
Abakoze ubugenzuzi mu gusoza bavuze ko â€˜kubera ko gukora ubugenzuzi ku cyicaro cya ADEPR bisa nkâ€™aho bibangamira ubuyobozi bwa ADEPR, turifuza ko bwajya bukorana nâ€™abo hanze ariko batahawe isoko nâ€™abo baje kugenzura.â€™
Bagaragaje kandi ko mu bugenzuzi bwabo bahuye nâ€™ukunanizwa nâ€™Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa ADEPR, Rev. Gatemberezi Paul, aho basabwaga gukora ubugenzuzi bwâ€™ibintu bimaze imyaka ibiri bagahabwa umunsi umwe.
Mu bagenzuzi batatu bakoze ubugenzuzi, babiri bahagaritswe mu kazi ndetse bahabwa nâ€™inyandiko zâ€™integuza yo gusesa amasezerano yabo. Amakuru agera kuri IGIHE ni uko ibi byakozwe nyuma yo kubasaba kuvuguruza ibyavuye mu bugenzuzi bakoze abandi bakabyanga.
Inenge mu bugenzuzi
Umuvugizi wa ADEPR, Rev. Past Karuranga Ephrem, yabwiye IGIHE ko ubu bugenzuzi batabwemera kubera inenge bufite.
Ati â€œInenge ya mbere, basohoye ibintu ariko abo bagombaga kubaza ntabwo bababajije, ikindi cya kabiri bahuje ibibazo bari bafitanye nâ€™umuntu ku giti cye cyangwa se mu kazi, babihuza nâ€™uko na byo ari igenzura (audit)â€.
â€œIcya gatatu ni uko ari njye bagombaga kubiha no kumbaza uko bimeze, nanjye nagiye kubona mbona byarasohotse ntazi uko bimeze. Ntabwo bigeze bambwira ikibazo na kimwe bahuye na cyoâ€.
Ku kuba babiri muri batatu bakoze ubugenzuzi barahawe integuza yo gusesa amasezerano yabo, Rev. Past Karuranga avuga ko â€˜Ntaho bihuriye kuko ibyo bagaragaje nta nâ€™ikibazo gihari ahubwo ni uko nyuma yâ€™aho bakomeje kugira imyitwarire mibi no kubagira inama ntibazumve, hanyuma duhitamo gusesa amasezerano ariko ibyo gusesa amasezerano dukurikije ubugenzuzi ntabwo ari byoâ€™.

Title: Papa Francis yasubitse umwiherero kubera ibicurane
Body:
Papa Francis kuri iki Cyumweru yatangaje ko yahagaritse umwiherero wâ€™amasengesho yateganyaga kugirira mu Majyepfo yâ€™i Roma kubera ko arwaye ibicurane.
Papa Francis kuri iki Cyumweru yatangaje ko yahagaritse umwiherero wâ€™amasengesho yateganyaga kugirira mu Majyepfo yâ€™i Roma kubera ko arwaye ibicurane.
Uyu mukambwe wâ€™imyaka 83 yabwiye abakiristu bari bateraniye i Vatican mu rubuga rwitiriwe Mutagatifu Petero, ko uwo mwiherero wâ€™iminsi itandatu yateganyaga atakiwugiyemo.
Yagize ati â€œKubwâ€™amahirwe make, ibicurane byambujije kuzawujyamo uyu mwaka.â€
Gusubika uyu mwiherero Papa yagombaga gutangira kuri iki Cyumweru, bije mu gihe u Butaliyani buhanganye nâ€™icyorezo cya Coronavirus gikomeje guhitana benshi ku Isi.
Kugeza kuri iki Cyumweru, abantu basaga igihumbi bari bamaze kugaragaraho ibimenyetso byâ€™iyo ndwara mu Butaliyani.
Papa nawe byari byatangiye guhwihwiswa ko yanduye coronavirus nyuma yo kugaragara abira ibyunzwe mu ruhame, ariko ubuyobozi bwa Vatican bwabinyomoje.
Umuvugizi wa Papa yabwiye Ibiro Ntaramakuru byâ€™Abafaransa, AFP ko nta kibazo gikanganye Papa afite, ko ari uburwayi busanzwe.
AFP ivuga ko Papa yagaragaye i Vatican akomeye nubwo yakoroye inshuro ebyiri ubwo yari imbere yâ€™imbaga yâ€™abakirisitu.
Abantu 29 bamaze gupfa mu Butaliyani mu gihe abandi 105 bari kwitabwaho nâ€™abaganga mu buryo bwihariye.

Title: Abahoze bayobora ADEPR bihannye umucamanza kubera gusubika urubanza kenshi
Gitwaza yaguze urusengero rwa miliyoni 8 $ muri Amerika
Body:
Itorero rya Zion Temple Celebration Centre ryaguze urusengero muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu Mujyi wa Dallas rwa miliyoni umunani zâ€™amadolari zizishyurwa mu gihe cyâ€™imyaka itanu.
Itorero rya Zion Temple Celebration Centre ryaguze urusengero muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu Mujyi wa Dallas rwa miliyoni umunani zâ€™amadolari zizishyurwa mu gihe cyâ€™imyaka itanu.
Uru rusengero rwari rusanzwe ari urwâ€™umuvugabutumwa ukomeye wo muri Amerika witwa Mike Murdock. Yari asanzwe yararushyize ku isoko mu cyamunara nkâ€™uko bigaragara ku mbuga za internet.
Amakuru avuga Umushumba wâ€™Itorero Zion Temple, ApÃ´tre Dr Paul Gitwaza yaje kumenya ko Murdock ari kugurisha uru rusengero, yuririra ku bushuti bari bafitanye, amusaba ko yarugura kugira ngo Zion Temple ariho izajya isengera dore ko hari amakuru avuga ko ari narwo rushobora kuba icyicaro gikuru cyâ€™iri torero.
Bivugwa ko ngo Gitwaza yasabye Murdock kumudohorera akarumuhera ku mafaranga make, undi yemera gukura agaciro karwo kuri miliyoni 13 zâ€™amadolari yemera ko arwegukana ku nguzanyo ya miliyoni umunani zâ€™amadolari izishyurwa mu gihe cyâ€™imyaka itanu.
Mu materaniro yabaye kuri iki Cyumweru muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Gitwaza yashimiye abakirisitu bâ€™itorero rye muri Amerika mu gihe cyâ€™umwaka rimaze rihakorera.
Yavuze ko muri icyo gihe, ryari rimaze kwimuka inshuro ebyiri ariko â€œubwa gatatu tuzabayo burunduâ€™.
Aha niho yahereye ahishura ibyâ€™igurwa ryâ€™urwo rusengero ati â€œKandi uwabigizemo uruhare ni umubyeyi Dr Murdockâ€.
Yavuze ko uyu Murdock yabwiwe nâ€™Imana ko urwo rusengero akwiye kurureka ariko ko akaruha umuntu Imana izamushyira ku mutima.
Ati â€œBamuhaye amafaranga miliyoni 13 zâ€™amadolari, njye yarabimbwiye ngira ngo ni inkuba zikubise mu matwi, nagize ukwizera guke ariko nabisabiye imbabazi. Arambwira ati wowe ndumva iyi nzu Imana yambwiye ngo nyiguhe, anshyira mu mutego arambwira ngo urampa angahe ndananirwa, natashye ntavuze.â€
â€œNamubwiye ayo nshobora kumuha bwa mbere ariko sinayavuga hano kuko ateye isoni, ariko nyuma [â€¦] ndabaza, ngisha inama, nandikira nâ€™inshuti yanjye nti nakoze ishyano. Irambwira iti ntutinye Murdock ni umubyeyi.â€
Ngo yabajije iyo nshuti ye niba ashobora kuba yakongera kuvuga ayo yakwishyura, imubwira ko yabikora nta kibazo. Ati â€œTurandika, musaba ko yahaduhera kuri miliyoni umunani. Umubyeyi ntiyanze. Abandi bamuhaye miliyoni 13, akuraho miliyoni eshanu! Mwibaze.â€
Gitwaza yavuze ko yabwiye Murdock ko nta mafaranga afite, ko ashobora kuba yakwishyura mu myaka itanu, undi nawe amubwira ko nta kibazo.
Ati â€œNdamubwira nti nanjye ngiye gukora, imyaka itanu ntizagera.â€
Yavuze ko abakirisitu ba Zion Temple nâ€™Imana aribo bazatuma bigerwaho bityo kuko bari bamaze igihe basembera mu bukode.
Murdock wari witabiriye ayo materaniro ngo yemereye Gitwaza ko azamufasha mu bikorwa byo gukusanya amafaranga agamije kwishyura iri deni. Muri ayo masengesho, abakirisitu bitanze ibihumbi 250 byâ€™amadolari.
Urwo rusengero rufite buri kimwe cyose nkenerwa ku itorero, nkâ€™icyumba cyo gusengeramo, ibiro, ibyumba bito byo kwigiramo nâ€™ibyâ€™inama, icyumba cya televiziyo nâ€™ibindi.
Zion Temple yatangiye mu 1999, ku itariki 11 Nyakanga bigizwemo uruhare nâ€™abantu 120.
Inkuru wasoma: ApÃ´tre Gitwaza yahishuye byinshi: Ubuhanuzi, amadini, ikiganiro gikomeye nâ€™intumwa ya Papa nâ€™ibindi (Video)
Amafoto agaragaza uru rusengero ruherereye Denton muri Leta ya Dallas

Title: Abanyarwanda babaye aba mbere mu irushanwa ryo gusoma Korowani
Body:
Nshimiyimana Saidi wâ€™imyaka 18 na Zigabe Muhamad wâ€™imyaka 18, babaye aba mbere mu kurushanwa gusoma korowani, ni irushanwa ryabereye muri Kenya.
Nshimiyimana Saidi wâ€™imyaka 18 na Zigabe Muhamad wâ€™imyaka 18, babaye aba mbere mu kurushanwa gusoma korowani, ni irushanwa ryabereye muri Kenya.
Ryari ryitabiriwe nâ€™ibihugu icyenda ari byo; Kenya, Tanzania, Djibouti, Ethiopia, Burundi, Sudani yâ€™Epfo, Uganda, Somalia nâ€™u Rwanda.
Nshimiyimana Saidi wabaye uwa mbere mu cyiciro cyâ€™abazi korowani yose mu mutwe yahembwe ibihumbi 7$ mu gihe Zigabe Muhamadi, warushanyijwe amajuzu 20 yahawe 5000$.
Aba bana babwiye IGIHE ko bishimye cyane ndetse amafaranga bahawe azabafasha mu buzima bwabo cyane.
Nshimiyimana Saidi yagize ati â€œNabyakiriye neza kandi nishimye cyane kuko aya mafaranga natsindiye agiye kumfasha mu myigire yanjye no muri gahunda zâ€™iterambere ryanjye.â€
Yakomeje avuga ko yizeye ko nawe agiye guteza imbere ubuzima bwe bugahinduka bitewe nâ€™ibihumbi 7$ yahawe.
Zigabe na we yemeza ko amafaranga yahawe azayifashisha mu kwiyishyurira ishuri.
Ati â€œAya mafaranga agiye kumfasha mu myigire kuko amafaranga iyo atagufashije mu ishuri ntabwo aba yarakugiriye akamaro.â€
Yakomeje avuga ko nta kintu cyamushimishije nkâ€™uburyo batsinze abantu baturuka mu bihugu byitwa ibya kiyisilamu.
Mufti wâ€™u Rwanda, Hitimana Salim, yashimiye aba bana anashimangira ko intsinzi yabo ari iyâ€™abanyarwanda bose kuko bari bahagarariye igihugu.
Ati â€œNi gikorwa gikomeye cyane byâ€™umwihariko ku bayisilamu no ku gihugu muri rusange kuko bagiye bagihagarariye nâ€™ubwo basomaga korowani, ni ishema mu gihugu cyose kandi nibaza ko ari igikorwa gikwiye gushimwa na buri wese.â€
Mufti Hitimana yongeyeho ko ibihembo nkâ€™ibi bifasha imiryango ya kiyislamu gutera imbere kuko nkâ€™umwaka ushize mu miryango yâ€™abayisilamu hinjiyemo miliyoni zirenga 100 zâ€™amafaranga yâ€™u Rwanda zagiye zegukanwa nâ€™abana bitabiriye amarushanwa yo gusoma korowani mu bihugu bitandukanye.

Title: Abashakanye nâ€™abitegura kurushinga bateguriwe igiterane kiziga ku kibazo cyâ€™ingo zisenyuka
Body:
Umuryango utanga ubujyanama ku miryango cyane cyane ibanye mu makimbirane, River Ministry, ugiye guhuriza hamwe abashakanye nâ€™abitegura kurushinga mu giterane kigamije kuganira ku kubaka ingo zigakomera cyane ko inyinshi zisenyuka buri munsi cyangwa bikaviramo ba nyirazo kwicana.
Umuryango utanga ubujyanama ku miryango cyane cyane ibanye mu makimbirane, River Ministry, ugiye guhuriza hamwe abashakanye nâ€™abitegura kurushinga mu giterane kigamije kuganira ku kubaka ingo zigakomera cyane ko inyinshi zisenyuka buri munsi cyangwa bikaviramo ba nyirazo kwicana.
Iki giterane gifite insanganyamatsiko igira iti â€˜â€˜Ukuri nâ€™amahoro mu bashakanyeâ€™â€™ cyateguwe nâ€™Umuyobozi wa River Ministry, Mukabaramba Jacky afatanyije nâ€™umugabo we.
Giteganyijwe kubera kuri Kigali Convention Centre ku wa 14 Gashyantare 2020, aho kizatangira saa kumi nâ€™imwe nâ€™igice zâ€™umugoroba.
Abazacyitabira bazaganirizwa nâ€™Umuyobozi wa Evangelical Restoration Church ku Isi, ApÃ´tre Joshua Ndagijimana Masasu nâ€™umufasha we Pasiteri Lydia Masasu. Aba bombi baheruka kwizihiza isabukuru yâ€™imyaka 30 bamaze babana nkâ€™umugabo nâ€™umugore mu birori byabaye mu Ukuboza 2019.
Iki giterane cyahuriranye nâ€™Umunsi wâ€™Abakundana, cyanatumiwemo abahanzi bagezweho barimo James na Daniella bakunzwe cyane mu ndirimbo â€œMpa amavutaâ€, â€œNkoreshaâ€ nâ€™izindi nâ€™abandi barimo Arsene Tuyi waririmbye â€œNaranyuzweâ€, â€œIcyaremwe gishyaâ€ ndetse na Irimbere Christian ugezweho mu yitwa â€œObligadoâ€ na â€œNdi hanoâ€.
Umuyobozi wa The River Ministry, Mukabaramba akaba nâ€™umwanditsi wâ€™ibitabo yabwiye IGIHE ko yahisemo gutegura iki gikorwa bitewe nâ€™izamuka ryâ€™ingo zisenyuka.
Uyu mubyeyi wanditse igitabo â€œIzahabu ihishe mu muryangoâ€ ni na we uyobora abagore kuri Restoration Church Masoro. Yagize iyerekwa ashaka kongera guhuriza hamwe abashakanye nâ€™abandi bari mu nzira yo kurwubaka kugira ngo baganire uko bakubaka ingo zihamye zubakiye ku rufatiro rutanyeganyezwa.
Imibare yâ€™inkiko igaragaza ko gatanya zizamuka ubutitsa kuko kugeza mu Ugushyingo 2018, hari hamaze gucibwa imanza za gatanya 1311, ni ubwikubwe bwâ€™inshuro 19 ugereranyije nâ€™umwaka wa 2017.
Imibare igaragaza ko mu 2016 ingo zatandukanye zari 21, mu 2017 ziba 69; yerekana ko gatanya zikubye inshuro 62 bingana na 6,200% mu myaka itatu ishize.
ERC ni itorero rishingiye ku musingi wo kubaka umuryango uhamye, aho imfubyi ibonera umubyeyi, umupfakazi akagira umwitaho. Ihishurirwa ryo kuritangiza ApÃ´tre Masasu yarihawe mu 1984, aza kurishinga mu 1994.
Amafaranga yo kwinjira muri iki giterane ku bashakanye ni 30 000 Frw ku bagura amatike mbere naho abazayagura uwo munsi ni 35 000 Frw; itike ku muntu umwe ni 15 000 Frw ariko izazamurwa ku 20 000 Frw.

Title: Inkomoko yâ€™umusaraba wifashishwa cyane mu madini ya Gikirisitu
Body:
Inkomo yâ€™umusaraba ukunze gukoreshwa cyane mu madini yemera Yezu Kirisitu nkâ€™umucunguzi ntikunze kuvugwaho rumwe nâ€™abantu batandukanye ndetse bamwe bakavuga ko ari ikimenyetso cya Gipagani kurusha uko waba icya Gikirisitu.
Inkomo yâ€™umusaraba ukunze gukoreshwa cyane mu madini yemera Yezu Kirisitu nkâ€™umucunguzi ntikunze kuvugwaho rumwe nâ€™abantu batandukanye ndetse bamwe bakavuga ko ari ikimenyetso cya Gipagani kurusha uko waba icya Gikirisitu.
Ku madini aha agaciro cyane umusaraba ndetse akawufata nkâ€™ikimenyetso cyâ€™ibanze kiranga imyemerere yabo, bashingira ku kuba ari wo Yezu/Yesu Kirisito yabambweho bityo ukaba ari ikimenyetso cyâ€™ugucungurwa kwabo.
Ibimenyetso byinshi biri mu nzu ndangamurage yâ€™Abongereza birimo ibigaragaza Imana kazi yâ€™Abagiriki ba kera iri iruhande rwâ€™Umusaraba byerekana ko umusaraba wabayeho ibinyejana byinshi mbere yâ€™ivuka ryâ€™amadini ya Gikirisitu ndetse bikemezwa ko ufite inkomoko mu Abanya-Babuloni ba kera mbere yâ€™uko ukwira mu bindi bice byâ€™Isi.
Umusaraba wa mbere yâ€™Ubukirisitu wakoreshwaga nkâ€™ikimenyetso mu madini gakondo yâ€™Abanyamisiri, Abanya-Syria nâ€™Abagiriki.
Uyu musaraba wa mbere wari mu bwoko bubiri uzwi nka â€˜Tau Crossâ€™ wabaga ukoze nkâ€™inyuguti nkuru ya Tâ€™ yo mu Kigiriki ndetse nâ€™undi witwaga â€˜fylfot crossâ€™.
Uyu musaraba wa Tau niwo wakoreshwaga cyane nâ€™abapagani gusa nyuma uza gutangira gukoreshwa nâ€™Abakirisitu bo mu Misiri.
Umusaraba waje kuba gute ikimenyetso gikomeye kiranga Abakirisitu ?
Mu kinyejana cya 4, Umwami wâ€™Abami Constantine yemeye Ubukirisitu ndetse yemeza ko hakwiye gushakishwa ahantu hari nâ€™ibintu bifite amateka yâ€™ingenzi mu buzima bwa Yezu.
Muri iki gikorwa cyo kuvumbura ahantu hafite amateka ku buzima bwa Yezu nibwo hamenyekanye amakuru ko Nyina wa Costantine witwaga Helene yavumbuye ibice byâ€™umusaraba, ndetse biza kwemezwa ko ari ibyâ€™umusaraba wa Yezu kuko habaye igitangaza cyâ€™uko ubwo byavumburwaga hari umugore wabikozeho arakira.
Kuva icyo gihe kubambwa kwa Yezu no gupfira ku musaraba byatanze isura nshya ku musaraba kuko gusa watangiye kwifashishwa mu nsengero ndetse nyuma ya Costantine ugirwa ikimenyetso kiranga Ubukirisito.
Nâ€™ubwo kugeza uyu munsi amadini menshi afata umusara nkâ€™ikimenyetso gikomeye kuko ari wo Yezu yabambweho, hari andi makuru avuga ko Icyo Yesu Kirisito yabambweho ari igiti gisanzwe cyâ€™Inginga aho kuba umusaraba.
Izi mpaka zâ€™icyo Yesu yaba yabambweho mu byâ€™ukuri ntizigarukira mu nyigisho zâ€™amadini gusa kuko na Bibiliya iyo zigeze ku murongo uvugamo umusaraba ziranyuranya.
Bibiliya ntagatifu ikunze gukoreshwa cyane muri Kiliziya Gatolika,ivuga ko igihe Yezu Yesu yicwaga, abamwitegerezaga baramunnyeze, maze bamushinyagurira bamusaba ko niba afite ubushake yakwikura kumusaraba.
Hari aho igira iti â€œWowe usenya Ingoro yâ€™Imana, ukongera kuyubaka mu minsi itatu, ikize ubwawe niba uri Umwana wâ€™Imana, maze umanuke ku musaraba. Abatware bâ€™abaherezabitambo na bo bakamuseka, nâ€™abigishamategeko, nâ€™abakuru bâ€™umuryango, bati â€˜Yakijije abandi, none ntashoboye kwikiza ubwe!â€™Harya ngo ni Umwami wa Israheli, ngaho namanuke ku musaraba tumwemere!â€.
Ibi Bibiliya ntagatifu ivuga ibihuza na Bibiliya Yera ariko byagera kuri Bibiliya ikoreshwa nâ€™Abahamya ba Yehova yo aho kuvuga ijambo umusaraba ivuga Igiti cyâ€™Umubabaro.
Bagira bati â€œWowe ngo wari gusenya urusengero ukarwubaka mu minsi itatu, ngaho ikize! Niba uri Umwana wâ€™Imana, manuka kuri icyo giti cyâ€™umubabaro!â€
Abo muri mu madini atemera ibijyanye nâ€™umusaraba bavuga ko Bibiliya Yera na Bibiliya Ntagatifu ubwo zashyirwaga mu Kinyarwanda, bashafe ijambo ryâ€™Ikigiriki â€˜Staurosâ€™ risanzwe rivuga ingiga yâ€™igiti akaba ariryo bahinduramo umusaraba.

Title: Umwaka wâ€™ivugabutumwa ryo kuri internet! Youtube yamamaje abapasiteri, yigarurira iyobokamana rya 2019
Body:
Buriya nta kintu mubonamo mwebwe? Niba utarumvise intambara yâ€™amagambo hagati ya Pasiteri Zigirinshuti Michael wo muri ADEPR nâ€™umuhanzi Nsengiyumva FranÃ§ois [Igisupusupu], waba warataye mu gutwi indamukanyo yâ€™umuvugabutumwa Riziki Chantal igira iti â€œMuraho, muraho yemwee!â€™â€™
Buriya nta kintu mubonamo mwebwe? Niba utarumvise intambara yâ€™amagambo hagati ya Pasiteri Zigirinshuti Michael wo muri ADEPR nâ€™umuhanzi Nsengiyumva FranÃ§ois [Igisupusupu], waba warataye mu gutwi indamukanyo yâ€™umuvugabutumwa Riziki Chantal igira iti â€œMuraho, muraho yemwee!â€™â€™
Aba basangiza bâ€™ijambo ryâ€™Uhoraho ni babiri ku rutonde rurerure rwâ€™abo amazina yabo yagarutsweho cyane mu 2019 binyuze mu kwifashisha umuyoboro wa Youtube, mu kwamamaza ubutumwa bwiza.
Uko iminsi yicuma ni ko umubare wâ€™imbuga nkoranyambaga ugenda wiyongera, ibi bituma abantu benshi bitabira kuzikoresha. Mu zikoreshwa cyane harimo Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, Twitter na Youtube isa nâ€™iyoboye izikunzwe bitewe nâ€™uko ininjiriza ba nyirayo agatubutse.
Youtube yazamuye igikundiro cya bamwe mu bavugabutumwa, ibyo bigisha byambutse imipaka yâ€™u Rwanda bigera hakurya yâ€™amazi magari.
Ntibishingiye kuri za ngendo zakorwaga abavugabutumwa, abafataga rutemikirere berekeza hanze ubu ikoranabuhanga ryoroheje iyamamazabutumwa binyuze mu gufata amashusho yâ€™ubutumwa agasakazwa Isi yose binyuze kuri internet.
Mu Rwanda abenshi basigaye bamara umwanya munini kuri Youtube bareba amashusho; uru rubuga ku Isi yose rukoreshwa nâ€™abasaga miliyari 1.9.
Usibye ibikorwa byo gufasha abatishoboye binyuze mu bukangurambaga bwo gukusanya inkunga, kwerekana abanyempano bashya, Youtube yanatumbagije ubwamamare bwâ€™ababwirizabutumwa bwiza.
IGIHE yanyujije amaso mu mezi 12 ashize ikusanya urutonde rwâ€™abavugabutumwa bagarutsweho cyane muri uyu mwaka, binyuze mu magambo yabo adasanzwe bavuze ndetse nâ€™ibyo bigishije bigakurura benshi mu bakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga, bakagenda babihererekanya.
Â 	Habuze gato ngo Pasiteri Zigirinshuti afatane nâ€™Igisupusupu
Kanama ya 2019, yabyaye amahari hagati ya Pasiteri Zigirinshuti Michel na IGISUPUSUPU wendaga kumuhagama nyuma yo kuvuga ko uyu muhanzi afite ubwamamare bushyigikiwe na Satani.
Yabitangarije mu cyigisho yatangiye muri ADEPR Nyarugenge mu masengesho ya saa sita, ubwo yigishaga ku â€˜buhanuzi nâ€™amasezerano byo mu isezerano rishya byuzuriye mu byasezeranijwe bishyaâ€™.
Hari aho yageze avuga uburyo hari abantu bâ€™imburamukoro bahururira ibyo babonyeho byose ari naho yavuzemo Nsengiyumva wamamaye kubera indirimbo ye â€œIgisupusupuâ€.
Ati â€œNtimugakunde kuba imburamumaro, muri imburamukoro. Iyo ubaho wandagaye Satani arakubona. Nta mpamvu yo kugira ngo ugushaka wese akubone, uguhamagariye igitoki, brochette, Nyabugogo, uguhamagariye kubyina, uguhamagariye kumva Igisupusupu, byose mukaboneka.â€
Pasiteri Zigirinshuti yatinze kuri Nsengiyumva abwira abakirisitu ko ukwamamara kâ€™uyu musaza wa Rwagitima kurimo imbaraga za Satani, nyamara abakorera Imana bo bahera hasi.
Ati â€œIgisupusupu kiragatsindwa! Syii! Ubonye ukuntu cyamamaye mu mezi angahe? Murakibonye ukuntu cyamamaye mu mezi atatu? Ariko buriya nta kintu mubonamo mwebwe? Ikintu nka kiriya kikava Rwagitima cyâ€™Igisupusupu uwo mwanya kikaba kigezeâ€¦â€
Yunzemo ati â€œUbuse nkoze ibiterane bingahe cyangwa waririmbye izingana iki? Ko ntaho zagiye se? None rundamo, rundamo aho ngaho aho ngaho mu mihanda yose, mu Burayi, yagiye. Mujye mumenya imbaraga zamamaza ibintu nka biriya izo ari zo, ugasanga Isi yose yashitse. Ariko ubahamagaye mu giterane ntiwababona, mwajya kumenya imbaraga ziri hariya hantu izo ari zo. Kuki ibintu bya Satani byihuta ariko ibyacu bikagenda gahoro?â€
Uretse Nsengiyumva, abantu batandukanye ku mbuga nkoranyambaga banenze Pasiteri Zigirinshuti bamushinja kugirira ishyari uyu musaza ndetse ko amagambo yakoresheje adakwiriye kuvugirwa mu rusengero.
Amagambo ya Zigirinshuti nâ€™ibyo Nsengiyumva yamusubije byose anenga ko uwitwa umukozi wâ€™Imana yamwutse inabi byatijwe umurindi na Youtube kuko ni ho byanyujijwe.
Â 	Ni gute umusore arara yifumbase nâ€™ama-baby yuzuye i Kigali?
Mukeshimana Emerthe ni izina ryagarutsweho muri uyu mwaka. Uyu mubyeyi yamamaye cyane ku izina rya Mama CharlÃ¨ne, asengera mu Itorero rya ADEPR Nyakabanda. Yatangiye ivugabutumwa mu 2005 ariko atangira gukoreshwa cyane mu ntangiriro zâ€™uyu mwaka.
Muri Kamena 2019 nibwo yatangaje amagambo yiganjemo ayâ€™imvugo zitamenyerewe gukoreshwa mu nsengero. Abakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga bararikase bararihanahana.
Muri iyo nyigisho yakomoje ku mbaraga zishobora gufasha umuntu gukora ibidasanzwe.
Yagize ati â€œMbere ni nkâ€™uwaza akakubaza ikigutera kudasambana uri umukobwa kandi abakobwa barashize. Ni mbaraga ki? Wa musore we, ni iki kigutera kurara wifumbase, wizinze nkâ€™ipine ryâ€™imodoka, nâ€™abana bahiye bari i Kigali, abana bacyeye nâ€™ibyuki nâ€™ibyuma bihari kandi harimo nâ€™abâ€™ubuntu, ni iki kigutera kubaho gutya udasambana? Ni mbaraga ki?â€™â€™
Usesenguye neza ubutumwa bukubiye muri iyi nyigisho, uyu muvugabutumwa yashakaga kuvuga ko hari izindi mbaraga zishobora gufasha umukobwa nâ€™umusore kudasambana nyamara hari ibigusha byinshi.
Kimwe nâ€™abandi bavugabutumwa Mama CharlÃ¨ne yahisemo gukoresha amagambo arimo aba-baby, ama-nigger, aba-type, abakoboyi nâ€™abajama kuko na bo baza mu rusengero kandi bakeneye kumva ubutumwa bwiza binyuze mu mvugo iboroheye, ikurura amarangamutima yabo.
Â 	Muraho yemwee! Imwe mu ndamukanyo zamamaye cyane
Umuvugabutumwa Riziki Chantal, na we arazwi. Biroroshye kumwibuka niba uzi umukobwa wigisha anyuzamo asuhuza abamuteze amatwi.
Imwe mu nyigisho yabwirijemo muri Kanama yagize ati â€œMuraho, muraho yemwe. Kangahe mwa bakobwa mwe, mubonanye abamasera ijipo nâ€™amakanzu biriho pasura, bareba mu ntege no mu bibuno. Aribo ari natwe abakagombye kwiyubaha ni bande? Harya muri kwanga za rukubita ihuku, rukubita imbwa!â€™â€™
â€œAbasore bari kwambara ubusa, ugasanga yambaye icupa, uri umukirisitu urya igaburo ryera ujya mu icupa, ubwose uzajya mu ijuru gute warageze mu icupa? Muraho, muraho yemwee! Nujya mu icupa, byeri, urwagwa bizajya he? Niba ubona umubu ukihisha, uri wa nta kigenda (fake), hunga icyaha, hunga urupfu rwa kabiri.â€™â€™
Â 	Mafia mu madini! Ubuhamya bwâ€™ibikomere bya Pasiteri Ntawiniga
Pasiteri Ntawiniga Jean-DÃ©sirÃ© Hullet ari mu bagarutsweho mu ruhando rwâ€™iyobokamana.
Izina rye ryatumbagiriye mu gikorwa cyo ku wa 19 Mata 2019 cyiswe â€˜Because There Is Hopeâ€™ cyateguwe na Pearls Corner Organisation iyoborwa na Mireille Igihozo witabiriye irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2018. Cyari cyanatumiwemo umuhanzikazi Aline Gahongayire watanze ubutumwa avuga ko itangazamakuru ryâ€™u Rwanda riciriritse.
Mu nyigisho ye yagize ati â€œNjye nari ikirara. Mu rugo bagiye muri Amerika ndi mu kabari. Nari umurara, nagiye i Kanombe nsanga ba masenge baryana inzara bati â€˜ngicyo kirajeâ€™. Nahageze bagiye kare. Nakuze mu rugo ntahaba, meze nkâ€™aho ndi externe. Nageze muri Amerika nsanga ababyeyi ntabazi, abavandimwe tutaziranye.â€™â€™
Uyu mupasiteri wâ€™imyaka 43 yavuze ko igituma ahorana itoto ari uko adakunda kurakara.
Ati â€œHari abantu barakara bakamarana umujinya ibyumweru bitatu, hari urakara akanuka, akamera nkâ€™urutoryi rutose.â€™â€™
Yabwiye IGIHE ko mu murimo wâ€™Imana habamo ibibazo byinshi cyane , yagereranyije na mafia zikorerwamo.
Ati â€œSingiye kukubeshya buriya abakozi bâ€™Imana biriya bibazo byo gucikamo ibice mu matorero harimo ibinyoma byinshi, harimo intambara zirenze nâ€™iza politiki harimo mafia. Njye rero ukuntu navutse mvuga ibintu uko biri.
Â 	Kabanda Julienne, umuvugabutumwa wari icyamamare mu tubyiniro dukaze!
Pasiteri Julienne K. Kabanda ayobora Umuryango wâ€™ivugabutumwa wa Grace Room Ministries. Yumvikanye abwiriza inyigisho ziganjemo izikebura abana bâ€™abakobwa ku myitwarire ikwiye kubaranga.
Yigisha muri â€˜Because There Is Hopeâ€™, hari aho yagize ati â€œNarakuze, sinigeze nsambana, ndashaka. Hari utumalayika. Hari abavuye mu ijuru bagera ku Isi; hari nâ€™abavuye ikuzimu bagana mu ijuru, biterwa nâ€™aho ukonkobotse.â€™â€™
â€œTwavuye ikuzimu ariko turagana mu ijuru. Iyo Yesu atwogeje baratwifuza. Hari ibintu ntinya kuvuga. Wararaga mu kabyiniro? Njye nari nararenze urwo rwego. Nageze aho nari mfite imbyino izwi. Sinitwaga Julienne ryari izina ryâ€™abaturage. Nakoze amarushanwa yo gusubiramo Michael Jackson. Naranyereye ibigabo bikajya bigwa hasi.â€™â€™
Kabanda yakanyujijeho mu tubyiniro dukomeye, yari umuhanzi uzwi ku banyabirori bâ€™i Kigali ndetse yigeze ategura igitaramo cyâ€™ubuntu cyahuruje imbaga irimo na nyina agatungurwa no kubona umwana we yitwara atyo!
Â 	Imvugo zo ku muhanda zarifashishijwe mu ivugabutumwa rishya!
Pasiteri Niyonshuti ThÃ©ogÃ¨ne wakuriye mu buzima bwo ku muhanda, ubu ni Pasiteri uyoboye umwe mu midugudu igize Itorero rya ADEPR. Umwaka wa 2019 wasize yamamaye mu kubwiriza byihariye akoresheje imvugo zisanisha nâ€™ubuzima bwabo.
Ati â€œNtiwaba umaze gucoma ngo ugende nka babiloni, uhita uhindura ingendo (bounce).â€™â€™
Hari nâ€™aho agira ati "Abacuruzi bâ€™urumogi babita abapushayi, akakubwira ngo genda aguhe urumogi. Mfite uko nagenda murapira. Vipi, mambo, ku miti se? Ndamubaza imiti se hari farumasi iri aho ngaho? Agahita avuga ati â€™uyu we ni uwacu tuâ€™.â€™â€™
Mu 2019, Pasiteri Niyonshuti yatumiwe mu biterane nâ€™ibitaramo byagutse bigamije guhashya ibiyobyabwenge biri mu byugarije urubyiruko rwâ€™u Rwanda.
Mu nyigisho atanga yumvikana akoresha amagambo [â€œgucomaâ€ cyangwa â€œgukora ijishoâ€™â€™ bisobanura kunywa urumogi nâ€™ayandi] yo kwisanisha nâ€™ubuzima bwabo kugira ngo bamwiyumvemo abagezeho ubutumwa yifuza.
Â 	Ivugabutumwa ryâ€™ubujyanama mu kubaka ingo
Umwaka wa 2019 wabaye udasanzwe kuko ubujyanama bunyuzwa kuri Youtube bwariyongereye cyane. Binyuze mu biterane byâ€™umuryango abakozi bâ€™Imana bahanuye imiryango ku buryo ikwiye kubana neza kandi mu mahoro.
Ku isonga harimo Rutayisire Antoine uyobora Itorero Anglican Paruwasi ya Remera; Pasiteri Habyarimana DÃ©sirÃ© ubarizwa mu Itorero rya ADEPR na mugenzi we Senga Emmanuel wo muri Eglise Vivante.
Mu mpanuro, Pasiteri Rutayisire yatanze mu mpera zâ€™umwaka yifashishije indirimbo ya Rugamba Sipiriyani avuga ku miryango itandukana yararuhanye.
Ati â€˜â€˜Umugabo asiga umugore baruhanye, bakiteza imbere. Agatangira ati â€˜nashatse umugore narutaga. None arashaje nkibyiruka. Nzashaka umuto mumuharike, numve iryo raha.â€™ Icyo ni igihombo! Umuntu ufite V8 akagira nâ€™inshoreke irya amafaranga wakoreye nâ€™umugore, yaravunitse urangije ukamuta, arimo aratungwa nâ€™agakayi, araririmba ngo mumpe agakayi nandikemo ibyo nariye nâ€™ibyo nanywereye kandi wowe uri gusangira nâ€™uwo mutafatanyije kubishaka. Ni igihombo. Abantu benshi bakorera mu bwoba, ntibagira icyerekezo!â€™â€™
Urutonde rwâ€™abavugabutumwa bagaburiye ijambo kuri Youtube ni rurerure! Kuri ubu insengero nyinshi zatangije imiyoboro zinyuzaho ubutumwa kuri Youtube mu kubusunika ngo bugere kure. Na we ushobora kwiyongereraho abawe!

Title: Papa Francis yasabye imbabazi kubwo kwiyama umugore washakaga kumusuhuza
Body:
Umushumba wa Kiliziya Gatolika ku Isi, Papa Francis yasabye imbabazi kubwo gukankamira no gukubita umugore washakaga kumusuhuza mu ijoro ribanziriza Ubunani.
Umushumba wa Kiliziya Gatolika ku Isi, Papa Francis yasabye imbabazi kubwo gukankamira no gukubita umugore washakaga kumusuhuza mu ijoro ribanziriza Ubunani.
Mu ijambo ryifuriza abatuye isi umwaka mushya, Papa Francis yavuze ko ibyo yakoze byagaragaje kutihangana.
Mu ijoro ryo kuwa Kabiri rishyira kuwa Gatatu, Papa yagiye mu rubuga rwitiriwe Mutagatifu Petero i Roma gusuhuza abari mu rugendo rwâ€™iyobokama muri uwo mujyi mbere gato yâ€™uko umwaka wa 2019 urangira.
Ubwo yagendaga asuhuza abantu bari ku mirongo bamutegereje, yaje kunyuza akaboko hejuru yâ€™umwe mu bagore bari bari aho asuhuza umwana.
Agaruye akaboko, Papa wasaga nâ€™ushaka gukomeza kwigendera yakuruwe ukoboka nâ€™uwo mugore ashaka kumusuhuza ku ngufu.
Amashusho yafashwe agaragaza Papa ari gukoresha imbaraga ngo yiyake uwo mugore , ndetse amera nkâ€™umukubita intoki ngo amurekure akanamukankamira (amubwira nabi).
Kuri uyu wa Gatatu Papa Francis yabisabiye imbabazi, ati â€œakenshi tubura ukwihangana. Nanjye byambayeho. Ndasaba imbabazi kubwâ€™urugero rubi.â€
Amashusho yakwirakwijwe yâ€™ibyakozwe na Papa ntiyavuzweho rumwe, bamwe bavuga ko atari imyitwarire ikwiriye Papa mu ruhame abandi bavuga ko uwo mugore ashobora kuba yaramubabaje bitewe nâ€™uburyo yamukuruye akaboko.

Title: Hagiye gukorwa filime ivuga ku buzima bwa Yezu iri mu rurimi rwâ€™amarenga
Body:
Umuryango mpuzamahanga usakaza ijambo ryâ€™Imana mu batumva, Death Mission watangaje ko ufite gahunda yo gukora filime ivuga mu buryo bwâ€™amarenga ku ivuka, ibitangaza, urupfu ndetse nâ€™izuka rya Yesu/Yezu.
Umuryango mpuzamahanga usakaza ijambo ryâ€™Imana mu batumva, Death Mission watangaje ko ufite gahunda yo gukora filime ivuga mu buryo bwâ€™amarenga ku ivuka, ibitangaza, urupfu ndetse nâ€™izuka rya Yesu/Yezu.
Uyu muryango uvuga ko iyi filimi izafasha mu kugeza ivugabutumwa ku bantu miliyoni 70 babana nâ€™ubumuga bwo kutumva hirya no hino ku Isi.
Umukozi wâ€™uyu muryango nawe ubana nâ€™ubumuga bwo kutumva, binyuze mu rurimi rwâ€™amarenga, Chad Entinger yagaragaje ko iyi filime iri mu rurimi rwâ€™amarenga izafasha abatumva kwibona mu butumwa itanga.
Yagize atiâ€œUrurimi rwâ€™amarenga rufitanye isano nâ€™uwo umuntu ari we. Kugira ngo umuntu abone ikintu mu rurimi rwâ€™amarenga bizabakora ku mutima kandi bazabyumva, uwo muntu aziyumva ati â€˜oh Mana yanjye ninjye barikubwira, uru ni ururimi rwanjyeâ€.
Entinger yongeyeho ati â€œTwizeye neza ko Imana ishobora ndetse izakoresga iyi filime iri mu rurimi rwâ€™amarenga mu kugera ku bantu batumvaâ€
Iyi filime byitezwe ko izafasha abatumva nabo kwibona nkâ€™abagenewe ubutumwa buri mu ijambo ryâ€™Imana kuko mu busanzwe insengero nyinshi zikoresha uburyo bufasha kugeza ubutumwa mu bumva gusa.
Ikorwa ryâ€™iyi filime biteganyijwe ko rizafata imyaka igera kuri itatu cyangwa ine dore ko ibikorwa byo gukusanya amafaranga azifashishwa mu mirimo yo kuyikora bigeze kure.
Kugeza ubu filimi ivuga ku mateka nâ€™imibereho ya Yesu yabonekaga mu ndimi nyinshi zitandukanye gusa ku batumva bari bagifite imbogamizi zâ€™uko batabashaga kugerwaho nâ€™ubutumwa buyikubiyemo.

Title: Iki cyorezo cyagaragaje ko nta gihangange, dukeneye ubufasha bwâ€™Imana- Mgr Kambanda
Body:
Umushumba wa Arikidiyosezi ya Kigali akaba nâ€™Umuyobozi wa Diyosize ya Kibungo, Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda yavuze ko icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyugarije Isi muri iki gihe cyagaragaje ko nta gihangage kiri mu Isi bityo ko bisaba kwiyambaza Imana cyane igatanga ubufasha.
Umushumba wa Arikidiyosezi ya Kigali akaba nâ€™Umuyobozi wa Diyosize ya Kibungo, Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda yavuze ko icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyugarije Isi muri iki gihe cyagaragaje ko nta gihangage kiri mu Isi bityo ko bisaba kwiyambaza Imana cyane igatanga ubufasha.
Musenyeri Kambanda yabitangarije IGIHE kuri iki Cyumweru, mu gihe abayoboke ba Kiliziya Gatolika bizihiza umunsi wa Mashami bazirikanaho umunsi Yezu Kristu yinjiraga mu Murwa wa Yeruzalemu nkâ€™Umwami, abaturage bakamusasira imyenda yabo.
Mgr Kambanda yavuze ko muri Kiliziya Gatolika ari umunsi ukomeye cyane batangiriraho icyumweru gitagatifu.
Ati â€œNi icyumweru gikomeye mu mateka yâ€™ukwemera kwacu. Ni icyumweru kitwinjiza muri Pasika nyirâ€™izina nyuma yâ€™iminsi 40 tumaze mu gisibo twibuka ububabare bwa Nyagasani, ari nâ€™igihe cyo kwihana kugira ngo dushobore gutunganira Imana.â€
Mu bihe bisanzwe, umunsi nkâ€™uyu abakirisitu baturutse imihanda yose babaga bari mu nsengero bafite amashami yâ€™imikindo bishimira kwakira Yezu nkâ€™umwami wabo.
Kuri iki Cyumweru si ko biri bugende kuko abaturarwanda bari mu ngo zabo, bubahiriza amabwiriza yashyizweho na Guverinoma yo kwirinda icyorezo cya coronavirus gikomeje guhitana imbaga hirya no hino.
Kuba abantu bari mu ngo, Musenyeri Kambanda ntabibonamo ikibazo ahubwo avuga ko ari umwanya mwiza wo gusenga batakambira Imana kugira ngo itange ubufasha mu gutsinda Coronavirus kuko abatuye Isi bananiwe.
Ati â€œKuguma mu nzu biduha umwanya wo gusenga cyane cyane no kubona ko Imana ariyo ifite ububasha. Iki cyorezo cyagaragaraje ko nta mukuru, nta muto, nta gihangange. Ko nta mukire, nta mukene, twese twicisha bugufi. Abafite ubushobozi nâ€™intwaro zikomeye ntawe ushobora kukirwanya ngo agitsinde, bigaragara ko dukeneye ubufasha bwâ€™Imana.â€
Yavuze ko kuba ibihe bya Pasika bisanze abakirisitu bari mu ngo zabo, nta mpungenge biteye ku kwizihiza uwo munsi Yezu yatsinzeho urupfu, ngo kuko nâ€™Abiyisilaheli bizihirizaga Pasika mu ngo iwabo.
Ati â€œPasika Abiyisilaheli buri umwe yayizihirizaga mu rugo rwe, ngo Imana ibakingire urupfu baraye iri bubakure mu bucakara mu Misiri. Urugo rwarateranaga rukizihiza Pasika, rugasangira intama ya Pasika. Biratwibutsa rero ko natwe dushobora kwizihiza Pasika mu ngo zacu, umukuru wâ€™umuryango agateranya umuryango, agasenga bakumva ijambo ryâ€™Imana.â€
Ni ibihe byo kuzirikana ba nyakabyiziâ€¦
Gusabwa kuguma mu ngo, hari abo byabereye ihurizo cyane abaryaga ari uko bavuye gukora, bazwi nka ba nyakabyizi.
Leta yashyize uburyo bwo gufasha abantu nkâ€™abo badafite icyo barya muri ibi bihe, ariko siko bigera kuri buri wese bitewe nâ€™ubwinshi bwâ€™abakeneye ubufasha.
Musenyeri Kambanda yavuze ko muri ibi bihe, abakirisitu bafite ubushobozi bakwiriye kugoboka bagenzi babo batishoboye, bakagendera ku byo amategeko yâ€™Imana abasaba.
Ati â€œUrukundo rwa kivandimwe ari ryo tegeko rikuru ryâ€™Imana rudusaba ko tumenya abaturanyi, ba Lazaro bâ€™abakene duturanye tukabasangiza ku byo dufite bityo Imana yatwoherereje umwana wayo akemera kutubera igitambo ngo adutsindire urupfu, inaduherekeze mu gutsinda urupfu nâ€™iki cyorezo cyugarije isi.â€
Yavuze ko no ku rwego rwa Kiliziya Gatolika, batangiye gushishikariza imiryango remezo gukusanya inkunga, abishoboye bagafasha abakene.
Umuryango ufasha, Caritas wa Kiliziya Gatolika nawo watangiye kwegeranya inkunga yâ€™ibiribwa bikagezwa muri Paruwasi zitandukanye kugira ngo abatishoboye bagobokwe muri ibi bihe.
Musenyeri Kambanda yavuze ko bahereye cyane mu bice byâ€™imijyi kuko ariho hakenewe ubufasha kurusha ahandi.
Ati â€œNiho bibabaje cyane kuko mu cyaro ho iyo umuntu afite urutoki munsi yâ€™urugo, umurima wâ€™imyumbati cyangwa uwâ€™ibijumba, ntabwo aba amerewe nabi nkâ€™uri hano mu mujyi. Turashishikariza abari mu cyaro mu mirima guhinga kuko iki ni igihe cyo guhinga , ntibibacike kugira ngo ejo bazaramire nâ€™abandi.â€
Kugeza kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 4 Mata 2020, Minisiteri yâ€™Ubuzima mu Rwanda yagaragazaga ko umubare wâ€™abanduye coronavirus umaze kugera ku 102, mu gihe ku isi hose basaga miliyoni imwe. Bane nibo bamaze gusezererwa mu bitaro mu Rwanda.

Title: Icyo Imana idushakaho muri ibi bihe bya Pasika
Body:
Bavandimwe Kristu Yezu akuzwe, ku Cyumweru cya Mashami twibuka kandi tugahimbaza igihe Nyagasani Yezu yasesekaye mu murwa wa Yeruzalemu, akakirwa nkâ€™Umwami koko, agatambagizwa bikomeye, agakomerwa amashyi, akavugirizwa impundu akaririmbirwa. Nyamara icyo gihe nticyarambye kuko abamutambagije nibo bamuhindukanye bidatinze ngo nabambwe nabambwe!
Bavandimwe Kristu Yezu akuzwe, ku Cyumweru cya Mashami twibuka kandi tugahimbaza igihe Nyagasani Yezu yasesekaye mu murwa wa Yeruzalemu, akakirwa nkâ€™Umwami koko, agatambagizwa bikomeye, agakomerwa amashyi, akavugirizwa impundu akaririmbirwa. Nyamara icyo gihe nticyarambye kuko abamutambagije nibo bamuhindukanye bidatinze ngo nabambwe nabambwe!
Iki cyumweru kandi kitwinjiza mu cyumweru gitagatifu aho tuzirikana ku mateka yâ€™ugucungurwa kwacu, cyane cyane mu minsi nyabutatu ibanziriza Pasika: Uwa Kane Mutagatifu aho turarikirwa kuzazirikana ku isangira rya nyuma nâ€™umwami wacu Yezu Kristu. Ku wa Gatanu Mutagagatifu nkâ€™umunsi wâ€™ubutayu no kuzirikana ku mpamvu yo kwifatanya bucece na Yezu Kristu muri iyo nzira yâ€™umusaraba izatugeza ku gutsinda. Naho ku wa Gatandatu mutagatifu duhimbaza igitaramo cya Pasika kitwinjiza mu kuzirikana ku Izuka rya Kristu ari naryo shingiro ryâ€™ukwizera kwacu, kuko nkâ€™uko Pawulo Mutagatifu abivuga â€œniba Kristu atarazutse, ukwemera kwacu kwaba ari amanjweâ€ (Reba 1Kor 15, 17).
Iki gihe kandi cyo kwitegura Pasika, kije mu gihe isi yose iri mu bihe bidasanzwe byo guhangana nâ€™icyorezo cya Coronavirus, aho abantu bakomeje gupfa ari benshi hirya no hino ku isi. Ni igihe cyo kwiyinjiramo buri wese ukwe kugira ngo azabashe guhimbaza Pasika neza. Kimwe mu byatuma duhimbaza Pasika neza ni ukwisuzuma, tukamenya ko turi abanyabyaha, tugasaba imbabazi Imana nâ€™abo twahemukiye kandi buri wese akiyunga nâ€™umutima we.
Igihe cyâ€™ububabare cyegereje, Yezu yajyanye na bake mu bigishwa be ku musozi gusenga. Arababwira ati â€œUmutima wanjye urashavuye byo gupfa, Nimugume aha kandi mube maso hamwe nanjye mu gihe ngiye gusengaâ€ (Mt 26, 38). Yezu agarutse yasanze basinziriye, abwira umwe muri bo witwa Petero atiâ€œNi ibyo byawe, ntiwashoboye kuba maso nibura isaha imwe hamwe nanjye!â€ (Mt 26, 41). Yezu yarebye ukuntu bananiwe arababwira atiâ€œUmutima wâ€™Umuntu uharanira ibyiza ariko umubiri ukagira imbaraga nkeâ€!
Ni nkâ€™aho yakavuze ati â€œYooo! Nabo bifuzaga kugumana nanjye muri ibi bihe ariko dore barananiweâ€. Yarongeye ajya gusenga ubwa kabiri na none ariko asiga abakanguye ngo bagerageze babe maso. Agarutse nabwo asanga barasinziriye, umugono ari wose! Icyakora arabihorera kuko ngo yabonaga amaso yabo aremerewe! Asubirayo ubwa gatatu, agarutse asanga bamwe basinziriye abandi bakirwana nâ€™ibitotsi, arababwira ati â€œNoneho nimusinzire muruhukeâ€! Nuko abaguma iruhande kugeza igihe bukereye. (Reba Mt 26, 45-46).
Turasabwa kugumana nâ€™Imana mu isengesho
Muri ibi bihe bikomeye Nyagasani aradusaba kumuguma iruhande. Tukagumana na we nibura isaha imwe mu isengesho buri munsi aho turi mu ngo zacu, kugira ngo tutagwa mu bishuko bitandukanye: Kwiheba, kugira ubwoba, kwiba, kwandavura, ubugugu, ubwikunde, intonganya nâ€™ibindi.
Turi abanyantegenke:
Imana izi neza intege nke zacu, iyo tunaniwe iratwihanganira. Kugira ngo tuzahimbaze Pasika neza, twisuzume tutihenze, twicuze ibyaha byacu kuko burya turi abanyantegenke nkâ€™uko Pawulo Mutagatifu abivuga atiâ€œKuko icyiza nifuza ntagikora, naho ikibi ntashaka akaba aricyo nkoraâ€ (Rm 7, 19). Iki gihe turimo ni icyo kwigorora nâ€™Imana, nâ€™abavandimwe bacu ndetse no kwiyunga nâ€™umutima wacu. Turi abanyantege nkeya kandi buri wese yifitemo umusemburo wo gusenyuka kwe. Twicuze, koko burya nta mahoro yâ€™umunyabyaha udashaka kubivamo.
Icyubahiro cyâ€™isi ni icyâ€™akanya gato
Byinshi mu bicumuza bene muntu ni ugushakisha ubutunzi, gushakisha imbaraga zishingiye ku cyubahiro nâ€™ibindi.
Igihe turimo kirimo isomo rikomeye: Yezu yatemberejwe mu mujyi wa Yeruzalemu, bamuririmbira ngo â€œHozana, nihasingizwe uje mu izina rya Nyagasaniâ€! Ngo â€œniwe Mwami wa Israel, inkomoko nyacyubahiro ya Dawudiâ€! Nyamara ntibyamaze kabiri, baramushushubikanye ngo akwiye urwo gupfa! Maze abo yagaburiye bagahaga bamwicisha inzara, abo yahaye Divayi nziza bagatangara bo bamuha Divayi irura! Abo yakijije uburwayi bamutera inguma umubiri wose!
 Ibyo dukora byose dushakishe ubukungu mu ijuru kuko isi yo ntigira inyiturano. Tubitse ubukungu bwacu aho imungu zitagera. Ubibuko nyabwo buri mu mutima wita ku bandi kandi udategereje gushimwa nabo.
Iki ni igihe cyo kubabazwa nâ€™ikibi twakoze
Bavandimwe, iki ni igihe cyo kubabazwa nâ€™ikibi cyaturutse mu ruhande rwacu. Usanga kenshi hari igihe twigira â€œabahigi bâ€™ibyaha byâ€™abandiâ€, tukabangukirwa no gucira abandi imanza aho kwikebuka ngo buri wese yirebe atihenze maze ababazwe nâ€™ikibi yakoze kabone nâ€™iyo nta wundi muntu waba ukizi.
 Hari abantu twakuraho isomo dusanga mu Ivangili ya Matayo hari hati â€œUmutegeka hamwe nâ€™abasirikare be barindaga Yezu, babonye umutingito wâ€™isi nâ€™ibyari bibaye, bagira ubwoba bwinshi baravuga bati: â€œUyu koko yari Umwana wâ€™Imana!â€ (Mt 26, 54).
Dusenge:
Nyagasani Mana, wavuze ko abakomera ku Ijambo ryawe batazakorwa nâ€™ikimwaro (Reba Yh 8, 51 na Zab 22), muri ibi bihe twugarijwe nâ€™icyorezo gikomeye cya Coronavirus gihuriranye no kwitegura Pasika, duhe umutima wo kukugarukira, umutima wo kwiyunga nawe, umutima wo kwiyunga nâ€™abavandimwe bacu ndetse no kwiyunga natwe ubwacu. Turi abantu ntabwo turi abamalayika, aho twaguye tubyutse dukomeze urugendo. Aho turwaye udukize, ni wowe Muganga utagira gisumbwa, tabara abana bawe bari mu kato cyangwa ubundi bubanare buzwi nawe wenyine, uri imbabazi zimenya imbabare.
Turinde ubwoba no kwiheba. Bana natwe ibihe byose, byâ€™umwihariko muri iki cyumweru gitagatifu twinjiyemo maze uko dusangiye ububabare bwa hano ku isi, tuzanasangire nawe ibyishimo byâ€™izuka. Tubisabye twizeye, ku izina ryâ€™Imana Data na Mwana na Roho Mutagatifu, Amen!
Padiri Victor AMERIKA

Title: GisÃ¨le Precious yasohoye indirimbo â€˜Mbega Urukundoâ€™ yibutsa abâ€™Isi ko hari uwabitangiye
Body:
Umuhanzikazi Nsabimana GisÃ¨le Precious yashyize hanze indirimbo yise â€˜Mbega Urukundoâ€™ yifitemo ubutumwa bushimangira ko Yesu yitangiye Isi kugira ngo akize abayituye ibyaha byabo.
Umuhanzikazi Nsabimana GisÃ¨le Precious yashyize hanze indirimbo yise â€˜Mbega Urukundoâ€™ yifitemo ubutumwa bushimangira ko Yesu yitangiye Isi kugira ngo akize abayituye ibyaha byabo.
GisÃ¨le Precious ari mu bahanzi bahimbaza Imana bâ€™igitsina gore mu babarizwa mu Itorero rya ADEPR, bari gukora cyane. Indirimbo ye nshya â€˜Mbega Urukundoâ€™ yatunganyijwe na Producer Clement The Guitarist mu buryo bwâ€™amajwi.
Uyu muhanzi yabwiye IGIHE ko yayanditse ashaka gutanga ubutumwa bwibutsa abantu urukundo Yesu yakunze abâ€™Isi kandi badakwiriye.
Yagize ati â€œNi indirimbo nziza ikangurira abantu gufatanyiriza hamwe kuririmba urwo rukundo kugira ngo nâ€™abatararumenya barumenye!â€™â€™
GisÃ¨le Precious yavuze ko mu gihe hakomeje gukazwa ingamba zo kurwanya Coronavirus yugarije Isi, bikwiye ko baniyubaka mu buryo bwâ€™umwuka.
Ati â€œTurusheho no gufata izindi ngamba zubaka ubugingo bwacu turushaho kwegere Imana, gusenga cyane kandi ntiduterwe ubwoba nâ€™ibiriho ngo bitwibagize nâ€™ibindi bikomeye Imana yatunyujijemo ntibiduhitane.â€™â€™
Mu mishinga ye, GisÃ¨le Precious arateganya gukora indirimbo nyinshi no gutegura ibitaramo mu bice bitandukanye byâ€™igihugu bijyanye nâ€™uko Uwiteka azamushoboza.
Izina rya GisÃ¨le Precious ryatangiye kumenyekana mu ruhame mu 2018 ubwo yatumirwaga mu gitaramo cyo gutangiza iserukiramuco rya Gikirisitu ryiswe â€œRabagirana Worship Festivalâ€ ku wa 4 Ugushyingo 2018.
Icyo gihe uyu mukobwa waserukanye gitari ye, akayicuranga bya gihanga yishimiwe na benshi, banyurwa nâ€™umuziki we.
Tariki ya 16 Kamena 2019 yongeye kwandika amateka mashya mu rugendo rwe rwa muzika kuko nibwo yakoze igitaramo cye cya mbere cyiswe â€œImbaraga Live Concertâ€ cyabereye kuri ADEPR Gisenyi.
Nsabimana Precious yatangiye kuririmba akiri umwana. Urugendo rwâ€™ubuhanzi ku giti cye yarutangiye mu 2017. Asengera muri ADEPR Gatenga ndetse umubyeyi we ni pasiteri muri iri torero. Kuva atangiye umuziki amaze gushyira hanze indirimbo zirindwi zirimo â€œImbaraga zâ€™amasengeshoâ€, â€œUrampagijeâ€, â€œNiweâ€, â€œInzira zayoâ€ nâ€™izindi.
Mu mwaka ushize kandi Precious yatangije Anointed Band, itsinda rihuriyemo abakobwa nâ€™abagore bahimbaza Imana. Yaserutse bwa mbere iririmba muri Rabagirana Worship Festival yabereye muri Dove Hotel ku Gisozi ku wa 10 Ugushyingo 2019.
