Title: Burya dusangiye gupfa no gukira!
Body:
Hari benshi barajwe ishinga no gushakisha inkomoko yâ€™iki cyorezo cya coronavirus. Byaba bituruka ku makosa cyangwa ubushake bwâ€™umuntu, byaba bikomoka ku mihindagurikire yâ€™ikirere cyangwa ku misazire yâ€™isi nkâ€™uko bamwe babivuga, icyo tubona ni uko twese dusangiye gupfa no gukira.
Hari benshi barajwe ishinga no gushakisha inkomoko yâ€™iki cyorezo cya coronavirus. Byaba bituruka ku makosa cyangwa ubushake bwâ€™umuntu, byaba bikomoka ku mihindagurikire yâ€™ikirere cyangwa ku misazire yâ€™isi nkâ€™uko bamwe babivuga, icyo tubona ni uko twese dusangiye gupfa no gukira.
Iki cyorezo cyadushyize ku munzani wâ€™ubuzima kandi cyitwereka ko ibyâ€™ingenzi ari ibyo duhuje kurusha ibidutandukanya.
Abakomeye nâ€™aboroheje, abami nâ€™abatware bahuje icyifuzo nâ€™aboro! Twese turasaba Imana kubaho. Intambara zari zarananiranye zerekanye ko burya turwaniraga ubusa, nazo ziraceceka! Twese twabonye akanya ko kwitekerezaho, maze tubona ko dusangiye gupfa no gukira koko!
Dusangiye gukira: Twese twaremwe mu ishusho yâ€™Imana kandi iduha Ubuhanga, Ubwenge, ubwigenge nâ€™umutima ukunda kugira ngo tubashe gukora ugushaka kwayo, harimo kugenga ibindi biremwa no kubana neza mu rukundo nâ€™abandi. Twese twaremewe gusingiza Imana no kubana nayo (Reba Yh 17).
Dusangiye gupfa: Dusangiye gupfa nkâ€™uko dusangiye ingaruka zâ€™icyaha cyâ€™inkomoko. Kuva ubwo Muntu yasuzuguraga Imana, agashaka kunganya ubwenge nayo ndetse akumva ashaka no kuyirusha, Imana yamusubije mu mwanya we ariko iranamuhana. Bityo aba asemeye bene muntu twese.
Uhoraho abwira umugore ati â€œNzongera imiruho yawe igihe utwite, maze uzabyare ubabaye, uzahora wifuza umugabo waweâ€. None se Babyeyi babyaye, ni nde wabyaye atababaye cyangwa atamennye amaraso? Kuva ubwo twese dusangiye gupfa no gukira. (Intg 3, 16).
Â Uhoraho abwira nâ€™umugabo ati â€˜Kuko wansuzuguye, Umugati wawe uzawurya wiyushye akuya kugeza ubwo uzasubira mu gitaka, kuko ari cyo wavuyemo. Koko rero uri umukungugu, kandi uzasubira mu mukunguguâ€. (Intg 3, 17-19). Ibi se ntitubihuriyeho, ntiturya ari uko twiyushye akuya? Nyamara tujye twibuka ko dusangiye gupfa no gukira.
Iki gihe rero si igihe cyo gushakisha inkomoko yâ€™icyorezo gusa ahubwo ni igihe cyo gufashanya nkâ€™abahuje gupfa no gukira. Niba twese duhuje ibibazo niduhuze no gushakisha ibisubizo, cyane cyane twita ku mbabare nâ€™abatishoboye. Ni igihe kandi cyo kugendera mu gushaka kwâ€™Imana!
Bavandimwe nkâ€™uko tubibonye umubabaro nâ€™ibyago byacu byakomotse ku gusuzugura Imana; aho umuntu wa mbere yihaye gushaka kuresha nayo! Nâ€™uyu munsi hari ibyo tubona ukabona ko Muntu yagiye ashyira imbere ubuhanga, ubwenge bwe ndetse agakora ibyo yishakiye aho kugira ngo byose bigende uko Imana yabigennye.
Dukomeze gusenga twizeye ngo Imana idukize ibyaha byacu kandi iturengere idukize iki cyorezo.
Dusenge Nkâ€™uko Uhoraho yabibwiye Dawudi ati â€œNtacyo ntagukoreye niba kandi bidahagije nzongeraho nâ€™ibindi (2 Sam 12, 7-8) Natwe, turagushimira Nyagasani kubera ibyiza byose wadukoreye ariko kandi tugarutse imbere yawe nâ€™umutima unyuzwe nabyo, tunagusaba ngo wongereho nâ€™ibindi byiza, utugirire Impuhwe maze udutabare ikibi cyugarije isi. Ni wowe wivugiye ngo igihe kirageze ngo ndengere umuryango wanjye: turengere nkâ€™uko warengeye Daniyeli ukamukura mu rwobo rwâ€™intare zishonje, nkâ€™uko warengeye abayisiraheli bakurikiranywe nâ€™ingabo za Farawo.
 Dutabare nkâ€™uko watabaye Pahulo mu Nzu yâ€™imbohe, maze inzugi zâ€™uburoko zigafunguka, turwanirire ishyaka nkâ€™uko warirwaniriye abavandimwe batatu (Meshaki, Sadaraka na Abedenego) baciriwe urwo gupfa, bakarohwa mu muriro ugurumana ariko ukohereza umumalayika wawe agatemberana nabo mu muriro, maze bose bagatangarira izina ryawe. Ubwo twiyemeje kukugarukira no kongera kukubera abana, ngwino utubere Imana, natwe tuguhoranire icyubahiro hejuru ya byose. Ku bwa Yezu Kristu Umwami wacu. Amenâ€.

Title: Ibihe turimo birusheho gutuma twiyegereza Imana
Body:
Turi mu rugendo tutabona neza icyerekezo nâ€™iherezo ari ko kandi hari icyizere cyo gutabarwa. Tumeze nkâ€™Aburahamu igihe yari mu nzira ajya gutura umwana we Izaki, umwana akamubaza ati â€œDawe! Ko mbona umuriro nâ€™inkwi, intama yo gutamba irava heâ€ ? Aburahamu akamusubiza atiâ€œImana iri burebe aho yibonera intama yo gutamba, Mwana wanjyeâ€ (Reba Intg 22, 6-8).
Turi mu rugendo tutabona neza icyerekezo nâ€™iherezo ari ko kandi hari icyizere cyo gutabarwa. Tumeze nkâ€™Aburahamu igihe yari mu nzira ajya gutura umwana we Izaki, umwana akamubaza ati â€œDawe! Ko mbona umuriro nâ€™inkwi, intama yo gutamba irava heâ€ ? Aburahamu akamusubiza atiâ€œImana iri burebe aho yibonera intama yo gutamba, Mwana wanjyeâ€ (Reba Intg 22, 6-8).
Natwe, turibaza tuti ko Icyorezo cya Coronavirus gikomeje kurimbura imbaga, igisubizo kizava he!
Isi iri mu bihe bikomeye byo guhangana nâ€™icyorezo cya Coronavirus. Ibintu byose byahagaze! Abantu bikingiranye mu nzu zabo. Bamwe babonye akanya ko gutekereza ku buzima muri iyi si, ubuzima twakira ariko kandi bukaducika tubureba! Abandi nabo bahugiye mu gushaka inkomoko yâ€™iki cyorezo babaye nkâ€™abigishwa ba Yezu, bo bamubajije igihe bahuraga nâ€™umuntu wavutse afite ubuhumyi, bati â€œMwigisha, uwacumuye ni nde! Ni uyu muntu cyangwa ni ababyeyi beâ€( Yh 9, 2)! Natwe muri ibi bihe dushobora kubaza Imana tuti â€œNi nde waduteje iki cyorezo koko! Ni nde Nyirabayazana?â€
Bavandimwe, icyâ€™ingenzi si uguhugira mu kwibaza icyateye iyi ndwara. Ahubwo icyâ€™ingenzi ni ukuyirwanya uko dushoboye no kuyikuramo isomo rikomeye ndetse rishobora guhindura imyumvire nâ€™imibereho yacu, imbere yâ€™abandi nâ€™imbere yâ€™Imana.
Twari dusanzwe tubona igihe cyo gusenga tukagikoresha nabi, Imana tukayiburira umwanya, Umunsi wâ€™Imana tukawusimbuza ibindi twaburiye umwanya cyangwa ibindi byo kwinezeza! None rero iki gihe tugarukire Imana no kuyihungiraho kuko ari yo yonyine mutabazi. Tumurikirwe nâ€™iri jambo riri mu gitabo cyâ€™umuhanuzi Hozeya rigira riti â€œNimuze tugarukire Uhoraho. Niwe wadukomerekeje kandi niwe uzatuvura, niwe wadukubise, ni nawe uzomora ibikomere byacuâ€ (Hoz 6, 1).
Twari tuzi ko abahanga nâ€™abanyabwenge nâ€™iyi si ntacyabasoba kuko bakoze nâ€™ibindi byinshi byiza tugatangara! Nkâ€™uko Zaburi ya 23 ibidusaba dukurikire ibyo Nyagasani adusaba kuko ari we mushumba wacu. Niwe dukwiye kwiringira aho kwiringira umwana wâ€™umuntu.
Bamwe bibwiraga ko bari hejuru yâ€™abandi kubera ubutunzi bwâ€™isi barushanywa icyubahiro, ubwiza bwâ€™isura, inkomoko, amavuko nâ€™ibindi! None twabonye ko hari igihe ibiremwa byose bireshya, usumba abandi akaba ari uzi guca bugufi imbere yâ€™Imana. Nibyo koko Imana ntireba nkâ€™abantu.
Imana ntireba nkâ€™abantu. Ibyo tubona bisa nkâ€™ibikomeye imbere yâ€™Imana biroroshye. Ibyo tudafitiye igisubizo Nyagasani aragifite. Erega iyo Nyagasani tumusabye ntahite aduha icyo tumusabye aba agira ngo asuzume Ukwihangana kwacu! Nkâ€™uko umuhanuzi Ezekiyeli abivuga ahumuriza abantu bo mu gihe cye ati â€œNimuhumure, uhoraho arahibereyeâ€ . (Ezk 48, 35)!
Igihe turimo ni igihe cyo kuba maso. Nkâ€™uko Pawulo mutagatifu abitubwira mu ibaruwa yandikiye abanyefezi agira ati â€˜Kanguka wowe usinziriye! Haguruka uve mu bapfuye maze Kristu akumurikireâ€ (Ef 5, 14). Abapfuye Pawulo yavugaga ni ababaho mu mwijima bagahunga urumuri rwa Kristu rugaragazwa nâ€™ibikorwa byiza.
Turasabwa kugenza nkâ€™abana bâ€™urumuri. Tukava mu byaha nâ€™ibindi byose bidutandukanya nâ€™Imana kuko aribwo tuzaronka ubutungane nyakuri. (Ef 5, 8-12).
Nyagasani ntiyazanywe no gukiza intungane ahubwo yazanywe no kiza abarwayi nâ€™abanyabyaha. Nka wa Muntu wari waravutse afite ubuhumyi, dupfukamire Imana, tuyinginge kandi duhamye ukwemera kwacu. (Yh 9, 35-38).
Dusenge: â€œNyagasani, icyi Cyumweru cyari icyâ€™ubucengezanema ku bitegura kubatizwa ari bakuru. Natwe turapfukamye ngo uducengezemo inema zawe, tumenye neza ugushaka kwawe muri ibi bihe, maze icyo ushaka abe aricyo gikorwa.
Nyagasani, turakwinginze ngo udukize ibyago byose, ibi bihe turimo ubisakazemo amahoro aturuka iwawe. Impuhwe zawe niziturengere, zidukize icyaha cyose, ziturinde amakuba yose, Mu gihe tugitegereje ya mizero mahire nâ€™ukuza kâ€™Umukiza wacu Yezu Kristu. Kuko ubwami nâ€™ububasha nâ€™ikuzo ari ibyawe iteka ryose. Amenâ€.
Nyagasani Yezu nabane namwe!
Padiri Victor AMERIKA

Title: Amadini yahinduye umuvuno mu misengere no kwakira amaturo yâ€™abayoboke
Body:
Kuva tariki ya 14 Werurwe Guverinoma yâ€™u Rwanda, yafashe icyemezo cyâ€™uko ibikorwa bihuriza hamwe abantu benshi byose bihagarikwa birimo no kujya mu nsengero, kugira ngo hakumirwe ikwirakwira ryâ€™icyorezo cya COVID-19 giterwa na Coronavirus.
Kuva tariki ya 14 Werurwe Guverinoma yâ€™u Rwanda, yafashe icyemezo cyâ€™uko ibikorwa bihuriza hamwe abantu benshi byose bihagarikwa birimo no kujya mu nsengero, kugira ngo hakumirwe ikwirakwira ryâ€™icyorezo cya COVID-19 giterwa na Coronavirus.
Kuva iki cyemezo cyafatwa amadini nâ€™amatorero yasabye abakirisitu babo gusengera mu ngo, amwe yifashisha za radiyo, Televiziyo na YouTube mu gukomeza gufasha abakristu bayo kumva inyigisho zâ€™ijambo ryâ€™Imana.
Ibi bisobanuye ko amaturo yatangwaga mu gihe cya misa nâ€™amateraniro atatanzwe ku cyumweru nkâ€™ubwo byari bisanzwe bigenda.
IGIHE yamenye ko hari amwe mu madini yasabye abayoboke bayo kujya bakusanya ayo maturo bagashaka umunsi bakayohereza. Urugero ni ubutumwa bwa Paruwasi Gatolika ya Rwamagana, busaba abakirisitu kwegeranya ubushobozi bwabo bakajya babwohereza buri cyumweru.
Umwe mu bakirisitu Gatulika utashatse kuvuga amazina ye, yabwiye IGIHE ko kuba bakusanya amaturo bakayatanga nta kibazo bitwaye ngo ikibazo ni uko byaba itegeko, yavuze ko nâ€™ubusanzwe umuntu aba afite ituro yageneye gutanga buri cyumweru bitewe nâ€™icyo yaronse.
Bamwe mu bayobozi bâ€™amadini nâ€™amatorero babwiye IGIHE uburyo bari gukoresha mu kugeza ubutumwa bwiza ku bakristu babo ndetse nâ€™uburyo bari kwifashisha mu kubona amaturo.
Umushumba wa Arikidiyosezi ya Kigali, Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda, yavuze ko kuri ubu bari kwifashisha za radiyo, televiziyo na YouTube mu kwegereza abakristu ijambo ryâ€™Imana.
Ati â€œInyigisho turi kwifashisha ziranyura kuri Radiyo Maria, buri munsi haba igitambo cyâ€™Ukaristiya mu gitondo na saa 12h15 mu karuhuko, hanyuma ku cyumweru twifashishije radiyo na televiziyo byâ€™igihugu, turi no gusaba ngo kuri iki cyumweru bazaduhe umwanya kuko inyigisho twatanze zafashije abantu. Nimugoroba twifashisha televiziyo ya Isango Star ari nako dutoza abakristu gusengera mu rugo bifashishije umukuru wâ€™umuryango.â€
Ku kijyanye nâ€™uburyo abakristu batanga amaturo, Musenyeri Kambanda, yavuze ko bifashisha nimero zâ€™abapadiri bakuru abakristu baba basanganwe bakoherezaho amaturo bakoresheje uburyo bwa Mobile Money.
Ati â€œAmaturo rero hari abakristu kugeza ubu babizirikana bakaba batwoherereza kuri Mobile Money, mu rwego rwo gushyigikira imirimo yâ€™abasaseridoti ni iyo mirimo yâ€™ubutumwa, kandi niyo hagize uzana ituro ryâ€™abakene kuko buriya tuba tunazirikana nâ€™abakene batugana bashonje, gusa ntabwo turashyiraho uburyo bufatika ubu bikorwa nâ€™abakristu babizirikana.â€
Yavuze ko abakirisitu akenshi baba bafite nimero za Padiri Mukuru â€œUko nâ€™ubundi bamuhamagara bamwiyambaza kuri serivisi zinyuranye umwe umwe, ni nako babikora gusa turi gutekereza uko twabinoza.â€
Umushumba wa Diyosezi ya Gahini mu Itorero ryâ€™Abangilikani, Dr Gahima Manasseh we yavuze ko kuva amateraniro yo mu ruhame ahagaritswe basabye abakristu kongera uburyo bwo gusenga nubwo bari iwabo mu rugo kandi birinda kujya mu ruhame.
Ku kijyane nâ€™uburyo bakiramo amaturo yagize ati â€œNta ngamba twagifatiye kuko siyo yâ€™ingenzi, duhuzwa nâ€™abakristu no kubabwira ijambo ryâ€™Imana no kubakangurira ibyâ€™agakiza, iyo hagize ushaka kuyatanga akoresha Mobile Money kuko ababitsi bâ€™amaparuwasi barazwi.â€
Umuyobozi wâ€™Itorero Foursquare Rwanda, Dr Bishop FidÃ¨le Masengo, we yabwiye IGIHE bo bari gukoresha YouTube na Facebook yâ€™Itorero mu kugeza ubutumwa bwiza ku bakristu.
Ku kijyanye nâ€™uburyo bakira amaturo yagize ati â€œDufite itangazo riba rinyura hasi ryereka abantu uburyo batangamo amaturo bifashishije Mobile Money na konti zâ€™urusengero gusa ntabwo tubitindaho cyane kuko abantu batari kuza mu rusengero.â€
Mu itangazo ryashyizwe hanze nâ€™Itorero ryâ€™Abadiventisiti bâ€™Umunsi wa Karindwi ryashyizweho umukono na Pasiteri Habyarimana Jean FranÃ§ois rivuga ko ku isabato buri muryango uzateranira mu rugo, kandi gahunda zose nkâ€™uko zikorwa ku isabato zizakurikizwa (ishuri ryo ku isabato, indirimbo, gutanga icyacumi nâ€™amaturoâ€¦)â€
Rikomeza rigira riti â€œBuri muryango ni itorero ayo maraporo azashyikirizwe abayobozi bâ€™igihande nabo bayageze ku mubitsi. Abatabona uko bahura nâ€™umubitsi wâ€™itorero ariko bakaba babona uburyo bagera kuri banki, turabaha numero za konti mwashyiraho ibyera byâ€™Uwiteka mwakoresha nâ€™ubundi buryo bwâ€™ikoranabuhanga.â€
Kugeza ubu Minisiteri yâ€™Ubuzima imaze gutangaza ko mu Rwanda abantu 11 ari bo bamaze kugaragaza ibimenyetso byâ€™uko banduye icyorezo cya COVID-19 giterwa Coronavirus.
Abaturarwanda bose bakaba basabwa gukomeza kwitwararika, bakurikiza amabwiriza yâ€™inzego zâ€™ubuzima hibandwa cyane cyane ku gukaraba intoki, kwirinda kujya ahantu hateraniye abantu benshi no kwirinda ingendo zitari ngombwa.

Title: Kigali: Yibye igikoresho gitagatifu â€˜Ostensoirâ€™ muri Kiliziya azi ko ari zahabu
Body:
Umusore utaramenyekana yinjiye muri Kiliziya yitiriwe Mutagatifu Visenti Pallotti i Gikondo mu mujyi wa Kigali, yiba igikoresho gitagatifu cyifashishwa mu kumurika ukarisitiya cyizwi nka "Ostensoir".
Umusore utaramenyekana yinjiye muri Kiliziya yitiriwe Mutagatifu Visenti Pallotti i Gikondo mu mujyi wa Kigali, yiba igikoresho gitagatifu cyifashishwa mu kumurika ukarisitiya cyizwi nka "Ostensoir".
Mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki ya 26 Gashyantare 2020, nibwo uwo musore yahengereye umukirisitu wa nyuma wari muri iyi Paruwasi ya Gikondo asohotse, na we ahita yinjira yiba Ostensoir.
Padiri wa Paruwasi ya Gikondo, Rwasa Chrysante, yabwiye IGIHE ko uwo musore yibye iki gitereko cyâ€™isakaramentu azi ko abonye zahabu.
Yagize ati â€œUmusore yaje ejo mu gitondo mbere ya misa aterura isakaramentu aragenda. Nta bantu bari barimo, yacunze uwa nyuma asohotse muri ako kanya aragenda arayitwara.â€
Rwasa yavuze ko bahise bamenyesha inzego zâ€™umutekano kandi ngo hari amakuru yâ€™ibanze ashobora gutuma uwibye icyo gikoresho afatwa.
Yavuze ko abajura bakunze kwiba za Ostensoirs bakeka ko ari zahabu yâ€™umwimerere, nyamara ziba zikozwe muri zahabu yâ€™umwomekano.
Ostensoir yibwe ifite agaciro kari hagati yâ€™ibihumbi 600 na miliyoni 1 yâ€™amafaranga yâ€™u Rwanda.

Title: Itorero Angilikani mu Rwanda ryemeje ishyirwaho rya Diyoseze nshya nâ€™Umwepisikopi wayo wa mbere
Body:
Itorero Angilikani mu Rwanda ryatangaje ko ryungutse Diyoseze nshya ya Karongi, izatahwa ku wa 31 Gicurasi 2020 ari nabwo hazimikwa Umwepisikopi wayo wa mbere, Rev. Jean Pierre Methode Rukundo.
Itorero Angilikani mu Rwanda ryatangaje ko ryungutse Diyoseze nshya ya Karongi, izatahwa ku wa 31 Gicurasi 2020 ari nabwo hazimikwa Umwepisikopi wayo wa mbere, Rev. Jean Pierre Methode Rukundo.
Byemejwe nâ€™inama yâ€™Inama yâ€™Abepisikopi (House of Bishops ) yateraniye mu Karere ka Musanze muri Diyoseze ya Shyira ku wa Gatanu tariki 15 Gashyantare 2020.
Itangazo ryashyizweho umukono nâ€™Umwepisikopi Mukuru wâ€™Itorero Angilikani mu Rwanda, Dr.Laurent Mbanda ryerekana ko byo iyo nama yemeje harimo gushyiraho Diyoseze ya Karongi izaba igizwe nâ€™iyahoze ari Intara ya Kibuye.
Iyo nama yanatoye uzaba Umwepisikopi wa mbere wâ€™iyo Diyoseze nshya Rev. Jean Pierre Methode Rukundo uzimikwa ubwo izaba itahwa ku mugaragaro ku itariki ya 31 Gicurasi 2020.
Itorero rya Angilikani rifite abayoboke barenga miliyoni imwe kuva ritangiye mu Rwanda mu 1992 ryari rigizwe na Diyosezi 11, ubu zikaba zibaye 12.
Rev. Jean Pierre Methode Rukundo afite impamyabumenyi ihanitse muri Tewologiya nâ€™Iterambere (Theology and Development) yayikuye i Nairobi muri Kenya.
Yakoze imirimo itandukanye harimo kuba Pasitoro muri za Paruwasi, kuyobora ishami ryâ€™iterambere muri Diyosezi ya Shyogwe. Ubu ni Umunyamabanga Mukuru wâ€™Itorero Anglikani ryâ€™u Rwanda.
Kubera ubuzima bubi yakuriyemo nyuma yâ€™uko ababyeyi be batandukanye afite imyaka ine bigatuma amara umwaka mu buzima bwo ku muhanda ariko akaza kugira amahirwe ya kabiri yamufashije kwiga, Rev. Jean Pierre Methode Rukundo yashinze umuryango yise amahirwe ya kabiri â€œSecond Chance Rukundo Ministryâ€ ufasha abagize ibibazo bitandukanye kongera kugaruka mu buzima.

Title: Korali Iriba yâ€™i Huye igiye kwizihiza isabukuru yâ€™imyaka 25 imaze mu ivugabutumwa
Body:
Korali Iriba ikorera umurimo wâ€™ivugabutumwa ryâ€™indirimbo muri ADEPR Paruwasi ya Taba mu Karere ka Huye mu Ntara yâ€™Amajyepfo, yinjiye mu bikorwa byâ€™urukundo bigamije gufasha abatishoboye mu myiteguro yo kwizihiza isabukuru yâ€™imyaka 25 imaze.
Korali Iriba ikorera umurimo wâ€™ivugabutumwa ryâ€™indirimbo muri ADEPR Paruwasi ya Taba mu Karere ka Huye mu Ntara yâ€™Amajyepfo, yinjiye mu bikorwa byâ€™urukundo bigamije gufasha abatishoboye mu myiteguro yo kwizihiza isabukuru yâ€™imyaka 25 imaze.
Iyi korali yashinzwe ku wa 15 Gashyantare 1995, yatangijwe nâ€™abantu 18. Izina ryayo ryamenyekanye cyane mu ndirimbo zirimo â€˜â€˜Nta kibashaâ€™â€™, â€˜â€˜Witinyaâ€™â€™, â€˜â€˜Turiho ku bwâ€™ubuntuâ€™â€™, â€˜â€˜Urakomeyeâ€™â€™ na â€˜â€˜Icyampaâ€™â€™.
Mu kwizihiza isabukuru yâ€™imyaka 25 imaze ishinzwe, Korali Iriba yatangije ibikorwa byagutse byiswe â€œIribaWeekâ€ bibanziriza ibyo birori biteganyijwe ku wa 16 Gashyantare 2020.
Korali Iriba yinjiye mu cyumweru cyâ€™ibikorwa bibimburira isabukuru yâ€™imyaka 25 biteganyijwe ku 3-9 Gashyantare 2020. Ni icyumweru cyateguwemo ibikorwa byo kubakira ubwiherero imiryango itanu itishoboye nâ€™ibindi bikorwa byâ€™urukundo.
Abajijwe impamvu bahisemo kubakira abatishoboye, Umuyobozi wa Korali Iriba, Mukasine Jeanne Dâ€™arc, yavuze ko bifuje kuvuga ubutumwa mu bikorwa.
Yagize ati â€œTwahisemo noneho kuvuga ubutumwa mu bikorwa kuko binazamura imibereho yâ€™abantu, iki gikorwa kizakomeza nâ€™ibindi twateguye.â€™â€™
Biteganyijwe ko ku wa 15 Gashyantare, Korali Iriba izagira umwiherero wo gushima Imana, naho ku wa 16 Gashyantare 2020 kuva saa Munani, ikore igitaramo cyâ€™amashimwe akubiye muri Zaburi ya 107, kizabera ku rusengero rwa ADEPR Taba mu Karere ka Huye.
Abazacyitabira bazataramirwa na Korali Iriba ifatanyije na Korali Itabaza. Umuvugabutumwa uzakibwirizamo ni Umuvugizi wa ADEPR, Karuranga Ephrem.
Mu myaka 25, Korali Iriba ishima buri wese wagize uruhare mu kugira ngo umurimo ukomeze gutera imbere.
Korali Iriba igizwe nâ€™abarenga 130 bari mu byiciro bitandukanye biganjemo abatuye mu duce two mu Mujyi wa Huye turimo Matyazo no ku Itaba nâ€™abakorera mu bindi bice byâ€™igihugu.
Mu myaka 25 imaze mu ivugabutumwa, Korali Iriba yashyize hanze album enye zâ€™amajwi nâ€™eshatu zâ€™amashusho.

Title: Gatsibo: Umupasiteri nâ€™Umubwiriza barwaniye mu materaniro, harakekwa ko bapfuye amaturo
Body:
Pasiteri Ignace Mbaraga, nâ€™Umubwiriza witwa Sayinzoga Alex bakunze kwita Said, bo mu itorero Inkuru Nziza, barwaniye mu materaniro ku cyumweru tariki 26 Mutarama 2020.
Pasiteri Ignace Mbaraga, nâ€™Umubwiriza witwa Sayinzoga Alex bakunze kwita Said, bo mu itorero Inkuru Nziza, barwaniye mu materaniro ku cyumweru tariki 26 Mutarama 2020.
Amakuru agera kuri IGIHE aravuga ko abo bagabo barwaniye imbere yâ€™abayoboke bâ€™ishami ryâ€™Itorero Inkuru Nziza, riherereye mu Murenge wa Ngarama mu Karere ka Gatsibo.
Abakristu bahise batabaza inzego zâ€™umutekano, ubu abo bagabo bombi bacumbikiwe kuri Sitasiyo yâ€™Urwego rwâ€™Ubugenzacyaha ya Ngarama.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa wâ€™Umurenge wa Ngarama Rugaravu Jean Claude yabwiye IGIHE ko basanze bapfa amakimbirane bari bafitanye ashingiye ku kutubahana nubwo hari amakuru avuga ko baba bapfuye amaturo.
Ati â€œBarwanye bari bafitanye amatiku mu Itorero ryabo yo gusuzugurana, ejo rero barashwanye barwanira mu rusengero bari mu materaniro.â€
Yavuze ko abakristu bahise babatabaza nkâ€™inzego zâ€™ibanze bafatanyije nâ€™izâ€™umutekano basanga koko bari gushwana.
Ati â€œTwahise tuhagera abakristu badutabaje, dusanga barimo bashwana birumvikana bagombaga guhita bafatwa bagafungwa kuko bari bateje amakimbirane mu bakristu.â€
Rugaravu yabwiye IGIHE ko iryo shami ryâ€™itorero Inkuru Nziza bari baranarifungiye urusengero rikoreramo kubera rutujuje ibyangombwa, nyuma riza gukomeza amateraniro rwihishwa.
Ati â€œNi itorero ubona ritanashinga twari twaranarifunze nyuma biza kugaragara ko baje kugenda bagasubiramo bataratubwira ariko ntabwo bapfa amaturo kuko si itorero rifatika. Barafunzwe bari muri RIB Ngarama.â€
Rugaravu asaba abaturage kwirinda amakimbirane ariko na none afatiye kuri iryo torero asaba abakristu gusengera mu nsengero zujuje ibyangombwa.
Si ubwa mbere humvikana imirwano mu bayoboke bâ€™itorero ryâ€™Inkuru Nziza kuko nko mu 2017 abayobozi baryo bo mu Karere ka Ngoma ahitwa ku Cyasemakamba bafatanye mu mashati barwanira imbere yâ€™imbaga yâ€™abayoboke yari yagiye kumva ijambo ryâ€™Imana bapfa amaturo no kuba bamwe barimuwe bakanga kujya aho bimuriwe bitwaje ko nta maturo atubutse ahaboneka.
Icyo gihe bamwe baranakomeretse kuko byageze nâ€™aho bakristu bajya muri iyo mirwano yashyamiranyije abari bahasanzwe nâ€™abari bahimuriwe.
Amakimbirane mu matorero akomeje kuvugwa no mu bindi bihugu. Mu minsi ishize mu mujyi wa Mombasa, muri Kenya, Elisha Misiko wâ€™imyaka 55, yiyahuye nyuma yo kwica umugore we Ann Mghoi amutsinze mu rusengero bafatanyije gushinga rwitwa Ground of God â€˜s gospel Ministries.

Title: I Kibeho ku butaka butagatifu hagiye kubakwa Bazilika
Body:
Kiliziya Gatolika ku bufatanye nâ€™Akarere ka Nyaruguru igiye gutangira imirimo yo kubaka Bazilika mu gace kabereyemo amabonekerwa ka Kibeho.
Kiliziya Gatolika ku bufatanye nâ€™Akarere ka Nyaruguru igiye gutangira imirimo yo kubaka Bazilika mu gace kabereyemo amabonekerwa ka Kibeho.
Nyuma yâ€™aho Igishushanyo mbonera cyerekana imiterere yâ€™iyi Basilika kigiriye hanze, kuwa 9 Mutarama Ubuyobozi bwâ€™Akarere ka Nyaruguru nâ€™ubwa Kiliziya Gatolika bwahuye nâ€™abazayubaka kugira ngo harebwe uburyo imirimo yo kuyubaka izashyirwa mu bikorwa.
Umuyobozi wâ€™Akarere ka Nyaruguru Habitegeko FranÃ§ois yavuze ko imirimo yâ€™ibanze yo kubaka iyi Bazilika igeze kure ndetse ko mu 2021 izaba yuzuye.
Yagize ati â€œIzuzura mu Ugushyingo 2021. Imirimo yâ€™ibanze irimo iyâ€™inyigo no gushyiraho ikigega kigamije gukusanya inkunga yararangiyeâ€.
Iyi Bazilika izaba yubatse ku butaka butagatifu bwâ€™i Kibeho busanzwe bugendererwa nâ€™Abakirisitu batari bake kubera amabonekerwa yahabereye mu myaka ya 1980.
Kuri ubu inzego zose bireba zarangije gusuzuma ibikenewe, bikaba biteganyijwe ko imirimo yo kubaka iyi Bazilika izatwara amafaranga yâ€™u Rwanda agera kuri miliyari 70.
Binyuze kuri Twitter, ubuyobozi bwâ€™Akarere ka Nyaruguru bwasabye abikorera gushora imari muri Nyaruguru, cyane cyane mu bijyanye nâ€™ibikorwa remezo byâ€™ubukerarugendo nâ€™amahoteli.
Ubuyobozi bwâ€™Akarere ka Nyaruguru buvuga ko kandi iyi Bazilika izaba ifite ibindi bikorwa remezo birimo inzu zâ€™amacumbi zishobora basanzwe bagenderera aka karere buri mwaka mu ngendo zâ€™iyobokamana, byâ€™umwihariko abaza ku munsi wizihizwaho kujya mu ijuru kwa Bikira Mariya.
Tariki 28 Ugushyingo 1981, ni bwo Bikira Mariya yabonekeye umukobwa wa mbere witwa Mumureke Alphonsine wigaga mu Rwunge rwâ€™Amashuri rwa MÃ¨re du Verbe i Kibeho.
Nyuma yâ€™umwaka umwe, yongeye kubonekera uwitwa Mukamazimpaka Anathalie, nyuma yongera kubonekera Mukangango Marie Claire na bo bigaga kuri iryo shuri. Bose yabahaga ubutumwa bagomba kugeza ku batuye Isi.

Title: Iki cyorezo cyagaragaje ko nta gihangange, dukeneye ubufasha bwâ€™Imana- Mgr Kambanda
Body:
Umushumba wa Arikidiyosezi ya Kigali akaba nâ€™Umuyobozi wa Diyosize ya Kibungo, Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda yavuze ko icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyugarije Isi muri iki gihe cyagaragaje ko nta gihangage kiri mu Isi bityo ko bisaba kwiyambaza Imana cyane igatanga ubufasha.
Umushumba wa Arikidiyosezi ya Kigali akaba nâ€™Umuyobozi wa Diyosize ya Kibungo, Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda yavuze ko icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyugarije Isi muri iki gihe cyagaragaje ko nta gihangage kiri mu Isi bityo ko bisaba kwiyambaza Imana cyane igatanga ubufasha.
Musenyeri Kambanda yabitangarije IGIHE kuri iki Cyumweru, mu gihe abayoboke ba Kiliziya Gatolika bizihiza umunsi wa Mashami bazirikanaho umunsi Yezu Kristu yinjiraga mu Murwa wa Yeruzalemu nkâ€™Umwami, abaturage bakamusasira imyenda yabo.
Mgr Kambanda yavuze ko muri Kiliziya Gatolika ari umunsi ukomeye cyane batangiriraho icyumweru gitagatifu.
Ati â€œNi icyumweru gikomeye mu mateka yâ€™ukwemera kwacu. Ni icyumweru kitwinjiza muri Pasika nyirâ€™izina nyuma yâ€™iminsi 40 tumaze mu gisibo twibuka ububabare bwa Nyagasani, ari nâ€™igihe cyo kwihana kugira ngo dushobore gutunganira Imana.â€
Mu bihe bisanzwe, umunsi nkâ€™uyu abakirisitu baturutse imihanda yose babaga bari mu nsengero bafite amashami yâ€™imikindo bishimira kwakira Yezu nkâ€™umwami wabo.
Kuri iki Cyumweru si ko biri bugende kuko abaturarwanda bari mu ngo zabo, bubahiriza amabwiriza yashyizweho na Guverinoma yo kwirinda icyorezo cya coronavirus gikomeje guhitana imbaga hirya no hino.
Kuba abantu bari mu ngo, Musenyeri Kambanda ntabibonamo ikibazo ahubwo avuga ko ari umwanya mwiza wo gusenga batakambira Imana kugira ngo itange ubufasha mu gutsinda Coronavirus kuko abatuye Isi bananiwe.
Ati â€œKuguma mu nzu biduha umwanya wo gusenga cyane cyane no kubona ko Imana ariyo ifite ububasha. Iki cyorezo cyagaragaraje ko nta mukuru, nta muto, nta gihangange. Ko nta mukire, nta mukene, twese twicisha bugufi. Abafite ubushobozi nâ€™intwaro zikomeye ntawe ushobora kukirwanya ngo agitsinde, bigaragara ko dukeneye ubufasha bwâ€™Imana.â€
Yavuze ko kuba ibihe bya Pasika bisanze abakirisitu bari mu ngo zabo, nta mpungenge biteye ku kwizihiza uwo munsi Yezu yatsinzeho urupfu, ngo kuko nâ€™Abiyisilaheli bizihirizaga Pasika mu ngo iwabo.
Ati â€œPasika Abiyisilaheli buri umwe yayizihirizaga mu rugo rwe, ngo Imana ibakingire urupfu baraye iri bubakure mu bucakara mu Misiri. Urugo rwarateranaga rukizihiza Pasika, rugasangira intama ya Pasika. Biratwibutsa rero ko natwe dushobora kwizihiza Pasika mu ngo zacu, umukuru wâ€™umuryango agateranya umuryango, agasenga bakumva ijambo ryâ€™Imana.â€
Ni ibihe byo kuzirikana ba nyakabyiziâ€¦
Gusabwa kuguma mu ngo, hari abo byabereye ihurizo cyane abaryaga ari uko bavuye gukora, bazwi nka ba nyakabyizi.
Leta yashyize uburyo bwo gufasha abantu nkâ€™abo badafite icyo barya muri ibi bihe, ariko siko bigera kuri buri wese bitewe nâ€™ubwinshi bwâ€™abakeneye ubufasha.
Musenyeri Kambanda yavuze ko muri ibi bihe, abakirisitu bafite ubushobozi bakwiriye kugoboka bagenzi babo batishoboye, bakagendera ku byo amategeko yâ€™Imana abasaba.
Ati â€œUrukundo rwa kivandimwe ari ryo tegeko rikuru ryâ€™Imana rudusaba ko tumenya abaturanyi, ba Lazaro bâ€™abakene duturanye tukabasangiza ku byo dufite bityo Imana yatwoherereje umwana wayo akemera kutubera igitambo ngo adutsindire urupfu, inaduherekeze mu gutsinda urupfu nâ€™iki cyorezo cyugarije isi.â€
Yavuze ko no ku rwego rwa Kiliziya Gatolika, batangiye gushishikariza imiryango remezo gukusanya inkunga, abishoboye bagafasha abakene.
Umuryango ufasha, Caritas wa Kiliziya Gatolika nawo watangiye kwegeranya inkunga yâ€™ibiribwa bikagezwa muri Paruwasi zitandukanye kugira ngo abatishoboye bagobokwe muri ibi bihe.
Musenyeri Kambanda yavuze ko bahereye cyane mu bice byâ€™imijyi kuko ariho hakenewe ubufasha kurusha ahandi.
Ati â€œNiho bibabaje cyane kuko mu cyaro ho iyo umuntu afite urutoki munsi yâ€™urugo, umurima wâ€™imyumbati cyangwa uwâ€™ibijumba, ntabwo aba amerewe nabi nkâ€™uri hano mu mujyi. Turashishikariza abari mu cyaro mu mirima guhinga kuko iki ni igihe cyo guhinga , ntibibacike kugira ngo ejo bazaramire nâ€™abandi.â€
Kugeza kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 4 Mata 2020, Minisiteri yâ€™Ubuzima mu Rwanda yagaragazaga ko umubare wâ€™abanduye coronavirus umaze kugera ku 102, mu gihe ku isi hose basaga miliyoni imwe. Bane nibo bamaze gusezererwa mu bitaro mu Rwanda.

Title: Icyo Imana idushakaho muri ibi bihe bya Pasika
Body:
Bavandimwe Kristu Yezu akuzwe, ku Cyumweru cya Mashami twibuka kandi tugahimbaza igihe Nyagasani Yezu yasesekaye mu murwa wa Yeruzalemu, akakirwa nkâ€™Umwami koko, agatambagizwa bikomeye, agakomerwa amashyi, akavugirizwa impundu akaririmbirwa. Nyamara icyo gihe nticyarambye kuko abamutambagije nibo bamuhindukanye bidatinze ngo nabambwe nabambwe!
Bavandimwe Kristu Yezu akuzwe, ku Cyumweru cya Mashami twibuka kandi tugahimbaza igihe Nyagasani Yezu yasesekaye mu murwa wa Yeruzalemu, akakirwa nkâ€™Umwami koko, agatambagizwa bikomeye, agakomerwa amashyi, akavugirizwa impundu akaririmbirwa. Nyamara icyo gihe nticyarambye kuko abamutambagije nibo bamuhindukanye bidatinze ngo nabambwe nabambwe!
Iki cyumweru kandi kitwinjiza mu cyumweru gitagatifu aho tuzirikana ku mateka yâ€™ugucungurwa kwacu, cyane cyane mu minsi nyabutatu ibanziriza Pasika: Uwa Kane Mutagatifu aho turarikirwa kuzazirikana ku isangira rya nyuma nâ€™umwami wacu Yezu Kristu. Ku wa Gatanu Mutagagatifu nkâ€™umunsi wâ€™ubutayu no kuzirikana ku mpamvu yo kwifatanya bucece na Yezu Kristu muri iyo nzira yâ€™umusaraba izatugeza ku gutsinda. Naho ku wa Gatandatu mutagatifu duhimbaza igitaramo cya Pasika kitwinjiza mu kuzirikana ku Izuka rya Kristu ari naryo shingiro ryâ€™ukwizera kwacu, kuko nkâ€™uko Pawulo Mutagatifu abivuga â€œniba Kristu atarazutse, ukwemera kwacu kwaba ari amanjweâ€ (Reba 1Kor 15, 17).
Iki gihe kandi cyo kwitegura Pasika, kije mu gihe isi yose iri mu bihe bidasanzwe byo guhangana nâ€™icyorezo cya Coronavirus, aho abantu bakomeje gupfa ari benshi hirya no hino ku isi. Ni igihe cyo kwiyinjiramo buri wese ukwe kugira ngo azabashe guhimbaza Pasika neza. Kimwe mu byatuma duhimbaza Pasika neza ni ukwisuzuma, tukamenya ko turi abanyabyaha, tugasaba imbabazi Imana nâ€™abo twahemukiye kandi buri wese akiyunga nâ€™umutima we.
Igihe cyâ€™ububabare cyegereje, Yezu yajyanye na bake mu bigishwa be ku musozi gusenga. Arababwira ati â€œUmutima wanjye urashavuye byo gupfa, Nimugume aha kandi mube maso hamwe nanjye mu gihe ngiye gusengaâ€ (Mt 26, 38). Yezu agarutse yasanze basinziriye, abwira umwe muri bo witwa Petero atiâ€œNi ibyo byawe, ntiwashoboye kuba maso nibura isaha imwe hamwe nanjye!â€ (Mt 26, 41). Yezu yarebye ukuntu bananiwe arababwira atiâ€œUmutima wâ€™Umuntu uharanira ibyiza ariko umubiri ukagira imbaraga nkeâ€!
Ni nkâ€™aho yakavuze ati â€œYooo! Nabo bifuzaga kugumana nanjye muri ibi bihe ariko dore barananiweâ€. Yarongeye ajya gusenga ubwa kabiri na none ariko asiga abakanguye ngo bagerageze babe maso. Agarutse nabwo asanga barasinziriye, umugono ari wose! Icyakora arabihorera kuko ngo yabonaga amaso yabo aremerewe! Asubirayo ubwa gatatu, agarutse asanga bamwe basinziriye abandi bakirwana nâ€™ibitotsi, arababwira ati â€œNoneho nimusinzire muruhukeâ€! Nuko abaguma iruhande kugeza igihe bukereye. (Reba Mt 26, 45-46).
Turasabwa kugumana nâ€™Imana mu isengesho
Muri ibi bihe bikomeye Nyagasani aradusaba kumuguma iruhande. Tukagumana na we nibura isaha imwe mu isengesho buri munsi aho turi mu ngo zacu, kugira ngo tutagwa mu bishuko bitandukanye: Kwiheba, kugira ubwoba, kwiba, kwandavura, ubugugu, ubwikunde, intonganya nâ€™ibindi.
Turi abanyantegenke:
Imana izi neza intege nke zacu, iyo tunaniwe iratwihanganira. Kugira ngo tuzahimbaze Pasika neza, twisuzume tutihenze, twicuze ibyaha byacu kuko burya turi abanyantegenke nkâ€™uko Pawulo Mutagatifu abivuga atiâ€œKuko icyiza nifuza ntagikora, naho ikibi ntashaka akaba aricyo nkoraâ€ (Rm 7, 19). Iki gihe turimo ni icyo kwigorora nâ€™Imana, nâ€™abavandimwe bacu ndetse no kwiyunga nâ€™umutima wacu. Turi abanyantege nkeya kandi buri wese yifitemo umusemburo wo gusenyuka kwe. Twicuze, koko burya nta mahoro yâ€™umunyabyaha udashaka kubivamo.
Icyubahiro cyâ€™isi ni icyâ€™akanya gato
Byinshi mu bicumuza bene muntu ni ugushakisha ubutunzi, gushakisha imbaraga zishingiye ku cyubahiro nâ€™ibindi.
Igihe turimo kirimo isomo rikomeye: Yezu yatemberejwe mu mujyi wa Yeruzalemu, bamuririmbira ngo â€œHozana, nihasingizwe uje mu izina rya Nyagasaniâ€! Ngo â€œniwe Mwami wa Israel, inkomoko nyacyubahiro ya Dawudiâ€! Nyamara ntibyamaze kabiri, baramushushubikanye ngo akwiye urwo gupfa! Maze abo yagaburiye bagahaga bamwicisha inzara, abo yahaye Divayi nziza bagatangara bo bamuha Divayi irura! Abo yakijije uburwayi bamutera inguma umubiri wose!
 Ibyo dukora byose dushakishe ubukungu mu ijuru kuko isi yo ntigira inyiturano. Tubitse ubukungu bwacu aho imungu zitagera. Ubibuko nyabwo buri mu mutima wita ku bandi kandi udategereje gushimwa nabo.
Iki ni igihe cyo kubabazwa nâ€™ikibi twakoze
Bavandimwe, iki ni igihe cyo kubabazwa nâ€™ikibi cyaturutse mu ruhande rwacu. Usanga kenshi hari igihe twigira â€œabahigi bâ€™ibyaha byâ€™abandiâ€, tukabangukirwa no gucira abandi imanza aho kwikebuka ngo buri wese yirebe atihenze maze ababazwe nâ€™ikibi yakoze kabone nâ€™iyo nta wundi muntu waba ukizi.
 Hari abantu twakuraho isomo dusanga mu Ivangili ya Matayo hari hati â€œUmutegeka hamwe nâ€™abasirikare be barindaga Yezu, babonye umutingito wâ€™isi nâ€™ibyari bibaye, bagira ubwoba bwinshi baravuga bati: â€œUyu koko yari Umwana wâ€™Imana!â€ (Mt 26, 54).
Dusenge:
Nyagasani Mana, wavuze ko abakomera ku Ijambo ryawe batazakorwa nâ€™ikimwaro (Reba Yh 8, 51 na Zab 22), muri ibi bihe twugarijwe nâ€™icyorezo gikomeye cya Coronavirus gihuriranye no kwitegura Pasika, duhe umutima wo kukugarukira, umutima wo kwiyunga nawe, umutima wo kwiyunga nâ€™abavandimwe bacu ndetse no kwiyunga natwe ubwacu. Turi abantu ntabwo turi abamalayika, aho twaguye tubyutse dukomeze urugendo. Aho turwaye udukize, ni wowe Muganga utagira gisumbwa, tabara abana bawe bari mu kato cyangwa ubundi bubanare buzwi nawe wenyine, uri imbabazi zimenya imbabare.
Turinde ubwoba no kwiheba. Bana natwe ibihe byose, byâ€™umwihariko muri iki cyumweru gitagatifu twinjiyemo maze uko dusangiye ububabare bwa hano ku isi, tuzanasangire nawe ibyishimo byâ€™izuka. Tubisabye twizeye, ku izina ryâ€™Imana Data na Mwana na Roho Mutagatifu, Amen!
Padiri Victor AMERIKA

Title: GisÃ¨le Precious yasohoye indirimbo â€˜Mbega Urukundoâ€™ yibutsa abâ€™Isi ko hari uwabitangiye
Body:
Umuhanzikazi Nsabimana GisÃ¨le Precious yashyize hanze indirimbo yise â€˜Mbega Urukundoâ€™ yifitemo ubutumwa bushimangira ko Yesu yitangiye Isi kugira ngo akize abayituye ibyaha byabo.
Umuhanzikazi Nsabimana GisÃ¨le Precious yashyize hanze indirimbo yise â€˜Mbega Urukundoâ€™ yifitemo ubutumwa bushimangira ko Yesu yitangiye Isi kugira ngo akize abayituye ibyaha byabo.
GisÃ¨le Precious ari mu bahanzi bahimbaza Imana bâ€™igitsina gore mu babarizwa mu Itorero rya ADEPR, bari gukora cyane. Indirimbo ye nshya â€˜Mbega Urukundoâ€™ yatunganyijwe na Producer Clement The Guitarist mu buryo bwâ€™amajwi.
Uyu muhanzi yabwiye IGIHE ko yayanditse ashaka gutanga ubutumwa bwibutsa abantu urukundo Yesu yakunze abâ€™Isi kandi badakwiriye.
Yagize ati â€œNi indirimbo nziza ikangurira abantu gufatanyiriza hamwe kuririmba urwo rukundo kugira ngo nâ€™abatararumenya barumenye!â€™â€™
GisÃ¨le Precious yavuze ko mu gihe hakomeje gukazwa ingamba zo kurwanya Coronavirus yugarije Isi, bikwiye ko baniyubaka mu buryo bwâ€™umwuka.
Ati â€œTurusheho no gufata izindi ngamba zubaka ubugingo bwacu turushaho kwegere Imana, gusenga cyane kandi ntiduterwe ubwoba nâ€™ibiriho ngo bitwibagize nâ€™ibindi bikomeye Imana yatunyujijemo ntibiduhitane.â€™â€™
Mu mishinga ye, GisÃ¨le Precious arateganya gukora indirimbo nyinshi no gutegura ibitaramo mu bice bitandukanye byâ€™igihugu bijyanye nâ€™uko Uwiteka azamushoboza.
Izina rya GisÃ¨le Precious ryatangiye kumenyekana mu ruhame mu 2018 ubwo yatumirwaga mu gitaramo cyo gutangiza iserukiramuco rya Gikirisitu ryiswe â€œRabagirana Worship Festivalâ€ ku wa 4 Ugushyingo 2018.
Icyo gihe uyu mukobwa waserukanye gitari ye, akayicuranga bya gihanga yishimiwe na benshi, banyurwa nâ€™umuziki we.
Tariki ya 16 Kamena 2019 yongeye kwandika amateka mashya mu rugendo rwe rwa muzika kuko nibwo yakoze igitaramo cye cya mbere cyiswe â€œImbaraga Live Concertâ€ cyabereye kuri ADEPR Gisenyi.
Nsabimana Precious yatangiye kuririmba akiri umwana. Urugendo rwâ€™ubuhanzi ku giti cye yarutangiye mu 2017. Asengera muri ADEPR Gatenga ndetse umubyeyi we ni pasiteri muri iri torero. Kuva atangiye umuziki amaze gushyira hanze indirimbo zirindwi zirimo â€œImbaraga zâ€™amasengeshoâ€, â€œUrampagijeâ€, â€œNiweâ€, â€œInzira zayoâ€ nâ€™izindi.
Mu mwaka ushize kandi Precious yatangije Anointed Band, itsinda rihuriyemo abakobwa nâ€™abagore bahimbaza Imana. Yaserutse bwa mbere iririmba muri Rabagirana Worship Festival yabereye muri Dove Hotel ku Gisozi ku wa 10 Ugushyingo 2019.
