Title: Burya dusangiye gupfa no gukira!
Body:
Hari benshi barajwe ishinga no gushakisha inkomoko yâ€™iki cyorezo cya coronavirus. Byaba bituruka ku makosa cyangwa ubushake bwâ€™umuntu, byaba bikomoka ku mihindagurikire yâ€™ikirere cyangwa ku misazire yâ€™isi nkâ€™uko bamwe babivuga, icyo tubona ni uko twese dusangiye gupfa no gukira.
Hari benshi barajwe ishinga no gushakisha inkomoko yâ€™iki cyorezo cya coronavirus. Byaba bituruka ku makosa cyangwa ubushake bwâ€™umuntu, byaba bikomoka ku mihindagurikire yâ€™ikirere cyangwa ku misazire yâ€™isi nkâ€™uko bamwe babivuga, icyo tubona ni uko twese dusangiye gupfa no gukira.
Iki cyorezo cyadushyize ku munzani wâ€™ubuzima kandi cyitwereka ko ibyâ€™ingenzi ari ibyo duhuje kurusha ibidutandukanya.
Abakomeye nâ€™aboroheje, abami nâ€™abatware bahuje icyifuzo nâ€™aboro! Twese turasaba Imana kubaho. Intambara zari zarananiranye zerekanye ko burya turwaniraga ubusa, nazo ziraceceka! Twese twabonye akanya ko kwitekerezaho, maze tubona ko dusangiye gupfa no gukira koko!
Dusangiye gukira: Twese twaremwe mu ishusho yâ€™Imana kandi iduha Ubuhanga, Ubwenge, ubwigenge nâ€™umutima ukunda kugira ngo tubashe gukora ugushaka kwayo, harimo kugenga ibindi biremwa no kubana neza mu rukundo nâ€™abandi. Twese twaremewe gusingiza Imana no kubana nayo (Reba Yh 17).
Dusangiye gupfa: Dusangiye gupfa nkâ€™uko dusangiye ingaruka zâ€™icyaha cyâ€™inkomoko. Kuva ubwo Muntu yasuzuguraga Imana, agashaka kunganya ubwenge nayo ndetse akumva ashaka no kuyirusha, Imana yamusubije mu mwanya we ariko iranamuhana. Bityo aba asemeye bene muntu twese.
Uhoraho abwira umugore ati â€œNzongera imiruho yawe igihe utwite, maze uzabyare ubabaye, uzahora wifuza umugabo waweâ€. None se Babyeyi babyaye, ni nde wabyaye atababaye cyangwa atamennye amaraso? Kuva ubwo twese dusangiye gupfa no gukira. (Intg 3, 16).
Â Uhoraho abwira nâ€™umugabo ati â€˜Kuko wansuzuguye, Umugati wawe uzawurya wiyushye akuya kugeza ubwo uzasubira mu gitaka, kuko ari cyo wavuyemo. Koko rero uri umukungugu, kandi uzasubira mu mukunguguâ€. (Intg 3, 17-19). Ibi se ntitubihuriyeho, ntiturya ari uko twiyushye akuya? Nyamara tujye twibuka ko dusangiye gupfa no gukira.
Iki gihe rero si igihe cyo gushakisha inkomoko yâ€™icyorezo gusa ahubwo ni igihe cyo gufashanya nkâ€™abahuje gupfa no gukira. Niba twese duhuje ibibazo niduhuze no gushakisha ibisubizo, cyane cyane twita ku mbabare nâ€™abatishoboye. Ni igihe kandi cyo kugendera mu gushaka kwâ€™Imana!
Bavandimwe nkâ€™uko tubibonye umubabaro nâ€™ibyago byacu byakomotse ku gusuzugura Imana; aho umuntu wa mbere yihaye gushaka kuresha nayo! Nâ€™uyu munsi hari ibyo tubona ukabona ko Muntu yagiye ashyira imbere ubuhanga, ubwenge bwe ndetse agakora ibyo yishakiye aho kugira ngo byose bigende uko Imana yabigennye.
Dukomeze gusenga twizeye ngo Imana idukize ibyaha byacu kandi iturengere idukize iki cyorezo.
Dusenge Nkâ€™uko Uhoraho yabibwiye Dawudi ati â€œNtacyo ntagukoreye niba kandi bidahagije nzongeraho nâ€™ibindi (2 Sam 12, 7-8) Natwe, turagushimira Nyagasani kubera ibyiza byose wadukoreye ariko kandi tugarutse imbere yawe nâ€™umutima unyuzwe nabyo, tunagusaba ngo wongereho nâ€™ibindi byiza, utugirire Impuhwe maze udutabare ikibi cyugarije isi. Ni wowe wivugiye ngo igihe kirageze ngo ndengere umuryango wanjye: turengere nkâ€™uko warengeye Daniyeli ukamukura mu rwobo rwâ€™intare zishonje, nkâ€™uko warengeye abayisiraheli bakurikiranywe nâ€™ingabo za Farawo.
 Dutabare nkâ€™uko watabaye Pahulo mu Nzu yâ€™imbohe, maze inzugi zâ€™uburoko zigafunguka, turwanirire ishyaka nkâ€™uko warirwaniriye abavandimwe batatu (Meshaki, Sadaraka na Abedenego) baciriwe urwo gupfa, bakarohwa mu muriro ugurumana ariko ukohereza umumalayika wawe agatemberana nabo mu muriro, maze bose bagatangarira izina ryawe. Ubwo twiyemeje kukugarukira no kongera kukubera abana, ngwino utubere Imana, natwe tuguhoranire icyubahiro hejuru ya byose. Ku bwa Yezu Kristu Umwami wacu. Amenâ€.

Title: Amasengesho dusengera mu rugo muri ibi bihe Imana irayumva?
Body:
Mu ivanjili Ntagatifu uko yanditswe na Matayo (Mt 9, 27-30), haranditse ngo â€œMuri icyo gihe, Yezu akomeza kugenda, impumyi ebyiri ziramukurikira, zisakuza ziti Mwana wa Dawudi tugirire impuhwe! Ageze imuhira impumyi ziramwegera maze arazibaza ati â€˜Mwemera ko nshobora gukora ibyongibyo?â€™ Ziti Yego Nyagasani . Nuko abakora ku maso, avuga ati â€˜nibibabere uko mubyemera.â€™ Nuko amaso yabo arahumuka barabona.â€
Mu ivanjili Ntagatifu uko yanditswe na Matayo (Mt 9, 27-30), haranditse ngo â€œMuri icyo gihe, Yezu akomeza kugenda, impumyi ebyiri ziramukurikira, zisakuza ziti Mwana wa Dawudi tugirire impuhwe! Ageze imuhira impumyi ziramwegera maze arazibaza ati â€˜Mwemera ko nshobora gukora ibyongibyo?â€™ Ziti Yego Nyagasani . Nuko abakora ku maso, avuga ati â€˜nibibabere uko mubyemera.â€™ Nuko amaso yabo arahumuka barabona.â€
Kuri ubu abayobozi bari kudusaba kuguma mu rugo, hari uwakwibaza ati â€œese ubu ko ntari mu Kiliziya cyangwa mu rusengero Imana yanyumva? Cyane rwose! Na Yezu igihe cyarageze yerekana ko ufite ukwemera yakirizwa aho ari ho hose.
Mu gihe natwe twugarijwe nâ€™icyorezo, tumeze nka ziriya mpumyi ebyiri tumaze kumva, amasengesho yabaye menshi, turatabaza tuti "Nyagasani tugirire impuhwe". Nkâ€™uko aha Yezu yicekekeye, natwe turabona ntacyo ari gukora. Bamwe batangiye kurambirwa, nyamara nyagasani aradusaba gukomeza kugendana na we.
Nitugera mu ngo zacu, twicarane na we dutuze, nta kabuza natwe aratubaza ati â€œMwemera ko nshobora guhagarika iki cyorezoâ€ Dusubirize rimwe nka za mpumyi duti â€œYego Nyagasani urabishoboyeâ€.
Nyagasani aratwibutsa ku buryo bwa gihanuzi ko yaduhaye Yezu Kristu ngo abe ikimenyetso cyâ€™urukundo rwe ruhoraho iteka rwagati muri twe. Ni â€œEmanweliâ€. Imana hamwe natwe mu bihe byose nâ€™ahantu hose.
Zaburi ya 40, iratumurikira mu gufata umugambi ukwiye, iti â€œngaha ndaje Nyagasani niyemeje gukora ibigushimishaâ€. Iki gihe turimo ni icyo gusanga Imana kurushaho dukora ibiyishimisha.
Bavandimwe, mu ibaruwa yandikiwe Abaheburayi (Heb 10, 4-10), aratwibutsa ko ibitambo byâ€™amaraso yâ€™ibimasa na za Ruhaya bitakuyeho ibyaha byacu, ahubwo ko twacungujwe amaraso yâ€™igiciro gikomeye. Ya maraso ya Kristu yameneye ku musaraba. Kristu ni Alufa na Omega, ni we Ntangiriro nâ€™iherezo . Ni we wenyine ushobora kuturengera kuko ari cyo cyamuzanye.
Muri Yohani: 10, 10 Yezu ubwe agira ati â€œNazanywe no kugira ngo mugire ubuzima kandi mubugire busendereye.â€ Niwe kandi ukomeza agira ati â€œNyagasani abo wampaye bakomeze mu bumwe... Singusabye kubakura ku isi ahubwo ndagusabye ngo ubarinde ikibiâ€ (Reba Yh 17, 14-21).
Muri Luka 1, 26-38, Bikiramariya yakiriye ibyari bimubayeho byo gusama kandi yari yifitiye izindi gahunda zo kubana nâ€™uwo yakunze. Mbese umuntu yavuga ko Imana yamuvangiye, natwe rero twemere ko Imana ituvangira. Bikiramariya yabyakiranye ukwemera agira ati â€œYego Nyagasaniâ€. Maze nâ€™ibyo ubwenge bwa muntu bwakumva ko bidashoboka ati â€œKoko nta kinanira Imanaâ€!
Bavandimwe, natwe twari dufite gahunda nyinshi muri uyu mwaka, none zose zarahagaze, nimureke ibi tubishakemo umugambi wâ€™Imana kuri twe kandi twizere ko ntakinanira Imana.
Dusenge: Nyagasani Mana, si ubwa mbere waba utabaye abantu ukabasubiza ubuzima, umunezero nâ€™ibyishimo, nkâ€™uko wohereje umwana wawe ku isi ngo acungure abantu. Turengere, twizeye impuhwe zawe muri ibi bihe turimo.
Mubyeyi Bikiramariya, duhakirwe ku Mana, wowe wamenye ugushaka kwayo kare kandi ugahamya ko nta kinanira Imana. Nkâ€™uko wadusuye iwacu i Kibeho mu Rwanda ugaragara nkâ€™uduhangayikiye cyane, duhangayikire na none tubone ikuzo ryâ€™Imana muri ibi bihe turimo. Vomerera indabo zawe zigiye kumirana. Tubisabye twizeye ku bwa Yezu Kristu Umwami wacu. Amen

Title: Ibihe turimo birusheho gutuma twiyegereza Imana
Body:
Turi mu rugendo tutabona neza icyerekezo nâ€™iherezo ari ko kandi hari icyizere cyo gutabarwa. Tumeze nkâ€™Aburahamu igihe yari mu nzira ajya gutura umwana we Izaki, umwana akamubaza ati â€œDawe! Ko mbona umuriro nâ€™inkwi, intama yo gutamba irava heâ€ ? Aburahamu akamusubiza atiâ€œImana iri burebe aho yibonera intama yo gutamba, Mwana wanjyeâ€ (Reba Intg 22, 6-8).
Turi mu rugendo tutabona neza icyerekezo nâ€™iherezo ari ko kandi hari icyizere cyo gutabarwa. Tumeze nkâ€™Aburahamu igihe yari mu nzira ajya gutura umwana we Izaki, umwana akamubaza ati â€œDawe! Ko mbona umuriro nâ€™inkwi, intama yo gutamba irava heâ€ ? Aburahamu akamusubiza atiâ€œImana iri burebe aho yibonera intama yo gutamba, Mwana wanjyeâ€ (Reba Intg 22, 6-8).
Natwe, turibaza tuti ko Icyorezo cya Coronavirus gikomeje kurimbura imbaga, igisubizo kizava he!
Isi iri mu bihe bikomeye byo guhangana nâ€™icyorezo cya Coronavirus. Ibintu byose byahagaze! Abantu bikingiranye mu nzu zabo. Bamwe babonye akanya ko gutekereza ku buzima muri iyi si, ubuzima twakira ariko kandi bukaducika tubureba! Abandi nabo bahugiye mu gushaka inkomoko yâ€™iki cyorezo babaye nkâ€™abigishwa ba Yezu, bo bamubajije igihe bahuraga nâ€™umuntu wavutse afite ubuhumyi, bati â€œMwigisha, uwacumuye ni nde! Ni uyu muntu cyangwa ni ababyeyi beâ€( Yh 9, 2)! Natwe muri ibi bihe dushobora kubaza Imana tuti â€œNi nde waduteje iki cyorezo koko! Ni nde Nyirabayazana?â€
Bavandimwe, icyâ€™ingenzi si uguhugira mu kwibaza icyateye iyi ndwara. Ahubwo icyâ€™ingenzi ni ukuyirwanya uko dushoboye no kuyikuramo isomo rikomeye ndetse rishobora guhindura imyumvire nâ€™imibereho yacu, imbere yâ€™abandi nâ€™imbere yâ€™Imana.
Twari dusanzwe tubona igihe cyo gusenga tukagikoresha nabi, Imana tukayiburira umwanya, Umunsi wâ€™Imana tukawusimbuza ibindi twaburiye umwanya cyangwa ibindi byo kwinezeza! None rero iki gihe tugarukire Imana no kuyihungiraho kuko ari yo yonyine mutabazi. Tumurikirwe nâ€™iri jambo riri mu gitabo cyâ€™umuhanuzi Hozeya rigira riti â€œNimuze tugarukire Uhoraho. Niwe wadukomerekeje kandi niwe uzatuvura, niwe wadukubise, ni nawe uzomora ibikomere byacuâ€ (Hoz 6, 1).
Twari tuzi ko abahanga nâ€™abanyabwenge nâ€™iyi si ntacyabasoba kuko bakoze nâ€™ibindi byinshi byiza tugatangara! Nkâ€™uko Zaburi ya 23 ibidusaba dukurikire ibyo Nyagasani adusaba kuko ari we mushumba wacu. Niwe dukwiye kwiringira aho kwiringira umwana wâ€™umuntu.
Bamwe bibwiraga ko bari hejuru yâ€™abandi kubera ubutunzi bwâ€™isi barushanywa icyubahiro, ubwiza bwâ€™isura, inkomoko, amavuko nâ€™ibindi! None twabonye ko hari igihe ibiremwa byose bireshya, usumba abandi akaba ari uzi guca bugufi imbere yâ€™Imana. Nibyo koko Imana ntireba nkâ€™abantu.
Imana ntireba nkâ€™abantu. Ibyo tubona bisa nkâ€™ibikomeye imbere yâ€™Imana biroroshye. Ibyo tudafitiye igisubizo Nyagasani aragifite. Erega iyo Nyagasani tumusabye ntahite aduha icyo tumusabye aba agira ngo asuzume Ukwihangana kwacu! Nkâ€™uko umuhanuzi Ezekiyeli abivuga ahumuriza abantu bo mu gihe cye ati â€œNimuhumure, uhoraho arahibereyeâ€ . (Ezk 48, 35)!
Igihe turimo ni igihe cyo kuba maso. Nkâ€™uko Pawulo mutagatifu abitubwira mu ibaruwa yandikiye abanyefezi agira ati â€˜Kanguka wowe usinziriye! Haguruka uve mu bapfuye maze Kristu akumurikireâ€ (Ef 5, 14). Abapfuye Pawulo yavugaga ni ababaho mu mwijima bagahunga urumuri rwa Kristu rugaragazwa nâ€™ibikorwa byiza.
Turasabwa kugenza nkâ€™abana bâ€™urumuri. Tukava mu byaha nâ€™ibindi byose bidutandukanya nâ€™Imana kuko aribwo tuzaronka ubutungane nyakuri. (Ef 5, 8-12).
Nyagasani ntiyazanywe no gukiza intungane ahubwo yazanywe no kiza abarwayi nâ€™abanyabyaha. Nka wa Muntu wari waravutse afite ubuhumyi, dupfukamire Imana, tuyinginge kandi duhamye ukwemera kwacu. (Yh 9, 35-38).
Dusenge: â€œNyagasani, icyi Cyumweru cyari icyâ€™ubucengezanema ku bitegura kubatizwa ari bakuru. Natwe turapfukamye ngo uducengezemo inema zawe, tumenye neza ugushaka kwawe muri ibi bihe, maze icyo ushaka abe aricyo gikorwa.
Nyagasani, turakwinginze ngo udukize ibyago byose, ibi bihe turimo ubisakazemo amahoro aturuka iwawe. Impuhwe zawe niziturengere, zidukize icyaha cyose, ziturinde amakuba yose, Mu gihe tugitegereje ya mizero mahire nâ€™ukuza kâ€™Umukiza wacu Yezu Kristu. Kuko ubwami nâ€™ububasha nâ€™ikuzo ari ibyawe iteka ryose. Amenâ€.
Nyagasani Yezu nabane namwe!
Padiri Victor AMERIKA

Title: Willy M. Gakunzi yashyize hanze indirimbo â€˜â€˜Mu mababa yaweâ€™â€™ yanditse mu myaka icyenda
Body:
Umuhanzi Willy Makuza Gakunzi ukorera umuziki muri Canada yashyize hanze amashusho yâ€™indirimbo yise â€˜â€˜Mu mababa yaweâ€™â€™ ifite amateka yihariye kuko yayanditse mu gihe cyâ€™imyaka icyenda.
Umuhanzi Willy Makuza Gakunzi ukorera umuziki muri Canada yashyize hanze amashusho yâ€™indirimbo yise â€˜â€˜Mu mababa yaweâ€™â€™ ifite amateka yihariye kuko yayanditse mu gihe cyâ€™imyaka icyenda.
â€˜â€˜Mu mababa yaweâ€™â€™ ni indirimbo ifite iminota itandatu nâ€™amasegonda 49, amajwi yayo yakozwe na Kibwe Thomas mu gihe amashusho yatunganyijwe na William Muyuku.
Gakunzi Willy wayanditse asanzwe atuye muri Canada, aho anakorera ibikorwa birimo nâ€™ibyâ€™umuziki uhimbaza Imana.
Uyu muhanzi ni we washinze Umuryango Heart of Worship in Action Foundation ufite icyicaro muri Canada, ariko ibikorwa byawo byo gufasha abatishoboye bikorerwa mu Rwanda aho watangijwe mu 2019.
Uyu muryango washinzwe mu 2004 ufite intego yo gushyigikira ibikorwa bigamije guhindura ubuzima bwa benshi binyuze mu kubaka no kongerera ubushobozi bwâ€™abari muri sosiyete runaka.
Gakunzi yasohoye â€œMu mababaâ€™â€™, indirimbo afata nkâ€™isengesho ryâ€™umutima we, inakubiyemo ubutumwa bwâ€™ihumure ku Isi. Yayanditse mu byiciro bitandukanye kuko byamufashe imyaka icyenda.
Yabwiye IGIHE ko iyi ndirimbo yatangiye kuyandika akiri ku ntebe yâ€™ishuri. Ati â€œUmugoroba umwe ndi mu gihe cyo kwegerana nâ€™Imana, ubwo nasomaga ijambo riri muri Zaburi 91, numvise hari injyana ije mu mutima wanjye. Nahise ntangira kwandika amagambo yâ€™indirimbo. Yaje ifite imbaraga zidasanzwe ku buryo kuva icyo gihe yahindutse isengesho ryâ€™umutima wanjye.â€™â€™
Nyuma yâ€™imyaka icyenda nibwo Gakunzi yanditse igice cya kabiri cyâ€™iyo ndirimbo.
Inganzo yacyo yashibutse mu gihe cyâ€™amasengesho yo mu rugo rwe, bivuye ku mugore we Gatera Estelle [witabye Imana ku wa 8 Ugushyingo 2018], waririmbaga undi na we akandika ayo magambo. Gatera yanditse iyo nyikirizo ariko ntihagira ibindi bitero byandikwa kugeza asoje urugendo rwe ku Isi.
Gakunzi yakomeje avuga ko â€œImana yashyize ku mutima wanjye umukoro wo kusa ikivi no gushyira mu bikorwa imigambi yose itarasohoye irimo no gushyira hanze indirimbo.â€™â€™
â€œMu mababa yaweâ€™â€™ ni indirimbo ya kabiri mu zizasohorwa muri uwo mushinga.
Yakomeje ati â€œUbwo nasubiraga mu bubiko ngo mpitemo indirimbo zizajya kuri album, nabonye ibice bibiri byâ€™indirimbo. Nafashe gitari ntangira kubiririmba byombi ndetse iza no kuba nziza mu buryo ntatekerezaga. Imana yateguraga umutima wanjye mu buryo ntatekerezaga.â€™â€™
Gakunzi avuga ko atigeze yibwira ko umunsi umwe azasohora indirimbo atari kumwe nâ€™umugore we.
Yagize ati â€œSinari nzi ko iyi ndirimbo izajya hanze, umugore wanjye yaratabarutse. Imana ni yo yari izi impamvu yaduhaye iyi ndirimbo.
Willy Gakunzi yasabye abakunzi bâ€™umuziki uhimbaza Imana kugira indirimbo â€œMu mababa yaweâ€™â€™, isengesho ryabo rya buri munsi. Iki gihangano kuri ubu kigaragara ku mbuga zicuruza muzika zirimo YouTube, iTunes, Apple Music na Spotify.
Gakunzi afite Impamyabumenyi yâ€™Icyiciro cya Gatatu cya Kaminuza mu bijyanye nâ€™Ubukungu, International Economics and Business, yakuye muri Kaminuza ya Utrecht mu Buholandi. Anafite icyemezo nkâ€™umuhanga mu gutegura igenamigambi (Functional Business Architect) yakuye mu Ishuri rya CEVORA na Kaminuza ya Antwerp mu Bubiligi.
Gakunzi afite ubunararibonye mu gukorana nâ€™ibigo byâ€™imari mu bice bitandukanye ku Isi. Mu nshingano ze abifasha gushaka no gushyiraho uburyo bwo guhangana nâ€™ibyago byatuma bigwa mu gihombo.
Uyu mugabo afatanya izi nshingano no kwandika indirimbo akaba nâ€™umuramyi. Yashinze amatsinda yo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana ku Isi.

Title: Amadini yahinduye umuvuno mu misengere no kwakira amaturo yâ€™abayoboke
Body:
Kuva tariki ya 14 Werurwe Guverinoma yâ€™u Rwanda, yafashe icyemezo cyâ€™uko ibikorwa bihuriza hamwe abantu benshi byose bihagarikwa birimo no kujya mu nsengero, kugira ngo hakumirwe ikwirakwira ryâ€™icyorezo cya COVID-19 giterwa na Coronavirus.
Kuva tariki ya 14 Werurwe Guverinoma yâ€™u Rwanda, yafashe icyemezo cyâ€™uko ibikorwa bihuriza hamwe abantu benshi byose bihagarikwa birimo no kujya mu nsengero, kugira ngo hakumirwe ikwirakwira ryâ€™icyorezo cya COVID-19 giterwa na Coronavirus.
Kuva iki cyemezo cyafatwa amadini nâ€™amatorero yasabye abakirisitu babo gusengera mu ngo, amwe yifashisha za radiyo, Televiziyo na YouTube mu gukomeza gufasha abakristu bayo kumva inyigisho zâ€™ijambo ryâ€™Imana.
Ibi bisobanuye ko amaturo yatangwaga mu gihe cya misa nâ€™amateraniro atatanzwe ku cyumweru nkâ€™ubwo byari bisanzwe bigenda.
IGIHE yamenye ko hari amwe mu madini yasabye abayoboke bayo kujya bakusanya ayo maturo bagashaka umunsi bakayohereza. Urugero ni ubutumwa bwa Paruwasi Gatolika ya Rwamagana, busaba abakirisitu kwegeranya ubushobozi bwabo bakajya babwohereza buri cyumweru.
Umwe mu bakirisitu Gatulika utashatse kuvuga amazina ye, yabwiye IGIHE ko kuba bakusanya amaturo bakayatanga nta kibazo bitwaye ngo ikibazo ni uko byaba itegeko, yavuze ko nâ€™ubusanzwe umuntu aba afite ituro yageneye gutanga buri cyumweru bitewe nâ€™icyo yaronse.
Bamwe mu bayobozi bâ€™amadini nâ€™amatorero babwiye IGIHE uburyo bari gukoresha mu kugeza ubutumwa bwiza ku bakristu babo ndetse nâ€™uburyo bari kwifashisha mu kubona amaturo.
Umushumba wa Arikidiyosezi ya Kigali, Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda, yavuze ko kuri ubu bari kwifashisha za radiyo, televiziyo na YouTube mu kwegereza abakristu ijambo ryâ€™Imana.
Ati â€œInyigisho turi kwifashisha ziranyura kuri Radiyo Maria, buri munsi haba igitambo cyâ€™Ukaristiya mu gitondo na saa 12h15 mu karuhuko, hanyuma ku cyumweru twifashishije radiyo na televiziyo byâ€™igihugu, turi no gusaba ngo kuri iki cyumweru bazaduhe umwanya kuko inyigisho twatanze zafashije abantu. Nimugoroba twifashisha televiziyo ya Isango Star ari nako dutoza abakristu gusengera mu rugo bifashishije umukuru wâ€™umuryango.â€
Ku kijyanye nâ€™uburyo abakristu batanga amaturo, Musenyeri Kambanda, yavuze ko bifashisha nimero zâ€™abapadiri bakuru abakristu baba basanganwe bakoherezaho amaturo bakoresheje uburyo bwa Mobile Money.
Ati â€œAmaturo rero hari abakristu kugeza ubu babizirikana bakaba batwoherereza kuri Mobile Money, mu rwego rwo gushyigikira imirimo yâ€™abasaseridoti ni iyo mirimo yâ€™ubutumwa, kandi niyo hagize uzana ituro ryâ€™abakene kuko buriya tuba tunazirikana nâ€™abakene batugana bashonje, gusa ntabwo turashyiraho uburyo bufatika ubu bikorwa nâ€™abakristu babizirikana.â€
Yavuze ko abakirisitu akenshi baba bafite nimero za Padiri Mukuru â€œUko nâ€™ubundi bamuhamagara bamwiyambaza kuri serivisi zinyuranye umwe umwe, ni nako babikora gusa turi gutekereza uko twabinoza.â€
Umushumba wa Diyosezi ya Gahini mu Itorero ryâ€™Abangilikani, Dr Gahima Manasseh we yavuze ko kuva amateraniro yo mu ruhame ahagaritswe basabye abakristu kongera uburyo bwo gusenga nubwo bari iwabo mu rugo kandi birinda kujya mu ruhame.
Ku kijyane nâ€™uburyo bakiramo amaturo yagize ati â€œNta ngamba twagifatiye kuko siyo yâ€™ingenzi, duhuzwa nâ€™abakristu no kubabwira ijambo ryâ€™Imana no kubakangurira ibyâ€™agakiza, iyo hagize ushaka kuyatanga akoresha Mobile Money kuko ababitsi bâ€™amaparuwasi barazwi.â€
Umuyobozi wâ€™Itorero Foursquare Rwanda, Dr Bishop FidÃ¨le Masengo, we yabwiye IGIHE bo bari gukoresha YouTube na Facebook yâ€™Itorero mu kugeza ubutumwa bwiza ku bakristu.
Ku kijyanye nâ€™uburyo bakira amaturo yagize ati â€œDufite itangazo riba rinyura hasi ryereka abantu uburyo batangamo amaturo bifashishije Mobile Money na konti zâ€™urusengero gusa ntabwo tubitindaho cyane kuko abantu batari kuza mu rusengero.â€
Mu itangazo ryashyizwe hanze nâ€™Itorero ryâ€™Abadiventisiti bâ€™Umunsi wa Karindwi ryashyizweho umukono na Pasiteri Habyarimana Jean FranÃ§ois rivuga ko ku isabato buri muryango uzateranira mu rugo, kandi gahunda zose nkâ€™uko zikorwa ku isabato zizakurikizwa (ishuri ryo ku isabato, indirimbo, gutanga icyacumi nâ€™amaturoâ€¦)â€
Rikomeza rigira riti â€œBuri muryango ni itorero ayo maraporo azashyikirizwe abayobozi bâ€™igihande nabo bayageze ku mubitsi. Abatabona uko bahura nâ€™umubitsi wâ€™itorero ariko bakaba babona uburyo bagera kuri banki, turabaha numero za konti mwashyiraho ibyera byâ€™Uwiteka mwakoresha nâ€™ubundi buryo bwâ€™ikoranabuhanga.â€
Kugeza ubu Minisiteri yâ€™Ubuzima imaze gutangaza ko mu Rwanda abantu 11 ari bo bamaze kugaragaza ibimenyetso byâ€™uko banduye icyorezo cya COVID-19 giterwa Coronavirus.
Abaturarwanda bose bakaba basabwa gukomeza kwitwararika, bakurikiza amabwiriza yâ€™inzego zâ€™ubuzima hibandwa cyane cyane ku gukaraba intoki, kwirinda kujya ahantu hateraniye abantu benshi no kwirinda ingendo zitari ngombwa.

Title: Tumaini Byinshi uba muri Amerika yatanze ihumure mu ndirimbo â€˜â€˜Abafite ikimenyetsoâ€™â€™
Body:
Umuhanzi ukorera umuziki uhimbaza Imana muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Tumaini Byinshi, yashyize hanze amashusho yâ€™indirimbo â€˜â€˜Abafite ikimenyetsoâ€™â€™, ikubiyemo ubutumwa buhumuriza abihebye.
Umuhanzi ukorera umuziki uhimbaza Imana muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Tumaini Byinshi, yashyize hanze amashusho yâ€™indirimbo â€˜â€˜Abafite ikimenyetsoâ€™â€™, ikubiyemo ubutumwa buhumuriza abihebye.
Tumaini Byinshi ari mu bahanzi bafite izina mu muziki wo kuramya bawukorera hanze yâ€™u Rwanda. Azwi mu ndirimbo zirimo â€œIbanga ryâ€™akaragoâ€ yahuriyemo na Bosco Nshuti uri mu bafite igikundiro, â€œNdabihamyaâ€, â€œNzakwamamazaâ€ nâ€™izindi.
Amashusho ya â€œAbafite ikimenyetsoâ€™â€™, Byinshi yashyize hanze ni ayâ€™indirimbo yagiye hanze mu mwaka ushize wa 2019.
â€œAbafite ikimenyetsoâ€™â€™ ni indirimbo ifite iminota itanu nâ€™amasegonda 52, amajwi yayo yatunganyijwe na Producer Bruce mu gihe amashusho yafashwe na Happy Pro. Byinshi yayanditse ari mu bihe byiza byo gusenga no kwegerana nâ€™Imana.
Ni indirimbo yumvikanamo amagambo avuga ko â€œKu bwâ€™imihigo myinshi mwahize ko mutazacogora, nubwo amashyo yashira mu biraro mwizere isezerano. Nubwo ba nyirâ€™icumbi bavuga ko yadutaye, ariko abafite ikimenyetso bizere isezerano.â€™â€™
Byinshi Tumaini yabwiye IGIHE ko indirimbo ye ikubiyemo ubutumwa bwâ€™ihumure ku bafite imitima yihebye.
Yakomeje ati â€˜â€˜Ubutumwa buri muri iyi ndirimbo ni ubwihumure, burahumuriza Itorero rya Kirisitu. Nahisemo gutambutsa ubu butumwa muri iki gihe cyane ko aricyo Imana yashimye ko mbikora ngo mpumurize itorero.â€™â€™
Byinshi ari mu mushinga wo gutegura album izaba igizwe nâ€™indirimo umunani. Murizo amaze gukora enye. Ati â€˜â€˜Muri uyu mwaka niteguye gukora cyane.â€™â€™
Uyu muhanzi wâ€™imyaka 28 yâ€™amavuko ni Umunyarwanda wavukiye muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo (RDC). Amaze imyaka isaga ine muri Amerika aho akorera umuziki. Yatangiye kuririmba akiri muto, atangiriye muri korali, ni umwanditsi mwiza wâ€™indirimbo kuko aho yanyuze muri korali yarazandikiraga.
Byinshi yasabye abakunzi bâ€™ibihangano bye nâ€™ibihimbaza Imana muri rusange kurushaho kwegera Imana no gushyigikira umurimo wâ€™Imana kuko bazahabwa ingororano.

Title: Igihe turimo si icyo kwitotombera Imana!
Body:
Bavandimwe, kimwe no bihe bikomeye abayisiraheli baciyemo, natwe uyu munsi isi yugarijwe nâ€™icyorezo cya Coronavirus hari abashobora gucika intege mu kwemera kwabo bibaza bati â€œMbese Uhoraho turi kumweâ€ ndetse ubwoba bukaba bwinshi kurusha ukwemera nâ€™ukwizera dufite muri Kirisitu Yezu.
Bavandimwe, kimwe no bihe bikomeye abayisiraheli baciyemo, natwe uyu munsi isi yugarijwe nâ€™icyorezo cya Coronavirus hari abashobora gucika intege mu kwemera kwabo bibaza bati â€œMbese Uhoraho turi kumweâ€ ndetse ubwoba bukaba bwinshi kurusha ukwemera nâ€™ukwizera dufite muri Kirisitu Yezu.
Dushobora kuba nka ba bigishwa batabaje Yezu igihe cyâ€™umuhengeri bamubwira bati â€œNtacyo bikubwiye kuba tugiye gushira ?â€ (Reba Mt 4, 35 - 41) cyangwa nkâ€™abayisiraheli bitotombeye Musa bati â€œKuki watuvanye mu Misiri! Ni ukugira ngo twicirwe nâ€™inzara hano? maze natwe tukaba twagira tuti â€œ Kuki waturemye mu ishusho yawe none icyorezo kikaba kigiye kutumara?â€!
Bavandimwe, igihe turimo si icyo kwitotombera Imana! Si icyo kwibwira ko Imana yacu isinziriye, ahubwo ni igihe cyo gusenga kurushaho, ni igihe cyo kugarukira Imana, ni igihe cyo gukomera mu kwemera. Erega Nyagasani ntiyadusezeranyije ubuzima bworoshye ahubwo yadusezeranyije kuzagendana natwe kugeza ku iherezo!
Nyagasani ubwe yarivugiye ati â€œNimuhumure, dore ndi kumwe namwe iminsi yose kugeza igihe isi izashiriraâ€ (Mt 28, 20b). Nta kabuza rero Nyagasani turi kumwe igihe cyose haba mu gihe cyâ€™ibyishimo nâ€™igihe cyâ€™amakuba.
Hari ibyanditswe bitagatifu bigaragaza ko Imana itigeze itureka na rimwe. Nyagasani ubwe yarivugiye ati â€œSinzareka kuguhihibikaniriraâ€ (Reba Iz 62, 1-5), arongera ati â€œ Witinya kuko ndi kumwe nawe, aho uzaca hose nzaba ndi kumwe naweâ€ ( Reba Iz 43, 1-5). We ubwe kandi yaravuze ati â€œ Humura turi kumwe ndagutabaraâ€ ( Yer 1,4-8).
Nkâ€™uko Pawulo Mutagatifu abivuga, tuzagirwa intungane nâ€™ukwemera. Nidushake amahoro akomoka ku Mana muri Yezu Kirisitu. Nkâ€™uko Umuhanuzi Habakuki abivuga kandi ati â€œNâ€™iyo twahura nâ€™ibigeragezo nâ€™ubukene, nâ€™uburwayi nâ€™ibyorezo [â€¦] tuzakomeza twishimire muri Nyagasani Imana yacu (Reba Habakuki 3, 16-18).
Nyagasani ibyo turi kunyuramo arabizi kandi aradutabara nkuko yahumurije Musa ati â€œAmagorwa yâ€™umuryango wanjye Isiraheli narayitegereje, imiborogo yabo narayumvise nâ€™imiruho barimo ndayizi [â€¦] none ndamanutse ngo mbagobotore mu maboko yâ€™abanyamisiri.â€ (Reba Iyim 3, 6 -8).
Dusenge : Nyagasani Yezu, wowe wasabye Umugore wo kuri Samariya amazi yo kunywa kuko wari ufite inyota, natwe turakwinginze dukize iki cyorezo cya Coronavirus kigiye koreka abo wacunguye ku musaraba! Duhe igisubizo gikwiye mu gihe gikwiye, twiringiye impuhwe ugira kuko urukundo udukunda rusumbye ibyiyumviro byacu.
Padiri Victor Amerika

Title: Chorale Christus Regnat yasubiyemo indirimbo â€˜Kuzwa Itekaâ€™ yamamaye muri Kiliziya Gatolika
Body:
Korali Christus Regnat ikorera ivugabutumwa muri Kiliziya Gatolika, Paruwasi ya Regina Pacis, iherereye i Remera mu Mujyi wa Kigali, yasubiyemo indirimbo â€œKuzwa Itekaâ€, indirimbo izwi cyane muri Kiliziya Gatolika.
Korali Christus Regnat ikorera ivugabutumwa muri Kiliziya Gatolika, Paruwasi ya Regina Pacis, iherereye i Remera mu Mujyi wa Kigali, yasubiyemo indirimbo â€œKuzwa Itekaâ€, indirimbo izwi cyane muri Kiliziya Gatolika.
Indirimbo yakorewe muri The Sound Studio ya Producer Bob mu buryo bwâ€™amajwi nâ€™aho amashusho akorwa na Papa Emile Pro.
Kuzwa iteka si indirimbo nshya mu matwi yâ€™abantu benshi, kuko ari indirimbo ya kera. Abakirisitu Gatolika bayizi cyane mu masengesho menshi anyuranye nko mu Gusingiza Imana, Gushengerera ndetse no mu Misa mu gihe cyo gushimira.
Chorale Christus Regnat yahisemo gusubiramo (Remix) iyi ndirimbo kugira ngo ikomeze gufasha Abakrisitu gusingiza Imana yo ikwiye guharirwa ikuzo nâ€™ibisingizo.
Bizimana JÃ©rÃ©mie usanzwe ari umuhimbyi, umwarimu wâ€™indirimbo ndetse akanamamaza ibikorwa byâ€™iyi korali yabwiye IGIHE ko kuri bo iyi ndirimbo ari nziza ku buryo yari ikenewe gukorwa neza kugira ngo ikomeze gufasha abantu kwegera Imana.
Yanavuze ko bafite umushinga mugari wo gukora indirimbo nyinshi mu buryo bwâ€™amajwi nâ€™amashusho nkâ€™uko abakunzi babo bahoraga babibasaba.
Chorale Christus Regnat ni Chorale ibarizwa muri Kiriziya Gatolika muri Paruwasi yitiriwe Umwamikazi wâ€™Amahoro (Regina Pacis) i Remera, Arikidiyosezi ya Kigali.
Tariki ya 12 Gashyantare 2020 nibwo Chorale Christus Regnat bashyize hanze indirimbo â€œMama Shengeâ€ yagaragayemo Yverry Rugamba na Andy Bumuntu, abahanzi bagezweho muri iyi minsi. Iyo ndirimbo â€œMama Shengeâ€ yishimiwe ku rwego rwo hejuru nâ€™abatari bake nkâ€™uko bigaragara kuri Youtube Channel yabo, aho imaze kurebwa nâ€™abarenga ibihumbi Magana abiri na makumyabiri mu minsi 29.

Title: ApÃ´tre Muhire arasaba ko ururimi rwâ€™Umwuka Wera rwemerwa, Abanyarwanda bakaganira nâ€™Imana (Video)
Body:
ApÃ´tre Muhire James wo mu itorero New Hope yavuze ko agiye kugeza ubusabe ku nzego zitandukanye asaba ko ururimi rwâ€™Umwuka Wera rwashyirwa mu ndimi zemewe nâ€™Itegeko Nshinga rya Repubulika yâ€™u Rwanda, abanyarwanda bakabasha kuganira nâ€™Imana.
ApÃ´tre Muhire James wo mu itorero New Hope yavuze ko agiye kugeza ubusabe ku nzego zitandukanye asaba ko ururimi rwâ€™Umwuka Wera rwashyirwa mu ndimi zemewe nâ€™Itegeko Nshinga rya Repubulika yâ€™u Rwanda, abanyarwanda bakabasha kuganira nâ€™Imana.
Ingingo ya munani yâ€™Itegeko Nshinga rya Repubulika yâ€™u Rwanda ryo mu 2003 nkâ€™uko ryavuguruwe mu 2015 ivuga ko ururimi rwâ€™Igihugu ari Ikinyarwanda naho muri rusange indimi zemewe mu butegetsi ari Ikinyarwanda, Icyongereza nâ€™Igifaransa. Igiswahili giherutse kongerwamo.
Inteko yâ€™ururimi nâ€™umuco isobanura ko ururimi ari igikoresho nyamuryango cyâ€™ubwumvane gishingiye ku gukoresha ubushobozi kamere abantu bifitemo bwo kumvikana bakoresheje amajwi yatuye abantu bagize umuryango nyarurimi umwe baba baremeranyijeho.
Ururimi rufasha abantu gushyikirana, kugezanyaho amakuru, kuranga ibibakikije, gushyira ku murongo ibitekerezo no kubigaragaza, kugaragaza imbamutima nâ€™ibindi.
Indimi zose zifite uko zandikwa nâ€™uburyo zivugwa ku buryo abantu bazikoresha bumvikana, hakaba nâ€™amategeko nâ€™amabwiriza ku bazikoresha ku buryo ushaka kurwiga arumenya.
Ibyo bitandukanye nâ€™ururimi rwâ€™Umwuka Wera kuko uruvuga adashobora kumvikana nâ€™abo bari kumwe, akenshi ibyo avuga byumvwa na we wenyine keretse iyo abisobanuriye abo bari kumwe mu rurimi bumva.
Muhire James avuga ko ururimi rwâ€™Umwuka Wera â€˜ari ururimi rwatanzwe nâ€™Imana rutangiwe mu Mwuka Wera.â€™ Akavuga ko yifuza ko rwajya mu ndimi zemewe zâ€™ubutegetsi mu Rwanda.
Ati â€œIcyifuzo dufite ni uko rwakwemerwa mu Itegeko Nshinga rya Repubulika yâ€™u Rwanda. Naratekereje nsanga ururimi rwâ€™Imana narwo rwemewe nâ€™itegeko Nshinga rikuru ryâ€™igihugu cyanjye cyaba ari igikorwa cyiza gihambaye imbere yâ€™Imana. Nzabisaba mu nzego zose zishoboka.â€
Uyu mugabo avuga ko icyo gitekerezo atazakigeza mu Rwanda gusa ahubwo yifuza ko byakorwa hirya no hino mu bindi bihugu. Ati â€œSinzandikira igihugu cyanjye gusa, nâ€™ibindi bihugu nzabyandikira.â€
Ururimi rwâ€™Umwuka Wera si ururimi abantu bagenda baganira cyangwa bakoresha mu itumanaho mu bundi buryo cyangwa ngo umuntu naruvuga umwegereye arwumve. Urugero rwo muri Bibiliya muri Matayo umutwe wa 17 umurongo wa 46 nâ€™uwa 47 yerekana ko urwo rurimi rumenywa nâ€™uruvuze.
Mu rwandiko rwâ€™Abakolinto ba mbere umutwe wa 12, havuga ko Abakirisito bahawe impano zitandukanye barimo nâ€™abasobanura izo ndimi.
Ubwo Pawulo yasobanuriraga abakirisito bâ€™i Korinto uko impano zâ€™umwuka zitandukanye, yababwiye ko hari impano nyinshi zâ€™umwuka ariko umwuka ari umwe. Mu gice cya 10 yabandikiye ati â€œUndi agahabwa gukora ibitangaza, undi agahabwa guhanura, undi agahabwa kurobanura imyuka, undi agahabwa kuvuga indimi nyinshi, undi agahabwa gusobanura indimi.â€
 Kuki ashaka ko rujya mu Itegeko Nshinga?
Itegeko Nshinga rya Repubulika yâ€™u Rwanda ryo mu 2003 nkâ€™uko ryavuguruwe mu 2015, ritanga umwitangirizwa wo kongera cyangwa kugabanya indimi zemewe zâ€™ubutegetsi. Riteganya ko Itegeko Ngenga rishobora kongera cyangwa kugabanya indimi zemewe mu butegetsi.
Muhire James ashaka ko abantu bamenya urwo rurimi kugira ngo babashe kuganira nâ€™Imana.
Ati â€œImpamvu nifuza ko uru rurimi rujya mu ndimi zemewe ni ukugira ngo bitere imbaraga abenegihugu. Umuturage nagira amatsiko yo kuvuga urwo rurimi ni ko kuva mu byaha, niko kuva mu bidatunganye, niko kubaha Imana. Byanze bikunze umuntu wese uvuga uru rurimi rwâ€™Umwuka Wera ni umuntu wageze ikirenge mu cya Kristo.â€
Avuga ko mu matorero yo mu Rwanda hari abanyarwanda bazi urwo rurimi kandi buzuzwa bakaruvuga, abo ngo nirwemerwa hari izindi mbaraga bazagira.
Ati "Abanyarwamda benshi bararuzi, bararuvuga hirya no hino mu matorero kuko buzuzwa Umwuka Wera, ariko hari izindi mbaraga abanyamadini cyangwa abanyarwanda bazagira uru rurimi niruramuka rwemejwe abanyarwamda bose bazagira amatsiko yo kurumenya.â€
Abadepite bazarwemeza basoma Bibiliya
Ntibyoroshye gusuzuma ururimi rudafite inyandiko nyejwi cyangwa nyemvugo izwi abantu bahuriyeho.
Muhire James avuga ko bizasaba abarusuzuma kwizera. Ati â€œNdatekereza ko abagize inteko bashatse gusuzuma uru rurimi, icya mbere ni ugusoma Bibiliya ijambo ryâ€™Imana, icya kabiri ni ukwizera ikintu cyose cyiza ubona. Burya hari nâ€™abantu benshi hanze aha batarakizwa kuko Imana idusaba ko tuyizera bazasuzuma uru rurimi mu byanditswe byera mu Ijambo ryâ€™Imana. Bazarusuzumira mu kwizera.
Muhire avuga ko ubutumwa bwiza Imana yatanze butagenewe abanyamadini nâ€™aboroheje gusa, ngo nâ€™abayobozi burabareba.
Ati â€œNabo bagomba kwizera ubutumwa bwiza ntabwo ari ubwâ€™abanyamadini nâ€™abantu bo hasi bose. Nâ€™abanyapolitiki nâ€™abaminisitiri nâ€™abategetsi bâ€™Isi yose bagomba gukizwa kuko na bo Imana irabashaka mu bwami bwayo.â€
Umunyamakuru yasabye ApÃ´tre Muhire James kuvuga amagambo make muri urwo rurimi , avuga ko umuntu atarukoresha uko yishakiye kandi ko rutiganwa icyiza ari uko umuntu arwiyuzurira rumujemo.
Uyu mugabo amaze imyaka 20 mu ivugabutumwa aho yaritangiriye muri Uganda afite imyaka 18. Arubatse afite umugore nâ€™umwana. Ibyo agiye gusaba ari kubikora ku giti cye bitari mu izina ryâ€™itorero abarizwamo yewe ngo nta nâ€™ubwo arabiganira nâ€™abo bakorana umurimo wâ€™Imana.

Title: Pastor Bugembe na Nkundabose wamamaye muri Alarm Ministries batumiwe mu giterane gikomeye
Body:
Umushumba Mukuru wâ€™Amatorero ya Foursquare Gospel Church mu Rwanda, Bishop Dr. Masengo FidÃ¨le, yatumiye abahanzi barimo Pastor Wilson Bugembe wo muri Uganda na Nkundabose Patrick wamamaye muri Alarm Ministries mu giterane gikomeye kizabera mu Mujyi wa Kigali.
Umushumba Mukuru wâ€™Amatorero ya Foursquare Gospel Church mu Rwanda, Bishop Dr. Masengo FidÃ¨le, yatumiye abahanzi barimo Pastor Wilson Bugembe wo muri Uganda na Nkundabose Patrick wamamaye muri Alarm Ministries mu giterane gikomeye kizabera mu Mujyi wa Kigali.
Ni igiterane cyiswe â€˜Youth Connectionâ€™ kizabera ku rusengero rushya rwa Foursquare Gospel Church ruherereye Kimironko mu Mujyi wa Kigali.
â€˜Youth Connectionâ€™ ni igiterane kigamije kwigisha urubyiruko no kuruhugura, kuruhuza rukina imikino itandukanye no gutaha urusengero rushya rwâ€™iri torero riri mu akomeye mu Rwanda.
Wilson Mugwema ushinzwe Itumanaho muri Foursquare Gospel Church Kimironko yavuze ko batekereje guhuza urubyiruko kugira ngo barwigishe kwihangira imirimo no kurwanya ibiyobyabwenge.
Ati â€œHazaba harimo ibikorwa bizahuza urubyiruko rutandukanye rwo muri za Kaminuza kugira ngo tugire urubyiruko rwinshi ruze tubaganirize ku bikorwa bitandukanye birimo kurwanya ibibyabwenge nâ€™uko umuntu yakwihangira umurimo.â€
Kizatangira ku wa 15 Werurwe 2020 kimare icyumweru cyose. Mbere yâ€™uko gitangira hazaba igitaramo kinini kizatumirwamo amakorali akomeye mu Rwanda nâ€™abandi bahanzi bataratangazwa.
Patrick Nkundabose wamamaye muri Alarm Ministries usanzwe aba muri SuÃ¨de we yamaze kugera mu Rwanda yitabiriye iki giterane. Uyu muhanzi wamamaye atera indirimbo zitandukanye zâ€™uyu muryango wâ€™ivugabutumwa zirimo â€˜Hariho Impamvuâ€™ nâ€™izindi yakoze nkâ€™uwigenga.
Pastor Wilson Bugembe we ategerejwe gususurutsa igiterane ku wa Mbere no ku wa Kabiri tariki 16 na 17 Werurwe 2020.
Uyu muhanzi ukomoka muri Uganda yaherukaga mu Rwanda mu gitaramo cya Kingdom of God Ministries cyiswe â€˜Victorious album launchâ€™ cyabereye mu ihema rya Kigali Conference and Exhibition Village ahahoze hitwa Camp Kigali, ku wa 12 Gicurasi 2019.
Cyari cyatumiwemo abaramyi bakomeye mu Rwanda barimo ArsÃ¨ne Tuyi [wegukanye igihembo cyâ€™umuhanzi mwiza ukizamuka muri Groove Awards Rwanda 2016], Bosco Nshuti [ufite igihembo cyâ€™umuhanzi wâ€™umwaka muri Groove Awards 2018]. Bafatanyije nâ€™amatsinda yo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana ya Alarm Ministries na Healing Worship Team nâ€™umuhanzikazi Liza Kamikazi wamamaye mu ndirimbo zisanzwe ariko akaza kwiyegurira Uwiteka.

Title: Bwa mbere Itorero â€˜Impact Centre ChrÃ©tienâ€™ rigiye gukorera igiterane gikomeye mu Rwanda
Body:
Nyuma yâ€™igihe gito Itorero Impact Centre ChrÃ©tien (ICC) rigeze mu Rwanda ryatangaje ko rigiye gukora igiterane kizahuriza hamwe abavugabutumwa batandukanye barimo nâ€™abakomoka ku Mugabane wâ€™i Burayi.
Nyuma yâ€™igihe gito Itorero Impact Centre ChrÃ©tien (ICC) rigeze mu Rwanda ryatangaje ko rigiye gukora igiterane kizahuriza hamwe abavugabutumwa batandukanye barimo nâ€™abakomoka ku Mugabane wâ€™i Burayi.
Iki giterane kizamara iminsi itatu, kizatangira ku wa 19 kigere ku wa 21 Werurwe 2020, kuri Kigali Convention Centre, aho kwinjira bizaba ari ubuntu.
Abazacyitabira bazasobanurirwa byimbitse â€˜Ijambo rya Yesu Kirisituâ€™ ndetse nâ€™akamaro kâ€™umubiri wa Kirisitu byâ€™umwihariko ku Rwanda.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe Itumanaho mu Itorero ICC, Karen Mambiki, yavuze ko nta muntu uwo ari we wese nâ€™imyemerere ye uzahezwa mu giterane kizitabirwa nâ€™abavugabutumwa bahagarariye iri torero mu bice bitandukanye byâ€™Isi nâ€™abo mu Rwanda.
Yagize ati "Inyigisho zizahatangirwa zizafasha abantu kubohoka no kurushaho kumenya â€˜Yesu Kirisitu.â€™â€™
Iri torero riyobowe na Pasiteri Yvan Castanou, na we uzaba ari i Kigali gusangiza ijambo ryâ€™Imana abazitabira icyo giterane.
ICC imaze kugira amashami asaga 85 hirya no hino ku Isi byâ€™umwihariko mu bihugu byose bivuga Ururimi rwâ€™Igifaransa, Francophonie.
Inyigisho zizatangirwa muri iki giterane zizaba ziri mu rurimi rwâ€™Igifaransa ariko zisemurwe mu Kinyarwanda. Abagiteguye bahamya ko kizaba ari nâ€™umwanya mwiza wo gutangiza ku mugaragaro iri torero mu Rwanda.
Gahunda yâ€™iki giterane iteganya ko ku wa Kane tariki ya 19 Werurwe no kuwa Gatanu tariki ya 20 Werurwe 2020, kizajya gitangira saa Kumi nâ€™Ebyiri kugeza saa Tatu zâ€™umugoroba. Ku wa Gatandatu tariki ya 21 Werurwe, igiterane kizatangira saa kumi kigeze saa Moya zâ€™umugoroba.
Itorero rya Impact Centre ChrÃ©tien ryashinzwe mu 2002, rifite inkomoko i Paris mu Bufaransa, ari na ho hari icyicaro gikuru. Iri torero ryatangiye gukorera mu Rwanda mu mwaka ushize.
Buri cyumweru abayoboke baryo bakora amateraniro 106, agahuza abayoboke barenga 26 400.
Kubera inyigisho zifasha abatari bake zishingiye ku butumwa bwâ€™Umwami Yesu Kirisitu, abayoboke ba Impact Centre ChrÃ©tien biyongera ku rugero rwa 27% buri mwaka.

Title: Kigali: Yibye igikoresho gitagatifu â€˜Ostensoirâ€™ muri Kiliziya azi ko ari zahabu
Body:
Umusore utaramenyekana yinjiye muri Kiliziya yitiriwe Mutagatifu Visenti Pallotti i Gikondo mu mujyi wa Kigali, yiba igikoresho gitagatifu cyifashishwa mu kumurika ukarisitiya cyizwi nka "Ostensoir".
Umusore utaramenyekana yinjiye muri Kiliziya yitiriwe Mutagatifu Visenti Pallotti i Gikondo mu mujyi wa Kigali, yiba igikoresho gitagatifu cyifashishwa mu kumurika ukarisitiya cyizwi nka "Ostensoir".
Mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki ya 26 Gashyantare 2020, nibwo uwo musore yahengereye umukirisitu wa nyuma wari muri iyi Paruwasi ya Gikondo asohotse, na we ahita yinjira yiba Ostensoir.
Padiri wa Paruwasi ya Gikondo, Rwasa Chrysante, yabwiye IGIHE ko uwo musore yibye iki gitereko cyâ€™isakaramentu azi ko abonye zahabu.
Yagize ati â€œUmusore yaje ejo mu gitondo mbere ya misa aterura isakaramentu aragenda. Nta bantu bari barimo, yacunze uwa nyuma asohotse muri ako kanya aragenda arayitwara.â€
Rwasa yavuze ko bahise bamenyesha inzego zâ€™umutekano kandi ngo hari amakuru yâ€™ibanze ashobora gutuma uwibye icyo gikoresho afatwa.
Yavuze ko abajura bakunze kwiba za Ostensoirs bakeka ko ari zahabu yâ€™umwimerere, nyamara ziba zikozwe muri zahabu yâ€™umwomekano.
Ostensoir yibwe ifite agaciro kari hagati yâ€™ibihumbi 600 na miliyoni 1 yâ€™amafaranga yâ€™u Rwanda.

Title: Itorero Angilikani ryâ€™ u Rwanda riri gushaka miliyoni 115 zo gushyigikira diyosezi nshya ya Karongi
Body:
Itorero Angilikani ryâ€™u Rwanda ryatangiye ubukangurambaga bwo gushaka amafaranga yo gushyigikira diyosezi nshya ya Karongi izatangira imirimo muri Gicurasi uyu mwaka.
Itorero Angilikani ryâ€™u Rwanda ryatangiye ubukangurambaga bwo gushaka amafaranga yo gushyigikira diyosezi nshya ya Karongi izatangira imirimo muri Gicurasi uyu mwaka.
Iri torero ryagaragaje ko rikeneye nibura miliyoni 115 Frw zo gushyigikira imirimo yâ€™iyo diyosezi nshya mu gihe cyâ€™imyaka itatu, kugira ngo nayo itangire kwibeshaho.
Kuri uyu wa Gatandatu, iryo torero ryatangije ubukangurambaga bwiswe â€˜25 Km walking Challenge in Suppot of Karongi Missionary Dioceseâ€™ mu rugendo rwâ€™ibirometero 25. Abarwitabiriye bagiye nâ€™amaguru guhera i Nyanza mu Karere ka Kicukiro kugera i Nyamata mu karere ka Bugesera.
Intego yâ€™urwo rugendo kwari ugukusanya ubushobozi bwo gushyigikira Diyosezi nshya ya Karongi izatangizwa tariki ya 31 Gicurasi uyu mwaka.
Ni urugendo rwâ€™amasaha atanu rwatangijwe nâ€™Umwepisikopi Mukuru wâ€™itorero Angilikani ryâ€™u Rwanda Dr.Laurent Mbanda , rukitabirwa nâ€™abakristo bâ€™itorero Angilikani.
Iri torero rigaragaza ko mu mwaka wa mbere wa Diyosezi ya Karongi hakenewe byibura 86,000,000 Frw. Buri Diyosezi ya Angilikani mu zisanzweho yiyemeje gutanga 3. 500.000 Frw.
Ayo mafaranga azafasha mu gushaka imodoka yâ€™Umwepiskopi, Umushahara we, gukodesha inzu mu gihe Diyoseze itaragira inyubako zayo, ibikoresho byâ€™ibanze byo mu biro, gufasha za paruwasi nâ€™amakanisa, gusana no kubaka insengero zitujuje ibisabwa, kwigisha no guhugura abapasitoro.
Rev.Prof .Ndikumana Viateur, umwe mu bitabiriye urugendo rwo gushakira amikoro Diyosezi ya Karongi yagize ati " Uru rugendo rwatunejeje, ni urugendo rwâ€™amateka rugaragaza ubumwe mu gukora umurimo wâ€™Imana. Biratwereka ko tuzagera kure nidufashanya kandi tugatahiriza umugozi umwe mu kubaka ubwami bwâ€™Imana.â€
Rev.Rukundo Jean Pierre Methode watowe nâ€™inama yâ€™Abepisikopi kuzayobora Diyosezi nshya ya Karongi , yavuze ko Diyosezi ya Karongi niboneka izafasha gukomeza iyogezabutumwa rikagera kuri benshi.
Yagize ati â€œIyo Diyosezi izunganira abandi bari basanzwe bakora muri kariya gace mu kwamamaza Inkuru nziza yâ€™ Agakiza ka Yesu no kuzana Iterambere ryuzuye, dore ko kariya gace ka Nyamasheke, na Rutsiro turi mu duce tubarizwamo abaturage bakennye kurusha abandi mu Rwanda.â€
Umwepisikopi Mukuru wâ€™itorero Angilikani ryâ€™u Rwanda Dr.Laurent Mbanda, yavuze ko bakeneye inkunga yo gushyigikira Diyosezi nshya ya Karongi, no gutegura umunsi nyirizina wo kuyitaha.
Yavuze ko kuri uyu wa Gatandatu hakusanyijwe miliyoni zirenga enye, bakaba bagiye no gukomereza mu zindi Diyosezi kugira ngo amafaranga akenewe aboneke.
Diyosezi nshya ya Karongi izaba ifite imbibi zâ€™icyahoze ari perefegitura ya Kibuye, ubu ikaba igizwe na Paruwase 9 zabarizwaga muri Diyosezi ya Kivu.

Title: Patient Bizimana yatumiwe mu gitaramo gikomeye mu Buholandi
Body:
Umuhanzi umaze gushinga imizi mu ndirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana, Patient Bizimana, yatumiwe mu gitaramo azahuriramo na Fortran Bigirimana mu Buholandi.
Umuhanzi umaze gushinga imizi mu ndirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana, Patient Bizimana, yatumiwe mu gitaramo azahuriramo na Fortran Bigirimana mu Buholandi.
Iki gitaramo cyiswe â€œThanksgiving Celebration Live Concertâ€ giteganyijwe kubera Kerkplein1 mu Buholandi ku wa 4-5 Mata 2020. Cyateguwe na Family Fellowship Ministries.
Patient Bizimana azagihuriramo nâ€™umuramyi Fortran Bigirimana ukomoka mu Burundi, akaba afite ibingano binyura benshi mu bakunda umuziki uhimbaza Imana.
Bigirimana yakunzwe mu Rwanda binyuze mu ndirimbo zirimo â€œNtaco Nzobaâ€, â€˜â€˜Ni amahoroâ€ nâ€™izindi.
Amakuru agera kuri IGIHE ni uko Patient Bizimana azahaguruka mu Rwanda mu mpera za Werurwe yerekeza mu Buholandi.
Agiye gusubira gutaramira i Burayi nyuma yâ€™amezi asaga abiri ahavuye. Ubwo aherukayo mu mwaka ushize, urugendo rwe yarusoje mu gitaramo yahuriyemo na Gentil Misigaro cyabereye mu Mujyi wa Bruxelles mu Bubiligi ku wa 31 Ukuboza 2019.
Uyu muramyi yabwiye IGIHE ko yiteguye neza kuzataramana nâ€™abakunzi bâ€™ibihangano bye ku Mugabane wâ€™u Burayi.
Yagize ati â€œNi ubwa mbere nzaba ndirimbye muri iki gihugu; ikindi kandi guhurirayo na Fortrand uzaba uvuye mu Bufaransa nabyo bizatuma igitaramo kirushaho kuba cyiza.â€
Bizimana Patient yizeye ko igitaramo kizaba cyiza cyane ko amaze kumenyera ikirere cyaho nâ€™uburyo abatuye muri ibi bihugu baba bafite inyota yo kuramya Imana.
Uyu muhanzi usengera muri Evangelical Restoration Church yakoreye ibitaramo mu bihugu hafi ya byose bya Afurika yâ€™Uburasirazuba, yaririmbiye mu Burayi nâ€™ahandi henshi. Ni we muhanzi rukumbi mu bakora umuziki uhimbaza Imana mu Rwanda umaze gukora ibitaramo bikomeye ndetse bikagaragaramo abahanzi bubatse izina.
Ategura ibitaramo ngarukamwaka bya â€˜East Celebrationâ€™ byitabirwa nâ€™ibihumbi byâ€™abakunda umuziki we. Mu 2016 yatumiye Solly Mahlangu, umunyempano ukomeye wo muri Afurika yâ€™Epfo, Umunya-Nigeria Osinachi Joseph [Sinach] (2018) na Alka Mbumba wiyita â€™Umusazi wa Yesuâ€™ (2019) nâ€™abandi.
Umuziki yawutangiye akiri muto, agitangira kwiyumvamo impano yatangiye kwihatira kwiga gucuranga piano mu rusengero hanyuma bigeze mu 2007 asohora indirimbo ye bwite yitwa â€˜Andyoheraâ€™ ari nabwo benshi batangiye kumubwira ko afite ijwi ryiza. Yakunzwe bihambaye mu ndirimbo nka â€˜Iyo nezaâ€™, â€˜Amagambo yanjyeâ€™, â€˜Menye nezaâ€™, â€˜Andyoheraâ€™ nâ€™izindi.

Title: Itorero Angilikani mu Rwanda ryemeje ishyirwaho rya Diyoseze nshya nâ€™Umwepisikopi wayo wa mbere
Body:
Itorero Angilikani mu Rwanda ryatangaje ko ryungutse Diyoseze nshya ya Karongi, izatahwa ku wa 31 Gicurasi 2020 ari nabwo hazimikwa Umwepisikopi wayo wa mbere, Rev. Jean Pierre Methode Rukundo.
Itorero Angilikani mu Rwanda ryatangaje ko ryungutse Diyoseze nshya ya Karongi, izatahwa ku wa 31 Gicurasi 2020 ari nabwo hazimikwa Umwepisikopi wayo wa mbere, Rev. Jean Pierre Methode Rukundo.
Byemejwe nâ€™inama yâ€™Inama yâ€™Abepisikopi (House of Bishops ) yateraniye mu Karere ka Musanze muri Diyoseze ya Shyira ku wa Gatanu tariki 15 Gashyantare 2020.
Itangazo ryashyizweho umukono nâ€™Umwepisikopi Mukuru wâ€™Itorero Angilikani mu Rwanda, Dr.Laurent Mbanda ryerekana ko byo iyo nama yemeje harimo gushyiraho Diyoseze ya Karongi izaba igizwe nâ€™iyahoze ari Intara ya Kibuye.
Iyo nama yanatoye uzaba Umwepisikopi wa mbere wâ€™iyo Diyoseze nshya Rev. Jean Pierre Methode Rukundo uzimikwa ubwo izaba itahwa ku mugaragaro ku itariki ya 31 Gicurasi 2020.
Itorero rya Angilikani rifite abayoboke barenga miliyoni imwe kuva ritangiye mu Rwanda mu 1992 ryari rigizwe na Diyosezi 11, ubu zikaba zibaye 12.
Rev. Jean Pierre Methode Rukundo afite impamyabumenyi ihanitse muri Tewologiya nâ€™Iterambere (Theology and Development) yayikuye i Nairobi muri Kenya.
Yakoze imirimo itandukanye harimo kuba Pasitoro muri za Paruwasi, kuyobora ishami ryâ€™iterambere muri Diyosezi ya Shyogwe. Ubu ni Umunyamabanga Mukuru wâ€™Itorero Anglikani ryâ€™u Rwanda.
Kubera ubuzima bubi yakuriyemo nyuma yâ€™uko ababyeyi be batandukanye afite imyaka ine bigatuma amara umwaka mu buzima bwo ku muhanda ariko akaza kugira amahirwe ya kabiri yamufashije kwiga, Rev. Jean Pierre Methode Rukundo yashinze umuryango yise amahirwe ya kabiri â€œSecond Chance Rukundo Ministryâ€ ufasha abagize ibibazo bitandukanye kongera kugaruka mu buzima.

Title: James na Daniella bahurije couple zâ€™abaramyi mu gitaramo cyâ€™amateka gitegerejwe i Kigali
Body:
Benshi bari bamaranye imyaka icyifuzo cyo kubona couple zâ€™abaramyi zizwi mu muziki uhimbaza Imana zahuriye mu gitaramo kimwe. Izo nzozi zigiye kuba impamo, ibyifuzo bigiye gusubizwa binyuze muri James na Daniella.
Benshi bari bamaranye imyaka icyifuzo cyo kubona couple zâ€™abaramyi zizwi mu muziki uhimbaza Imana zahuriye mu gitaramo kimwe. Izo nzozi zigiye kuba impamo, ibyifuzo bigiye gusubizwa binyuze muri James na Daniella.
James na Daniella bafite igikundiro cyo ku gasongero mu bihebeye ibihangano byo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana bateguye igitaramo gikomeye bahurijemo couple zâ€™abaramyi zikunzwe mu gihugu.
Iki gitaramo cyiswe â€œMpa Amavuta Live Concertâ€ gitegerejwe kubera muri Kigali Arena ku wa 1 Werurwe 2020.
James na Daniella bagiteguye bagamije kumurika album yabo ya mbere bise â€œMpa Amavutaâ€™â€™ izaba iriho indirimbo umunani.
Cyatumiwemo abahanzi bakomeye barimo andi ma-couple azwi cyane mu muziki wo kuramya Imana arimo iya Ben na Chance; Tuyizere Papi Clever na Ingabire Dorcas; Maya na Fabrice na Amanda Fung na Kavutse Olivier babarizwa muri Beauty for Ashes.
Abazacyitabira kandi bazataramirwa nâ€™abahanzi barimo Prosper Nkomezi uri mu bafite igikundiro, RenÃ© Patrick, Ndayisenga Esron wamamaye muri True Promises na Gaby Kamanzi.
Couple ya James Rugarama na Daniella Mukiza ifitanye abana babiri. Ni imwe mu zakoze umuziki ukabasha kugera ku kigero nkâ€™icyo uyu munsi bariho. Bavuga ko kuba indirimbo zabo ziri kwamamara cyane mu buryo bwihuse ari ubushake bwâ€™Imana nâ€™amasengesho yabo adasiba.
Mu minsi ishize babwiye IGIHE ko babanye igihe kinini babitsanya amabanga, nyuma bafata umwanzuro wo kugirana umubano wâ€™urukundo no kuririmbana nka Couple.
Aba bombi iyo bavuga amateka yabo bavuga ko batangiye baririmbana ariko mu 2019 bakaza gufata umwanzuro wo gutangira kuririmba nyuma yâ€™uko baririmbiraga mu rugo bakumva ni byiza cyane.
James ati â€œTwararirimbaga tutarabana ubundi tugahurira mu matsinda atandukanye. Tumaze kubana dutangira kujya turirimbana ariko bitari mu buryo bweruye. Uyu mwaka nibwo nkâ€™itsinda ryacu nibwo twagiye muri studio dukora indirimbo ya mbere twise â€˜Mpa Amavutaâ€™.â€
Daniella avuga ko urukundo rwabo rwatangiye gututumba mu 2008 cyangwa 2009, mu 2012 bajya kwiga muri Uganda, umugabo yiga ibyâ€™Ububanyi nâ€™Amahanga mu gihe umugore icyo gihe yigaga Ibaruramari.
Ati â€œTwamenyanye kera kuko twari abaturanyi Kimironko nyuma tugiye kwiga muri Uganda nibwo twaje kubana. Mu 2008 cyangwa 2009 nibwo twamenyanye noneho mu 2012 tujya kwiga kaminuza, tuyirangiza mu 2015 aba ari nabwo tuba umuryango.â€
Ubu bamaze gushyira hanze indirimbo zirimo â€˜Mpa Amavutaâ€™ bahereyeho imaze no kurebwa nâ€™abasaga miliyoni ku rubuga rwa Youtube, â€œNkoreshaâ€, â€œUbubyutseâ€ na â€œNarakijijweâ€.
Kuba ari couple ikora umurimo wâ€™Imana wo kuririmba, bavuga ko ari ikintu kibafasha kuko kuba bafite icyerekezo kimwe ari ikintu gihambaye ama-couple yose yakabaye yitaho cyane.
Ni ku nshuro ya mbere James na Daniella bagiye gukorera igitaramo mu Rwanda, gusa si cyo cya mbere bakoze kuva batangiye umuziki kuko hari icyo bakoreye muri Uganda mu mpera za 2017.
Kwinjira muri â€œMpa Amavuta Live Concertâ€ ku bazagura amatike mbere ni 3 000 Frw, 15 000 Frw na 30 000 Frw ku bazagura amatike mbere mu gihe abazayagurira ku muryango bizaba ari 5 000 Frw, 10 000 Frw na 20 000 Frw.
Â 	Reba â€˜Mpa Amavutaâ€™ ya James&Daniella

Title: Papa Francis yanze icyifuzo cyo kuba abapadiri ku bagabo bafite abagore muri Amazon
Body:
Papa Francis yanze kwemeza icyifuzo cyo kwemerera abagabo bafite abagore kuba abapadiri mu gace ka Amazon, mu rwego rwo guhangana nâ€™ubuke bwâ€™abapadiri.
Papa Francis yanze kwemeza icyifuzo cyo kwemerera abagabo bafite abagore kuba abapadiri mu gace ka Amazon, mu rwego rwo guhangana nâ€™ubuke bwâ€™abapadiri.
Abasenyeri bo muri ako gace bari bashyigikiye uwo mwanzuro umwaka ushize, ariko byagombaga kwemezwa na Papa.
Ubusanzwe abapadiri ba Kiliziya Gatolika basabwa gukomeza kuba imanzi igihe cyose bahamagariwe uwo murimo.
Ubwo abagabo muri Amazon basabirwaga kwemererwa kuba abapadiri bafite abagore, byararwanyijwe cyane mu bice byâ€™Uburayi na Amerika, bavuga ko byaba biganisha ku kwemerera abapadiri bose ku isi gushaka abagore ari umwe mu myihariko Kiliziya yari ifite.
Itangazo ryavuye i Vatikani rigira riti â€œAmazon yaduhaye umukoro, Papa arandika, agamije ko tuva mu kibazo gihari bya nyabyo aho kwinezeza mu bisubizo bitanga umuti wâ€™ikibazo igice.â€
Papa yavuze ko hakenewe abapadiri bumva neza ikibazo kiri muri Amazon nâ€™umuco wo muri ako gace. Yasabye abashumba gusengera abantu ngo bagire umuhamagaro wâ€™ubupadiri ku bwinshi.
Umwaka ushize abasenyeri 184 bahuriye i Vatikani biga ku hazaza ha Kiliziya mu gace ka Amazon. Hanaganiriwe niba abagabo bakuze nâ€™abashatse abagore bakwemererwa kuba abapadiri.
Bivugwa ko nibura 85Â % byâ€™uduce two muri Amazon batabasha guhimbaza misa buri cyumweru kubera ko nta bapadiri bahagije bahari. Hari abavuga ko babona padiri rimwe mu mwaka.

Title: Pasiteri Antoine Rutayisire agiye kujya mu kiruhuko cyâ€™izabukuru
Body:
Umuyobozi wa Paruwasi ya Remera mu Itorero Angilikani, Rev Past Dr Antoine Rutayisire wamenyekanye mu nyigisho zitandukanye zâ€™iyobokamana, yatangaje ko mu myaka itatu azajya mu kiruhuko cyâ€™izabukuru nkâ€™uko biteganywa mu mahame itororo Angilikani rigenderaho.
Umuyobozi wa Paruwasi ya Remera mu Itorero Angilikani, Rev Past Dr Antoine Rutayisire wamenyekanye mu nyigisho zitandukanye zâ€™iyobokamana, yatangaje ko mu myaka itatu azajya mu kiruhuko cyâ€™izabukuru nkâ€™uko biteganywa mu mahame itororo Angilikani rigenderaho.
Itorero Angilikani riteganya ko Pasiteri cyangwa Musenyeri wujuje imyaka 65 ku munsi yizihirijeho isabukuru yâ€™imyaka 65 ahita ajya mu kiruhuko cyâ€™izabukuru.
Hashize iminsi ku mbuga nkoranyamabaga hacicikana amakuru yâ€™uko Rev. Past. Dr. Antoine Rutayisire agiye kujya mu kirihuko cyâ€™izabukuru ariko ugasanga abantu batabivugaho rumwe benshi bavuga ko agikenewe mu murimo wâ€™Imana.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE, Rutayisire yavuze ko ayo makuru ari ukuri kandi ko agenda abyibutsa abantu iyo avuga ubutumwa mu materaniro atandukanye.
Ati â€œIbyo ni ukuri nta kinyoma kirimo kubera ko twebwe buriya mu Itorero Angilikani iyo wujuje imyaka 65 ujya mu kiruhuko cyâ€™izabukuru. Nta muntu wabimpimbiye ni njye wabivuze. Nkunze no kubivuga muri iyi minsi.â€
Kugeza ubu Rev. Past. Dr. Antoine Rutayisire afite imyaka 62. Yavuze ko ku itariki 29 Gicurasi 2023 azaba asoje imirimo ahabwa nâ€™itorero, gusa avuga ko atazahagarika ivugabutumwa.
Ati â€œKu itariki 29 zâ€™ukwezi kwa Gatanu nzabyuka ntakiri umukozi wa Diyoseze. Ntabwo nzaba nahagaritse ubutumwa ariko nzaba nahagaritse kuyobora Paruwasi nâ€™indi mirimo yose.â€
Uyu mugabo wize imiyoborere avuga ko iyo umuntu asigaje imyaka itanu ngo ajye mu kiruhuko cyâ€™iza bukuru aba agomba gutegura ubuzima bwe buri imbere kandi ngo we yarabirangije.
Yavuze ko iyo ari kwigisha ijambo ryâ€™Imana bimunezeza ariko ko hari nâ€™undi munezero yumva ategereje kandi ngo ntibizamubuza gutanga umusanzu mu itorero atari mu buyobozi.
Ati "Mfite undi munezero numva ntegereje imbere Imana nintiza ubuzima burenga imyaka 65. Namaze gukora gahunda yâ€™akazi kâ€™ubuzima bwanjye, uko nzasaza ntabwo nzasaza nsaziye mu biro, ntabwo mbyifuza.â€
Akomoza ku byo azibandaho mu kiruhuko cyâ€™izabukuru, yavuze ko azakomeza kwandika ibitabo akarushaho no kwishimana nâ€™umuryango we cyane abuzukuru be.
Ati â€œMaze kugira abuzukuru, byanezeza nicaye hamwe nkajya njyana abuzukuru ku ishuri ba nyina na ba se bagiye mu kazi nkajya kubabafatira bakaza nkabagaburira nkicarana nabo nkasekana nabo nkagira igihe cyo kunezerwa.â€
Rev. Past. Dr. Antoine Rutayisire yatangiye ivugabutumwa 1983 akimara gukizwa. Mu 1990 yaretse akazi ko kuba mwalimu igihe cye agiharira kwigisha ijambo ryâ€™Imana. Icyo gihe yahise ajya kuyobora Umuryango wâ€™ivugabutumwa rishingiye kuri Bibiliya wâ€™abanyeshuri ba Kaminuza, akaba ariwe wabaye Umunyamabanga mukuru wawo wa mbere kugeza mu 1994.
Nyuma Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, yayoboye umuryango wâ€™ivugabutumwa wa AEE. Mu 2008 ayobora paruwasi ya Saint Etienne mu Biryogo ahava ajya kuyobora Paruwasi ya Remera arimo kugeza ubu.

Title: Korali Iriba yâ€™i Huye igiye kwizihiza isabukuru yâ€™imyaka 25 imaze mu ivugabutumwa
Body:
Korali Iriba ikorera umurimo wâ€™ivugabutumwa ryâ€™indirimbo muri ADEPR Paruwasi ya Taba mu Karere ka Huye mu Ntara yâ€™Amajyepfo, yinjiye mu bikorwa byâ€™urukundo bigamije gufasha abatishoboye mu myiteguro yo kwizihiza isabukuru yâ€™imyaka 25 imaze.
Korali Iriba ikorera umurimo wâ€™ivugabutumwa ryâ€™indirimbo muri ADEPR Paruwasi ya Taba mu Karere ka Huye mu Ntara yâ€™Amajyepfo, yinjiye mu bikorwa byâ€™urukundo bigamije gufasha abatishoboye mu myiteguro yo kwizihiza isabukuru yâ€™imyaka 25 imaze.
Iyi korali yashinzwe ku wa 15 Gashyantare 1995, yatangijwe nâ€™abantu 18. Izina ryayo ryamenyekanye cyane mu ndirimbo zirimo â€˜â€˜Nta kibashaâ€™â€™, â€˜â€˜Witinyaâ€™â€™, â€˜â€˜Turiho ku bwâ€™ubuntuâ€™â€™, â€˜â€˜Urakomeyeâ€™â€™ na â€˜â€˜Icyampaâ€™â€™.
Mu kwizihiza isabukuru yâ€™imyaka 25 imaze ishinzwe, Korali Iriba yatangije ibikorwa byagutse byiswe â€œIribaWeekâ€ bibanziriza ibyo birori biteganyijwe ku wa 16 Gashyantare 2020.
Korali Iriba yinjiye mu cyumweru cyâ€™ibikorwa bibimburira isabukuru yâ€™imyaka 25 biteganyijwe ku 3-9 Gashyantare 2020. Ni icyumweru cyateguwemo ibikorwa byo kubakira ubwiherero imiryango itanu itishoboye nâ€™ibindi bikorwa byâ€™urukundo.
Abajijwe impamvu bahisemo kubakira abatishoboye, Umuyobozi wa Korali Iriba, Mukasine Jeanne Dâ€™arc, yavuze ko bifuje kuvuga ubutumwa mu bikorwa.
Yagize ati â€œTwahisemo noneho kuvuga ubutumwa mu bikorwa kuko binazamura imibereho yâ€™abantu, iki gikorwa kizakomeza nâ€™ibindi twateguye.â€™â€™
Biteganyijwe ko ku wa 15 Gashyantare, Korali Iriba izagira umwiherero wo gushima Imana, naho ku wa 16 Gashyantare 2020 kuva saa Munani, ikore igitaramo cyâ€™amashimwe akubiye muri Zaburi ya 107, kizabera ku rusengero rwa ADEPR Taba mu Karere ka Huye.
Abazacyitabira bazataramirwa na Korali Iriba ifatanyije na Korali Itabaza. Umuvugabutumwa uzakibwirizamo ni Umuvugizi wa ADEPR, Karuranga Ephrem.
Mu myaka 25, Korali Iriba ishima buri wese wagize uruhare mu kugira ngo umurimo ukomeze gutera imbere.
Korali Iriba igizwe nâ€™abarenga 130 bari mu byiciro bitandukanye biganjemo abatuye mu duce two mu Mujyi wa Huye turimo Matyazo no ku Itaba nâ€™abakorera mu bindi bice byâ€™igihugu.
Mu myaka 25 imaze mu ivugabutumwa, Korali Iriba yashyize hanze album enye zâ€™amajwi nâ€™eshatu zâ€™amashusho.

Title: Tanzania: Abantu 20 baguye mu mubyigano wabereye mu rusengero
Body:
Nibura abantu 20 bo muri Tanzania nibo baguye muvundo wabereye mu giterane ku mu Majyaruguru yâ€™icyo gihugu, nyuma yâ€™uko uwabwirizaga asutse hasi amavuta yise ko yera, abantu bakabyiganira kuyakoramo bizeye gukira indwara zitandukanye.
Nibura abantu 20 bo muri Tanzania nibo baguye muvundo wabereye mu giterane ku mu Majyaruguru yâ€™icyo gihugu, nyuma yâ€™uko uwabwirizaga asutse hasi amavuta yise ko yera, abantu bakabyiganira kuyakoramo bizeye gukira indwara zitandukanye.
Nyuma yâ€™igiterane cyabaye kuri iki Cyumweru, Umuyobozi wâ€™umujyi wa Moshi uherereye mu Majyaruguru ya Tanzania ibyo byabereyemo, Kippi Warioba, yavuze ko atewe impungenge nâ€™uko umubare wâ€™abapfuye ushobora gukomeza kwiyongera biturutse kuri uwo mubyigano.
Ati â€œKugeza ubu abantu 20 bapfuye ariko imibare ishobora kwiyongera kuko hari abakomeretse.â€ Abakomeretse habarurwa 16.
Ibyo byago byabaye ubwo abantu benshi bari bitabiriye igiterane cyayobowe nâ€™umupasiteri ukunzwe cyane muri icyo gihugu, Boniface Mwamposa, uyoboye itorero Arise and Shine Ministry ryo muri Tanzania.
Jennifer Temu wari muri ayo materaniro yabwiye Ibiro Ntaramakuru byâ€™Abafaransa, AFP, ko ikibazo cyaje kuvuka ubwo Mwamposa wiyita intumwa yâ€™Imana, "ApÃ´tre", yasukaga ibyo yise amavuta yera hasi abantu bakabyiganira kuyakoramo.
Mwamposa yahise ahunga. Umuyobozi wa Polisi muri icyo gihugu Simon Sirro wemeje ko hapfuye abantu 20 mu kiganiro kuri Televisiyo yâ€™igihugu muri Tanzania, TBC1, yasabye Mwamposa kwishyikiriza Polisi kuko ari umuntu uzwi, ntaho yacikira.
Yavuze ko Polisi igiye kureba uburyo amadini nâ€™amatorero ategura amateraniro arimo abantu benshi.
Perezida John Magufuli na we yavuze ko ababajwe nâ€™abantu 20 baguye i Moshi ndetse nâ€™abandi 20 bahitanywe nâ€™imyuzure mu Majyepfo ya Tanzania, mu Karere ka Lindi mu cyumweru gishize.

Title: Gatsibo: Umupasiteri nâ€™Umubwiriza barwaniye mu materaniro, harakekwa ko bapfuye amaturo
Body:
Pasiteri Ignace Mbaraga, nâ€™Umubwiriza witwa Sayinzoga Alex bakunze kwita Said, bo mu itorero Inkuru Nziza, barwaniye mu materaniro ku cyumweru tariki 26 Mutarama 2020.
Pasiteri Ignace Mbaraga, nâ€™Umubwiriza witwa Sayinzoga Alex bakunze kwita Said, bo mu itorero Inkuru Nziza, barwaniye mu materaniro ku cyumweru tariki 26 Mutarama 2020.
Amakuru agera kuri IGIHE aravuga ko abo bagabo barwaniye imbere yâ€™abayoboke bâ€™ishami ryâ€™Itorero Inkuru Nziza, riherereye mu Murenge wa Ngarama mu Karere ka Gatsibo.
Abakristu bahise batabaza inzego zâ€™umutekano, ubu abo bagabo bombi bacumbikiwe kuri Sitasiyo yâ€™Urwego rwâ€™Ubugenzacyaha ya Ngarama.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa wâ€™Umurenge wa Ngarama Rugaravu Jean Claude yabwiye IGIHE ko basanze bapfa amakimbirane bari bafitanye ashingiye ku kutubahana nubwo hari amakuru avuga ko baba bapfuye amaturo.
Ati â€œBarwanye bari bafitanye amatiku mu Itorero ryabo yo gusuzugurana, ejo rero barashwanye barwanira mu rusengero bari mu materaniro.â€
Yavuze ko abakristu bahise babatabaza nkâ€™inzego zâ€™ibanze bafatanyije nâ€™izâ€™umutekano basanga koko bari gushwana.
Ati â€œTwahise tuhagera abakristu badutabaje, dusanga barimo bashwana birumvikana bagombaga guhita bafatwa bagafungwa kuko bari bateje amakimbirane mu bakristu.â€
Rugaravu yabwiye IGIHE ko iryo shami ryâ€™itorero Inkuru Nziza bari baranarifungiye urusengero rikoreramo kubera rutujuje ibyangombwa, nyuma riza gukomeza amateraniro rwihishwa.
Ati â€œNi itorero ubona ritanashinga twari twaranarifunze nyuma biza kugaragara ko baje kugenda bagasubiramo bataratubwira ariko ntabwo bapfa amaturo kuko si itorero rifatika. Barafunzwe bari muri RIB Ngarama.â€
Rugaravu asaba abaturage kwirinda amakimbirane ariko na none afatiye kuri iryo torero asaba abakristu gusengera mu nsengero zujuje ibyangombwa.
Si ubwa mbere humvikana imirwano mu bayoboke bâ€™itorero ryâ€™Inkuru Nziza kuko nko mu 2017 abayobozi baryo bo mu Karere ka Ngoma ahitwa ku Cyasemakamba bafatanye mu mashati barwanira imbere yâ€™imbaga yâ€™abayoboke yari yagiye kumva ijambo ryâ€™Imana bapfa amaturo no kuba bamwe barimuwe bakanga kujya aho bimuriwe bitwaje ko nta maturo atubutse ahaboneka.
Icyo gihe bamwe baranakomeretse kuko byageze nâ€™aho bakristu bajya muri iyo mirwano yashyamiranyije abari bahasanzwe nâ€™abari bahimuriwe.
Amakimbirane mu matorero akomeje kuvugwa no mu bindi bihugu. Mu minsi ishize mu mujyi wa Mombasa, muri Kenya, Elisha Misiko wâ€™imyaka 55, yiyahuye nyuma yo kwica umugore we Ann Mghoi amutsinze mu rusengero bafatanyije gushinga rwitwa Ground of God â€˜s gospel Ministries.

Title: Uko Kiliziya Gatolika yeguriwe ahahoze gereza ya 1930 ngo hubakwe katederali yâ€™abantu 5000
Body:
Arkidiyosezi ya Kigali yeguriwe ubutaka bungana na hegitari 5.5 zâ€™ahahoze gereza ya Nyarugenge izwi nka 1930, ngo ihubake katederali igezweho.
Arkidiyosezi ya Kigali yeguriwe ubutaka bungana na hegitari 5.5 zâ€™ahahoze gereza ya Nyarugenge izwi nka 1930, ngo ihubake katederali igezweho.
Ubusanzwe Katederali ya Kigali iherereye mu Kiyovu mu Karere ka Nyarugenge ahari Paruwasi ya St Michel, aho ari nto ku buryo ibikorwa binini bitabasha kuhabera.
Umwaka ushize ubwo Musenyeri wa Arkidiyosezi ya Kigali, Antoine Kambanda, yimikwaga, ibirori byabereye muri Stade Amahoro i Remera.
Icyo gihe kandi yagaragarije abanya-Kigali, icyifuzo cyo kubaka ingoro yâ€™Imana, Katederali yâ€™umujyi kandi ihesha Imana icyubahiro.
Perezida Kagame na we witabiriye ibyo birori yemeye inkunga mu kubaka iyo katederali, yongeraho ko bishobotse yanubakwa ahantu hashya.
Ati â€œTuzafatanya kuyubaka, twubake katederali nziza kandi icyo gihe nibikunda twanayubaka ahandi hashya, ariko bizava mu bushake bwa Kiliziya cyangwa mu bwumvikane tuzaba twagize mu gutera inkunga tugere kuri icyo cyifuzo kandi bidatinze.â€
Mu kiganiro Musenyeri Kambanda yagiranye na TVR, yashimiye Umukuru wâ€™Igihugu ko imvugo ye ari yo ngiro, kubera ko ubu yabafashije bagahabwa ikibanza.
Ati â€œNyuma yâ€™aho twagiye dusaba tureba nâ€™ubuyobozi bwâ€™umujyi, nâ€™ubwa Minisiteri yâ€™ubutegetsi bwâ€™igihugu idushinzwe, tugenda tureba ahashoboka mu mujyi atari kure yâ€™umujyi, ariko kandi hanatunganye, habereye, hanashobokaâ€.
Mgr Kambanda avuga ko byahuriranye nâ€™uko ahahoze gereza ya 1930 hari ikibanza kandi ubuyobozi bwâ€™umujyi bwifuza ko hakorerwa ikindi kintu.
Ati â€œMuri ibyo bintu rero byari byifujwe natwe twashyizemo igitekerezo cya katederali. Nyakubahwa Perezida wa Repubulika yarabyumvise kandi igitekerezo aragishyigikira tukaba tumushimira ko bahaduhaye ngo habe hakubakwa kiliziya ibereye umujyiâ€.
Mgr Kambanda avuga ko ubu harimo gukorwa igishushanyo kigendanye nâ€™icyerekezo 2050 u Rwanda rufite.
Ati â€œTurateganya kiliziya yajyamo abantu 5000, ariko ikagira nâ€™umwanya imbere ya kiliziya, iyo habaye nkâ€™iminsi mikuru katederali igira umwanya imbere yayo aho abantu bashobora guteranira bageze nko ku 10 000 no kugeza kuri 20 000â€.
Mgr Kambanda avuga ko hataramenyekana agaciro kubaka iyi katederali izatwara.
Ubuyobozi bwâ€™Umujyi wa Kigali buherutse gutangaza ko mu mpera za Gashyantare, igishushanyo kizaba cyarangiye, kikazaba cyerekana imiterere ya katederali, ubushobozi bwayo nâ€™ibindi, ku buryo imirimo yo kubaka izaba yarangiye mu mpera za 2021.
Bwavuze kandi ko mu rwego rwo gusigasira ibimenyetso byâ€™amateka byâ€™inyubako, Kiliziya yasabwe gutanga igishushanyo cyerekana uburyo bateganya kubungabunga inyubako zishaje zihari.
Mgr Kambanda yemeje ko ibyo bumvikanyeho nâ€™umujyi ari ugukora inyigo yâ€™uburyo amateka ya gereza yajya agaragara no mu kuhasura abantu bakamenya amateka yahabaye nâ€™uko hahindutse ahantu hâ€™umugisha.
Avuga ko kuba ahari gereza hagiye kujya Kiliziya â€˜nkâ€™abakristu tubibonamo ubutumwa bukomeye, ni ukuvuga ngo ahari ahantu ho gucibwa nâ€™urupfu, ubungubu hagiye kuba ahantu hâ€™umukiro nâ€™ubuzimaâ€™.
Mgr Kambanda avuga ko ahubatse katederali ya St Michel hataratekerezwa ikizahakorerwa kuko ari ibintu byo kwigwahoku bufatanye nâ€™ubuyobozi. Yahakanye kandi ko aho bahawe ari ingurane ya St Michel.

Title: Ese gusenga uhumirije hari icyo byongera ku Isengesho ?
Body:
Kimwe mu biranga abayoboke bo mu madini atandukanye yo hirya no hino ku Isi cyane cyane aya gikirisitu igihe bagiye gusenga, ni ugufunga amaso nâ€™ubwo baba batazi impamvu babikora.
Kimwe mu biranga abayoboke bo mu madini atandukanye yo hirya no hino ku Isi cyane cyane aya gikirisitu igihe bagiye gusenga, ni ugufunga amaso nâ€™ubwo baba batazi impamvu babikora.
Nâ€™ubwo gufunga amaso igihe umuntu ari gusenga byabaye nkâ€™ihame mu madini atandukanye, nta byahumetswe byera na bimwe bigaragaza ko ari ngombwa kubikora igihe ugiye gusenga, bitandukanye nâ€™ibindi Bibiliya yagiye itegeka nko kujya ahantu hatuje.
Umuyobozi wa Zion Temple mu ntara yâ€™amajyepfo Pasiteri Eric Ruhagararabahunga avuga ko nâ€™ubwo ntaho uyu muco wo gusenga umuntu ahumirije wanditse muri Bibiliya, ko ariko ufasha usenga kutarangara.
Ati â€œNtaho twahita tubibona muri Bibiliya ako kanya ariko guhumiriza bigufasha kutarangara, usenze ureba hari igihe urangara, ikinyuraho cyose uba ukireba rero ntabwo uba witaye cyane kuri uriya muntu uri gusabana nawe, niyo mpamvu rero akenshi umuntu afunga amaso, nâ€™ubwo ntaho Bibiliya ivuga ngo muzasenge mufunze amasoâ€.
Past. Ruhagararabahunga yongeyeho ko iyo usenze uhumirije Imana ibona ko ibyo uvuga bikuvuye ku mutima â€œUrumva ko iyo usenze uhumirije icya mbere nturangara ikindi nâ€™uriya uri kuramya biratuma abona ko ukomeje mu byo ukora, bituma Imana ibona ko uyihanze amasoâ€.
Nâ€™ubwo gusenga bifasha usenga kutarangara, Pasiteri Ruhagararabahunga, avuga ko umuntu usenga areba kandi akabikora neza nta kosa aba akoze.
Umutoni Sandrine, Umukirisitu usengera muri Kiliziya Gatolika avuga ko kuri we gusenga ahumirije bigira icyo byongera ku isengesho.
Ati â€œIyo mumpirije mba numva niyumva mu isengesho, nkumva ibyo ndi kuvuga bimvuye ku mutima, ariko iyo uri kureba hari ibintu byinshi bikurangaza ni yo waba uri ahantu hatari kunyura abantuâ€.
Nâ€™ubwo abakirisitu bavuga ko uyu muco wo guhumiriza ubafasha kutarangara, ku rundi ruhande abahanga mu mateka bo bavuga ko umuco wo gusenga umuntu ahumirije ukomoka mu bihe byâ€™abami, aho umuntu atashoboraga kujya imbere yâ€™umwami cyangwa undi muyobozi ngo amuhange amaso.
Kureba umuyobozi cyangwa umwami byafatwagwa nkâ€™ikinyabupfura gike, ni yo mpamvu uwabajyaga imbere yafungaga amaso cyangwa akareba hasi.
Ibi byaje gukomeza no mu muco wâ€™amadini, gufunga amaso mu gihe uri gusenga biba ikimenyetso cyo kwiyoroshya no kubaha uwo uri kubwira.

Title: Korali Shalom yâ€™i Nyarugenge yasohoye indirimbo ibimburira iziri kuri album yayo nshya
Body:
Korali Shalom ikorera umurimo wâ€™ivugabutumwa ryâ€™indirimbo muri ADEPR Nyarugenge yasohoye indirimbo ya mbere izagaragara kuri album nshya iteganya kumurika mu 2020.
Korali Shalom ikorera umurimo wâ€™ivugabutumwa ryâ€™indirimbo muri ADEPR Nyarugenge yasohoye indirimbo ya mbere izagaragara kuri album nshya iteganya kumurika mu 2020.
Iyi ndirimbo yiswe â€œWampaye amahoroâ€™â€™ yubakiye ku buhamya bwâ€™abantu Imana yatuye imitwaro yari ibaremereye ikabaha amahoro yo mu mutima, bakaba basigaye bagenda bemye.
Korali Shalom imaze kugwiza igikundiro mu ruhando rwâ€™abakunzi bâ€™umuziki uhimbaza Imana iri mu zigezweho muri ADEPR.
Urukundo igirirwa rwazamuwe nâ€™indirimbo zifitemo ubutumwa bwururutsa imitima yâ€™abababaye zirimo â€œNzirataâ€™â€™, â€œAbami nâ€™abategetsiâ€™â€™, â€œNzamamazaâ€, â€˜â€˜Nyabihangaâ€™â€™ nâ€™izindi.
â€˜Wampaye amahoroâ€™ ni indirimbo ya mbere igiye hanze yatanzwe nkâ€™impano ku bakunzi bâ€™ibihangano bihimbaza Imana mu mwaka wa 2020.
Visi Perezida wa Korali Shalom, Ngamijimana Charles, yabwiye IGIHE ko iyi ndirimbo itangiza umushinga wa album nshya iri gutegurwa.
Yagize ati â€œIndirimbo yitwa â€˜Wampaye amahoroâ€™ ni yo twatangiranye umwaka wa 2020, ibimburiye izindi ziri kuri album yâ€™amajwi yâ€™indirimbo umunani izajya hanze mu 2020.â€™â€™
Ubutumwa buri muri iki gihangano cyâ€™iminota ine nâ€™amasegonda 52 buganisha ku â€˜mahoro atangwa nâ€™Uwiteka ku wamwisunze arushye.â€™
Ngamijimana yavuze ko uyu mwaka bazakomeza kwegera abakunzi bâ€™ibihangano byabo no kubategurira ibikorwa byagutse cyane ko mu 2019, Korali Shalom yibanze cyane mu ngendo zâ€™ivugabutumwa.
Ati â€œNtitwagiye kure yâ€™abakunzi bacu. Uyu mwaka dufitemo igitaramo cyagutse turi gutegura. Umwaka ushize twawuhariye ingendo, twagiye aho twatumiwe kuvuga ubutumwa.â€™â€™
Korali Shalom yakoreye ingendo mu bice bitandukanye byâ€™igihugu birimo ibitaramo yakoreye mu turere twa Rubavu (Rubona), Rwamagana (Rwikubo), Musanze (Nyarubande), Huye (Matyazo) no mu Mujyi wa Kigali aho yaririmbye mu Umucyo Live Concert yabereye muri Dove Hotel, Ibihamya Live concert yabereye muri ADEPR Gatenga, mu Bibare i Remera no kuri Maison des Jeunes Kimisagara aho batangiye ubutumwa mu gikorwa cyo kurwanya ibiyobyabwenge.
Umwaka wa 2019 wayibereye mwiza kuko yanakoze ibitaramo mu yandi madini arimo irya Methodiste Libre nâ€™iryâ€™Abangilikani mu Giporoso kwa Rev. Pasiteri Rutayisire Antoine. Yanaremeye abatishoboye aho yakoreye umuganda rusange mu Karere ka Nyabihu.
Korali Shalom imaze imyaka 34 itangijwe ni ubuheta mu makorali yâ€™i Nyarugenge nyuma ya Hoziana yayitanze mu ivugabutumwa ryâ€™indirimbo.
Yashinzwe mu 1986 ari korali yâ€™abana bato, yitwaga â€œUmunezeroâ€. Icyo gihe muri ADEPR Nyarugenge hari korali nkuru imwe ariyo Hoziyana. Mu 1990 yemerewe kwitwa izina, ifata â€œShalomâ€ rimaze gushinga imizi. Iyi korali imaze gukora album enye zâ€™amajwi nâ€™ebyiri zâ€™amashusho.
Iya kabiri iriho indirimbo umunani izamurikwa mu 2020. Amashusho yayo yafatiwe mu gitaramo gikomeye cya Korali Shalom cyiswe â€˜â€˜Imbere ni hezaâ€™â€™ cyabereye muri Kigali Convention Centre mu 2018.
Korali Shalom igizwe nâ€™abaririmbyi 105 hatabariwemo ababa hanze yâ€™u Rwanda.

Title: I Kibeho ku butaka butagatifu hagiye kubakwa Bazilika
Body:
Kiliziya Gatolika ku bufatanye nâ€™Akarere ka Nyaruguru igiye gutangira imirimo yo kubaka Bazilika mu gace kabereyemo amabonekerwa ka Kibeho.
Kiliziya Gatolika ku bufatanye nâ€™Akarere ka Nyaruguru igiye gutangira imirimo yo kubaka Bazilika mu gace kabereyemo amabonekerwa ka Kibeho.
Nyuma yâ€™aho Igishushanyo mbonera cyerekana imiterere yâ€™iyi Basilika kigiriye hanze, kuwa 9 Mutarama Ubuyobozi bwâ€™Akarere ka Nyaruguru nâ€™ubwa Kiliziya Gatolika bwahuye nâ€™abazayubaka kugira ngo harebwe uburyo imirimo yo kuyubaka izashyirwa mu bikorwa.
Umuyobozi wâ€™Akarere ka Nyaruguru Habitegeko FranÃ§ois yavuze ko imirimo yâ€™ibanze yo kubaka iyi Bazilika igeze kure ndetse ko mu 2021 izaba yuzuye.
Yagize ati â€œIzuzura mu Ugushyingo 2021. Imirimo yâ€™ibanze irimo iyâ€™inyigo no gushyiraho ikigega kigamije gukusanya inkunga yararangiyeâ€.
Iyi Bazilika izaba yubatse ku butaka butagatifu bwâ€™i Kibeho busanzwe bugendererwa nâ€™Abakirisitu batari bake kubera amabonekerwa yahabereye mu myaka ya 1980.
Kuri ubu inzego zose bireba zarangije gusuzuma ibikenewe, bikaba biteganyijwe ko imirimo yo kubaka iyi Bazilika izatwara amafaranga yâ€™u Rwanda agera kuri miliyari 70.
Binyuze kuri Twitter, ubuyobozi bwâ€™Akarere ka Nyaruguru bwasabye abikorera gushora imari muri Nyaruguru, cyane cyane mu bijyanye nâ€™ibikorwa remezo byâ€™ubukerarugendo nâ€™amahoteli.
Ubuyobozi bwâ€™Akarere ka Nyaruguru buvuga ko kandi iyi Bazilika izaba ifite ibindi bikorwa remezo birimo inzu zâ€™amacumbi zishobora basanzwe bagenderera aka karere buri mwaka mu ngendo zâ€™iyobokamana, byâ€™umwihariko abaza ku munsi wizihizwaho kujya mu ijuru kwa Bikira Mariya.
Tariki 28 Ugushyingo 1981, ni bwo Bikira Mariya yabonekeye umukobwa wa mbere witwa Mumureke Alphonsine wigaga mu Rwunge rwâ€™Amashuri rwa MÃ¨re du Verbe i Kibeho.
Nyuma yâ€™umwaka umwe, yongeye kubonekera uwitwa Mukamazimpaka Anathalie, nyuma yongera kubonekera Mukangango Marie Claire na bo bigaga kuri iryo shuri. Bose yabahaga ubutumwa bagomba kugeza ku batuye Isi.

Title: Abayobozi bagera kuri 700 bitabiriye amasengesho yo gusengera igihugu (Amafoto)
Body:
Abayobozi muri Guverinoma, abikorera ku giti cyabo, abagize sosiyete sivile nâ€™inshuti zâ€™u Rwanda zavuye mu bihugu bigera ku 10, kuri iki Cyumweru bateraniye muri Kigali Convention Centre mu masengesho yo gusengera igihugu azwi nka National Prayer Breakfast.
Abayobozi muri Guverinoma, abikorera ku giti cyabo, abagize sosiyete sivile nâ€™inshuti zâ€™u Rwanda zavuye mu bihugu bigera ku 10, kuri iki Cyumweru bateraniye muri Kigali Convention Centre mu masengesho yo gusengera igihugu azwi nka National Prayer Breakfast.
Aya masengesho yitabiriwe nâ€™abagera kuri 700, abaye mu gihe u Rwanda rusoje icyerekezo 2020 cyâ€™iterambere, no gutangiza icyerekezo 2050.
Ategurwa nâ€™Umuryango, Rwanda Leaders Fellowship, akaba afite insanganyamatsiko igira iti â€œImiyoborere Izana Impinduka:Kwishimira aho tugeze-Dutegura ejo hahaza.â€
Aya masengesho yatangijwe mu 1995 agamije gushyira hamwe abayobozi bakuru mu kwiyegereza Imana, bagasangira, hakabaho gusengera igihugu nâ€™abayobozi bacyo ndetse bagasangira ijambo ryâ€™Imana.
Ku nshuro ya mbere yabereye muri Hotel Hotel des Mille Collines tariki 1 Nzeri 1995, kuva icyo gihe iki gikorwa kitabirwa nâ€™abayobozi batandukanye nâ€™abandi.
Ayâ€™uyu mwaka azaba ari ayo gushimira ibyo Imana yakoreye Igihugu ariko no gusengera abayobozi bacyo bagashyirwa mu maboko yâ€™Imana.
Aya masengesho abaye ahurirana kandi nâ€™igihe u Rwanda rurimo kwishimira ibyo rwagezeho mu cyerekezo 2020 rwari rwarihaye no gutangira icyerekezo 2020.
Hagendewe kuri iyi nsanganyamatsiko, aya masengesho afite intego yo kureba ibyakozwe no gushimira urugendo rwagenzwe, ariko no kureba aho baganisha igihugu.
Agamije kandi kugira umuco wo gushimira bitari gusa Imana ahubwo nâ€™abo yakoresheje ngo babe bagejeje aho igihugu kiri uyu munsi, kwiga ibyakozwe nâ€™indangagaciro zâ€™Imana yashyize mu bantu, ibi bigafasha kubaha inzira nziza yo gukomeza imbere.
Mu masengesho yâ€™umwaka ushize, Perezida Kagame yavuze ko bidakwiye ko umuyobozi abaho neza mu gihe abo areberera bafite ibibazo, ashimangira ko biteye isoni kumubona ashyiriye Imana abaturage yamuhaye kuyobora barwaye bwaki.
Yagize ati â€œNjye rwose mpora mfite impungenge ku kuzashorera abantu barwaye bwaki, bashonje, bameze nabi nkavuga nti â€˜Mana ngâ€™aba abantu bawe wanshinzeâ€™. Ntabwo umutima wanjye ujyanye na byo. Numva bidakwiye. Kugira ngo utazashorera abantu bameze batyo, ikintu cya mbere ni uko buri muyobozi bikwiye kumutera isoni. Mugomba kugira isoni. Iyo wemera indangagaciro ukazibura bikwiriye kugutera isoni.â€
Yakomeje avuga ko iterambere rirambye rikwiye gushingira ku ndangagaciro yâ€™imikorere hagati yâ€™abayobozi nâ€™abayoborwa.
